BioCore  3.6.0
A .NET library & program for annotating, editing various microscopy imaging formats using Bioformats supported images. Including whole slide, pyramidal, and series.
Loading...
Searching...
No Matches
Bio.cs
1using AForge;
2using AForge.Imaging.Filters;
3using BitMiracle.LibTiff.Classic;
4using CSScripting;
5using loci.common.services;
6using loci.formats;
7using loci.formats.meta;
8using loci.formats.services;
9using NetVips;
10using Newtonsoft.Json;
11using ome.xml.model.primitives;
12using System.Diagnostics;
13using System.Drawing.Imaging;
14using System.Globalization;
15using System.Runtime.InteropServices;
16using Image = System.Drawing.Image;
17using PixelFormat = System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat;
18using PointF = System.Drawing.PointF;
19using RectangleF = System.Drawing.RectangleF;
20using Size = System.Drawing.Size;
21using IntRange = AForge.IntRange;
22using OpenSlideGTK;
23namespace BioCore
24{
25 /* A class declaration. */
26 public static class Images
27 {
28 public static List<BioImage> images = new List<BioImage>();
31 public static BioImage GetImage(string ids)
32 {
33 for (int i = 0; i < images.Count; i++)
34 {
35 if (images[i].ID == ids || images[i].file == ids || images[i].filename == Path.GetFileName(ids))
36 return images[i];
37 }
38 return null;
39 }
43 public static void AddImage(BioImage im, bool newtab)
44 {
45 if (images.Contains(im)) return;
46 im.Filename = GetImageName(im.ID);
47 im.ID = im.Filename;
48 images.Add(im);
49 if (newtab)
50 App.tabsView.AddTab(im);
51 else
52 {
53 if (!App.viewer.Images.Contains(im))
54 {
55 App.viewer.AddImage(im);
56 App.viewer.Update();
57 }
58 }
59 }
66 public static int GetImageCountByName(string s)
67 {
68 string name = Path.GetFileName(s);
69 string ext = Path.GetExtension(s);
70 if (name.Split('-').Length > 2)
71 name = name.Remove(name.LastIndexOf('-'), name.Length - name.LastIndexOf('-'));
72 int i = 0;
73 for (int im = 0; im < images.Count; im++)
74 {
75 if (images[im].ID.Contains(name) && images[im].ID.EndsWith(ext))
76 i++;
77 }
78 return i;
79 }
85 public static string GetImageName(string s)
86 {
87 //Here we create a unique ID for an image.
88 int i = Images.GetImageCountByName(s);
89 if (i == 0)
90 return Path.GetFileName(s);
91 string name = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(s);
92 if (Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(name) != name)
93 name = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(name);
94 string ext = s.Substring(s.IndexOf('.'), s.Length - s.IndexOf('.'));
95 if (name.Split('-').Length > 2)
96 {
97 string sts = name.Remove(name.LastIndexOf('-'), name.Length - name.LastIndexOf('-'));
98 return sts + "-" + i + ext;
99 }
100 else
101 return name + "-" + i + ext;
102 }
106 public static void RemoveImage(BioImage im)
107 {
108 RemoveImage(im.ID);
109 }
115 public static void RemoveImage(string id)
116 {
117 BioImage im = GetImage(id);
118 if (im == null)
119 return;
120 images.Remove(im);
121 //im.Dispose();
122 im = null;
123 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Table.RemoveImage(" + '"' + id + '"' + ");");
124 }
130 public static void UpdateImage(BioImage im)
131 {
132 for (int i = 0; i < images.Count; i++)
133 {
134 if (images[i].ID == im.ID)
135 {
136 images[i] = im;
137 return;
138 }
139 }
140 }
141 }
142 /* Defining a struct called ZCT. */
143 public struct ZCT
144 {
145 public int Z { get; set; }
146 public int C { get; set; }
147 public int T { get; set; }
148 public ZCT(int z, int c, int t)
149 {
150 Z = z;
151 C = c;
152 T = t;
153 }
154 public static bool operator ==(ZCT c1, ZCT c2)
155 {
156 if (c1.Z == c2.Z && c1.C == c2.C && c1.T == c2.T)
157 return true;
158 else
159 return false;
160 }
161 public static bool operator !=(ZCT c1, ZCT c2)
162 {
163 if (c1.Z != c2.Z || c1.C != c2.C || c1.T != c2.T)
164 return false;
165 else
166 return true;
167 }
168 public override string ToString()
169 {
170 return Z + "," + C + "," + T;
171 }
172 }
173 public struct ZCTXY
174 {
175 public int Z { get; set; }
176 public int C { get; set; }
177 public int T { get; set; }
178 public int X { get; set; }
179 public int Y { get; set; }
180 /* A constructor for a class called ZCTXY. */
181 public ZCTXY(int z, int c, int t, int x, int y)
182 {
183 Z = z;
184 C = c;
185 T = t;
186 X = x;
187 Y = y;
188 }
189 public override string ToString()
190 {
191 return Z + "," + C + "," + T + "," + X + "," + Y;
192 }
193
194 public static bool operator ==(ZCTXY c1, ZCTXY c2)
195 {
196 if (c1.Z == c2.Z && c1.C == c2.C && c1.T == c2.T && c1.X == c2.X && c1.Y == c2.Y)
197 return true;
198 else
199 return false;
200 }
201 public static bool operator !=(ZCTXY c1, ZCTXY c2)
202 {
203 if (c1.Z != c2.Z || c1.C != c2.C || c1.T != c2.T || c1.X != c2.X || c1.Y != c2.Y)
204 return false;
205 else
206 return true;
207 }
208 }
209 /* A struct that is used to store the resolution of an image. */
210 public struct Resolution
211 {
212 int x;
213 int y;
214 PixelFormat format;
215 double px, py, pz, sx, sy, sz;
216 public int SizeX
217 {
218 get { return x; }
219 set { x = value; }
220 }
221 public int SizeY
222 {
223 get { return y; }
224 set { y = value; }
225 }
226 public double PhysicalSizeX
227 {
228 get { return px; }
229 set { px = value; }
230 }
231 public double PhysicalSizeY
232 {
233 get { return py; }
234 set { py = value; }
235 }
236 public double PhysicalSizeZ
237 {
238 get { return pz; }
239 set { pz = value; }
240 }
241 public double StageSizeX
242 {
243 get { return sx; }
244 set { sx = value; }
245 }
246 public double StageSizeY
247 {
248 get { return sy; }
249 set { sy = value; }
250 }
251 public double StageSizeZ
252 {
253 get { return sz; }
254 set { sz = value; }
255 }
256 public double VolumeWidth
257 {
258 get
259 {
260 return PhysicalSizeX * SizeX;
261 }
262 }
263 public double VolumeHeight
264 {
265 get
266 {
267 return PhysicalSizeY * SizeY;
268 }
269 }
270 public PixelFormat PixelFormat
271 {
272 get { return format; }
273 set { format = value; }
274 }
275 public int RGBChannelsCount
276 {
277 get
278 {
279 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
280 return 1;
281 else if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
282 return 3;
283 else
284 return 4;
285 }
286 }
287 public long SizeInBytes
288 {
289 get
290 {
291 if (format == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
292 return (long)y * (long)x;
293 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
294 return (long)y * (long)x * 2;
295 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
296 return (long)y * (long)x * 3;
297 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb || format == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
298 return (long)y * (long)x * 4;
299 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb || format == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
300 return (long)y * (long)x * 6;
301 throw new NotSupportedException(format + " is not supported.");
302 }
303 }
304 public Resolution(int w, int h, int omePx, int bitsPerPixel, double physX, double physY, double physZ, double stageX, double stageY, double stageZ)
305 {
306 x = w;
307 y = h;
308 sx = stageX;
309 sy = stageY;
310 sz = stageZ;
311 format = BioImage.GetPixelFormat(omePx, bitsPerPixel);
312 px = physX;
313 py = physY;
314 pz = physZ;
315 }
316 public Resolution(int w, int h, PixelFormat f, double physX, double physY, double physZ, double stageX, double stageY, double stageZ)
317 {
318 x = w;
319 y = h;
320 format = f;
321 sx = stageX;
322 sy = stageY;
323 sz = stageZ;
324 px = physX;
325 py = physY;
326 pz = physZ;
327 }
328 public Resolution Copy()
329 {
330 return new Resolution(x, y, format, px, py, pz, sx, sy, sz);
331 }
332 public override string ToString()
333 {
334 return "(" + x + ", " + y + ") " + format.ToString() + " " + (SizeInBytes / 1000) + " KB";
335 }
336 }
337 public enum RGB
338 {
339 R,
340 G,
341 B,
342 Gray
343 }
344 public struct ColorS : IDisposable
345 {
346 internal byte[] bytes;
347 public ColorS(ushort s)
348 {
349 bytes = new byte[6];
350 R = s;
351 G = s;
352 B = s;
353 }
354 public ColorS(ushort r, ushort g, ushort b)
355 {
356 bytes = new byte[6];
357 R = r;
358 G = g;
359 B = b;
360 }
361 public float Rf
362 {
363 get { return (float)R / (float)ushort.MaxValue; }
364 set
365 {
366 Byte[] bt = BitConverter.GetBytes(value * ushort.MaxValue);
367 bytes[4] = bt[1];
368 bytes[5] = bt[0];
369 }
370 }
371 public float Gf
372 {
373 get { return (float)G / (float)ushort.MaxValue; }
374 set
375 {
376 Byte[] bt = BitConverter.GetBytes(value * ushort.MaxValue);
377 bytes[2] = bt[1];
378 bytes[3] = bt[0];
379 }
380 }
381 public float Bf
382 {
383 get { return (float)B / (float)ushort.MaxValue; }
384 set
385 {
386 Byte[] bt = BitConverter.GetBytes(value * ushort.MaxValue);
387 bytes[0] = bt[1];
388 bytes[1] = bt[0];
389 }
390 }
391 public ushort R
392 {
393 get { return BitConverter.ToUInt16(bytes, 0); }
394 set
395 {
396 byte[] bt = BitConverter.GetBytes(value);
397 bytes[0] = bt[0];
398 bytes[1] = bt[1];
399 }
400 }
401 public ushort G
402 {
403 get { return BitConverter.ToUInt16(bytes, 2); }
404 set
405 {
406 byte[] bt = BitConverter.GetBytes(value);
407 bytes[2] = bt[0];
408 bytes[3] = bt[1];
409 }
410 }
411 public ushort B
412 {
413 get { return BitConverter.ToUInt16(bytes, 4); }
414 set
415 {
416 byte[] bt = BitConverter.GetBytes(value);
417 bytes[4] = bt[0];
418 bytes[5] = bt[1];
419 }
420 }
421 public byte[] Bytes { get { return bytes; } }
422 public static ColorS FromColor(System.Drawing.Color col)
423 {
424 float r = (((float)col.R) / 255) * ushort.MaxValue;
425 float g = (((float)col.G) / 255) * ushort.MaxValue;
426 float b = (((float)col.B) / 255) * ushort.MaxValue;
427 ColorS color = ColorS.FromVector(r, g, b);
428 return color;
429 }
430 public static ColorS FromVector(float x, float y, float z)
431 {
432 ColorS color = new ColorS();
433 color.bytes = new byte[6];
434 color.Rf = x;
435 color.Gf = y;
436 color.Bf = z;
437 return color;
438 }
444 public byte[] GetBytes(PixelFormat px)
445 {
446 if (px == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
447 {
448 byte[] bt = new byte[1];
449 bt[0] = (byte)R;
450 return bt;
451 }
452 else
453 if (px == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
454 {
455 return BitConverter.GetBytes(R);
456 }
457 else
458 if (px == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
459 {
460 byte[] bt = new byte[3];
461 bt[0] = (byte)B;
462 bt[1] = (byte)G;
463 bt[2] = (byte)R;
464 return bt;
465 }
466 else
467 if (px == PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb || px == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
468 {
469 byte[] bt = new byte[4];
470 bt[0] = 255;
471 bt[1] = (byte)R;
472 bt[2] = (byte)G;
473 bt[3] = (byte)B;
474 return bt;
475 }
476 else
477 if (px == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
478 {
479 return bytes;
480 }
481 throw new InvalidDataException("Pixel format: " + px.ToString() + " is not supported");
482
483 }
491 public static System.Drawing.Color ToColor(ColorS col, int bitsPerPixel)
492 {
493 if (bitsPerPixel == 8)
494 {
495 System.Drawing.Color c = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb((byte)col.R, (byte)col.G, (byte)col.B);
496 return c;
497 }
498 else
499 {
500 int r = (int)(((float)col.R / 65535) * 255);
501 int g = (int)(((float)col.G / 65535) * 255);
502 int b = (int)(((float)col.B / 65535) * 255);
503 System.Drawing.Color c = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb((byte)r, (byte)g, (byte)b);
504 return c;
505 }
506 }
507 public SharpDX.Vector4 ToVector()
508 {
509 return new SharpDX.Vector4(Rf, Gf, Bf, 1.0f);
510 }
511 public override string ToString()
512 {
513 return R + "," + G + "," + B;
514 }
515 public override bool Equals(object obj)
516 {
517 ColorS s = (ColorS)obj;
518 if (s.R == R && s.G == G && s.B == B)
519 return true;
520 else
521 return false;
522 }
523 public static ColorS operator /(ColorS a, ColorS b)
524 {
525 return new ColorS((ushort)(a.Rf / b.Rf), (ushort)(a.Gf / b.Gf), (ushort)(a.Bf / b.Bf));
526 }
527 public static ColorS operator *(ColorS a, ColorS b)
528 {
529 return new ColorS((ushort)(a.Rf * b.Rf), (ushort)(a.Gf * b.Gf), (ushort)(a.Bf * b.Bf));
530 }
531 public static ColorS operator +(ColorS a, ColorS b)
532 {
533 return new ColorS((ushort)(a.Rf + b.Rf), (ushort)(a.Gf + b.Gf), (ushort)(a.Bf + b.Bf));
534 }
535 public static ColorS operator -(ColorS a, ColorS b)
536 {
537 return new ColorS((ushort)(a.Rf - b.Rf), (ushort)(a.Gf - b.Gf), (ushort)(a.Bf - b.Bf));
538 }
539 public static ColorS operator /(ColorS a, float b)
540 {
541 return ColorS.FromVector(a.Rf / b, a.Gf / b, a.Bf / b);
542 }
543 public static ColorS operator *(ColorS a, float b)
544 {
545 return ColorS.FromVector(a.Rf * b, a.Gf * b, a.Bf * b);
546 }
547 public static ColorS operator +(ColorS a, float b)
548 {
549 return ColorS.FromVector(a.Rf + b, a.Gf + b, a.Bf + b);
550 }
551 public static ColorS operator -(ColorS a, float b)
552 {
553 return ColorS.FromVector(a.Rf - b, a.Gf - b, a.Bf - b);
554 }
555 public static bool operator ==(ColorS a, ColorS b)
556 {
557 if (a.R == b.R && a.G == b.G && a.B == b.B)
558 return true;
559 else
560 return false;
561 }
562 public static bool operator !=(ColorS a, ColorS b)
563 {
564 if (a.R == b.R && a.G == b.G && a.B == b.B)
565 return false;
566 else
567 return true;
568 }
569 public void Dispose()
570 {
571 bytes = null;
572 }
573 }
574 public struct RectangleD
575 {
576 private double x;
577 private double y;
578 private double w;
579 private double h;
580 public double X { get { return x; } set { x = value; } }
581 public double Y { get { return y; } set { y = value; } }
582 public double W { get { return w; } set { w = value; } }
583 public double H { get { return h; } set { h = value; } }
584
585 /* Creating a new rectangle with the given parameters. */
586 public RectangleD(double X, double Y, double W, double H)
587 {
588 x = X;
589 y = Y;
590 w = W;
591 h = H;
592 }
593 public System.Drawing.Rectangle ToRectangleInt()
594 {
595 return new System.Drawing.Rectangle((int)X, (int)Y, (int)W, (int)H);
596 }
603 public bool IntersectsWith(RectangleD p)
604 {
605 if (IntersectsWith(p.X, p.Y) || IntersectsWith(p.X + p.W, p.Y) || IntersectsWith(p.X, p.Y + p.H) || IntersectsWith(p.X + p.W, p.Y + p.H))
606 return true;
607 else
608 return false;
609 }
610 public bool IntersectsWith(PointD p)
611 {
612 return IntersectsWith(p.X, p.Y);
613 }
620 public bool IntersectsWith(double x, double y)
621 {
622 if (X <= x && (X + W) >= x && Y <= y && (Y + H) >= y)
623 return true;
624 else
625 return false;
626 }
627 public RectangleF ToRectangleF()
628 {
629 return new RectangleF((float)X, (float)Y, (float)W, (float)H);
630 }
631 public override string ToString()
632 {
633 return X.ToString() + ", " + Y.ToString() + ", " + W.ToString() + ", " + H.ToString();
634 }
635
636 }
637 public class ROI
638 {
639 public enum Type
640 {
641 Rectangle,
642 Point,
643 Line,
644 Polygon,
645 Polyline,
646 Freeform,
647 Ellipse,
648 Label
649 }
650 /* A property of a class. */
651 public PointD Point
652 {
653 get
654 {
655 if (Points.Count == 0)
656 return new PointD(0, 0);
657 if (type == Type.Line || type == Type.Ellipse || type == Type.Label || type == Type.Freeform)
658 return new PointD(BoundingBox.X, BoundingBox.Y);
659 return Points[0];
660 }
661 set
662 {
663 if (Points.Count == 0)
664 {
665 AddPoint(value);
666 }
667 else
668 UpdatePoint(value, 0);
669 UpdateBoundingBox();
670 }
671 }
672 /* A property of a class. */
673 public RectangleD Rect
674 {
675 get
676 {
677 if (Points.Count == 0)
678 return new RectangleD(0, 0, 0, 0);
679 if (type == Type.Line || type == Type.Polyline || type == Type.Polygon || type == Type.Freeform || type == Type.Label)
680 return BoundingBox;
681 if (type == Type.Rectangle || type == Type.Ellipse)
682 return new RectangleD(Points[0].X, Points[0].Y, Points[1].X - Points[0].X, Points[2].Y - Points[0].Y);
683 else
684 return new RectangleD(Points[0].X, Points[0].Y, 1, 1);
685 }
686 set
687 {
688 if (type == Type.Line || type == Type.Polyline || type == Type.Polygon || type == Type.Freeform)
689 {
690 BoundingBox = value;
691 }
692 else
693 if (Points.Count < 4 && (type == Type.Rectangle || type == Type.Ellipse))
694 {
695 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X, value.Y));
696 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y));
697 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X, value.Y + value.H));
698 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y + value.H));
699 }
700 else
701 if (type == Type.Rectangle || type == Type.Ellipse)
702 {
703 Points[0] = new PointD(value.X, value.Y);
704 Points[1] = new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y);
705 Points[2] = new PointD(value.X, value.Y + value.H);
706 Points[3] = new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y + value.H);
707 }
708 UpdateBoundingBox();
709 }
710 }
711 /* A property of a class. */
712 public double X
713 {
714 get
715 {
716 return Point.X;
717 }
718 set
719 {
720 Rect = new RectangleD(value, Y, W, H);
721 Recorder.AddLine("App.AddROI(" + BioImage.ROIToString(this) + ");");
722 }
723 }
724 /* A property of a class. */
725 public double Y
726 {
727 get
728 {
729 return Point.Y;
730 }
731 set
732 {
733 Rect = new RectangleD(X, value, W, H);
734 Recorder.AddLine("App.AddROI(" + BioImage.ROIToString(this) + ");");
735 }
736 }
737 public double W
738 {
739 get
740 {
741 if (type == Type.Point)
742 return strokeWidth;
743 else
744 return BoundingBox.W;
745 }
746 set
747 {
748 Rect = new RectangleD(X, Y, value, H);
749 Recorder.AddLine("App.AddROI(" + BioImage.ROIToString(this) + ");");
750 }
751 }
752 public double H
753 {
754 get
755 {
756 if (type == Type.Point)
757 return strokeWidth;
758 else
759 return BoundingBox.H;
760 }
761 set
762 {
763 Rect = new RectangleD(X, Y, W, value);
764 Recorder.AddLine("App.AddROI(" + BioImage.ROIToString(this) + ");");
765 }
766 }
767
768 public Type type;
769 public static float selectBoxSize = 8f;
770 private List<PointD> Points = new List<PointD>();
771 public List<PointD> PointsD
772 {
773 get
774 {
775 return Points;
776 }
777 }
778 private List<RectangleD> selectBoxs = new List<RectangleD>();
779 public List<int> selectedPoints = new List<int>();
780 public RectangleD BoundingBox;
781 public Font font = System.Drawing.SystemFonts.DefaultFont;
782 public ZCT coord;
783 public System.Drawing.Color strokeColor;
784 public System.Drawing.Color fillColor;
785 public bool isFilled = false;
786 public string id = "";
787 public string roiID = "";
788 public string roiName = "";
789 public int serie = 0;
790 private string text = "";
791 public string properties;
792 public double strokeWidth = 1;
793 public int shapeIndex = 0;
794 public bool closed = false;
795 public bool selected = false;
796 public PointD[] PointsImage
797 {
798 get
799 {
800 return ImageView.SelectedImage.ToImageSpace(PointsD);
801 }
802 }
806 public ROI Copy()
807 {
808 ROI copy = new ROI();
809 copy.id = id;
810 copy.roiID = roiID;
811 copy.roiName = roiName;
812 copy.text = text;
813 copy.strokeWidth = strokeWidth;
814 copy.strokeColor = strokeColor;
815 copy.fillColor = fillColor;
816 copy.Points = Points;
817 copy.selected = selected;
818 copy.shapeIndex = shapeIndex;
819 copy.closed = closed;
820 copy.font = font;
821 copy.selectBoxs = selectBoxs;
822 copy.BoundingBox = BoundingBox;
823 copy.isFilled = isFilled;
824 copy.coord = coord;
825 copy.selectedPoints = selectedPoints;
826
827 return copy;
828 }
834 public ROI Copy(ZCT cord)
835 {
836 ROI copy = new ROI();
837 copy.type = type;
838 copy.id = id;
839 copy.roiID = roiID;
840 copy.roiName = roiName;
841 copy.text = text;
842 copy.strokeWidth = strokeWidth;
843 copy.strokeColor = strokeColor;
844 copy.fillColor = fillColor;
845 copy.Points.AddRange(Points);
846 copy.selected = selected;
847 copy.shapeIndex = shapeIndex;
848 copy.closed = closed;
849 copy.font = font;
850 copy.selectBoxs.AddRange(selectBoxs);
851 copy.BoundingBox = BoundingBox;
852 copy.isFilled = isFilled;
853 copy.coord = cord;
854 copy.selectedPoints = selectedPoints;
855 return copy;
856 }
857 /* A property of a class. */
858 public string Text
859 {
860 get
861 {
862 return text;
863 }
864 set
865 {
866 text = value;
867 if (type == Type.Label)
868 {
869 UpdateBoundingBox();
870 }
871 }
872 }
873 public Size TextSize
874 {
875 get
876 {
877 return TextRenderer.MeasureText(text, font);
878 }
879 }
880 public ROI()
881 {
882 coord = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
883 strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.Yellow;
884 font = SystemFonts.DefaultFont;
885 BoundingBox = new RectangleD(0, 0, 1, 1);
886 }
893 public RectangleD GetSelectBound(double scaleX, double scaleY)
894 {
895 double fx = scaleX / 2;
896 double fy = scaleY / 2;
897 return new RectangleD(BoundingBox.X - fx, BoundingBox.Y - fy, BoundingBox.W + scaleX, BoundingBox.H + scaleY);
898 }
903 public RectangleD[] GetSelectBoxes()
904 {
905 selectBoxs.Clear();
906 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
907 {
908 selectBoxs.Add(new RectangleD((Points[i].X), (Points[i].Y), ROI.selectBoxSize, ROI.selectBoxSize));
909 }
910 return selectBoxs.ToArray();
911 }
918 public RectangleD[] GetSelectBoxes(double s)
919 {
920 double f = s / 2;
921 selectBoxs.Clear();
922 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
923 {
924 selectBoxs.Add(new RectangleD((float)(Points[i].X - f), (float)(Points[i].Y - f), (float)s, (float)s));
925 }
926 return selectBoxs.ToArray();
927 }
935 public static ROI CreatePoint(ZCT coord, double x, double y)
936 {
937 ROI an = new ROI();
938 an.coord = coord;
939 an.AddPoint(new PointD(x, y));
940 an.type = Type.Point;
941 Recorder.AddLine("ROI.CreatePoint(new ZCT(" + coord.Z + "," + coord.C + "," + coord.T + "), " + x + "," + y + ");");
942 return an;
943 }
954 public static ROI CreatePoint(int s, int z, int c, int t, double x, double y)
955 {
956 return CreatePoint(new ZCT(z, c, t), x, y);
957 }
965 public static ROI CreateLine(ZCT coord, PointD x1, PointD x2)
966 {
967 ROI an = new ROI();
968 an.coord = coord;
969 an.type = Type.Line;
970 an.AddPoint(x1);
971 an.AddPoint(x2);
972 Recorder.AddLine("ROI.CreateLine(new ZCT(" + coord.Z + "," + coord.C + "," + coord.T + "), new PointD(" + x1.X + "," + x1.Y + "), new PointD(" + x2.X + "," + x2.Y + "));");
973 return an;
974 }
984 public static ROI CreateRectangle(ZCT coord, double x, double y, double w, double h)
985 {
986 ROI an = new ROI();
987 an.coord = coord;
988 an.type = Type.Rectangle;
989 an.Rect = new RectangleD(x, y, w, h);
990 Recorder.AddLine("ROI.CreateRectangle(new ZCT(" + coord.Z + "," + coord.C + "," + coord.T + "), new RectangleD(" + x + "," + y + "," + w + "," + h + ");");
991 return an;
992 }
1002 public static ROI CreateEllipse(ZCT coord, double x, double y, double w, double h)
1003 {
1004 ROI an = new ROI();
1005 an.coord = coord;
1006 an.type = Type.Ellipse;
1007 an.Rect = new RectangleD(x, y, w, h);
1008 Recorder.AddLine("ROI.CreateEllipse(new ZCT(" + coord.Z + "," + coord.C + "," + coord.T + "), new RectangleD(" + x + "," + y + "," + w + "," + h + ");");
1009 return an;
1010 }
1017 public static ROI CreatePolygon(ZCT coord, PointD[] pts)
1018 {
1019 ROI an = new ROI();
1020 an.coord = coord;
1021 an.type = Type.Polygon;
1022 an.AddPoints(pts);
1023 an.closed = true;
1024 return an;
1025 }
1032 public static ROI CreateFreeform(ZCT coord, PointD[] pts)
1033 {
1034 ROI an = new ROI();
1035 an.coord = coord;
1036 an.type = Type.Freeform;
1037 an.AddPoints(pts);
1038 an.closed = true;
1039 return an;
1040 }
1045 public void UpdatePoint(PointD p, int i)
1046 {
1047 if (i < Points.Count)
1048 {
1049 Points[i] = p;
1050 }
1051 UpdateBoundingBox();
1052 }
1058 public PointD GetPoint(int i)
1059 {
1060 return Points[i];
1061 }
1065 public PointD[] GetPoints()
1066 {
1067 return Points.ToArray();
1068 }
1072 public System.Drawing.PointF[] GetPointsF()
1073 {
1074 PointF[] pfs = new PointF[Points.Count];
1075 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
1076 {
1077 pfs[i].X = (float)Points[i].X;
1078 pfs[i].Y = (float)Points[i].Y;
1079 }
1080 return pfs;
1081 }
1085 public void AddPoint(PointD p)
1086 {
1087 Points.Add(p);
1088 UpdateBoundingBox();
1089 }
1093 public void AddPoints(PointD[] p)
1094 {
1095 Points.AddRange(p);
1096 UpdateBoundingBox();
1097 }
1101 public void AddPoints(float[] xp, float[] yp)
1102 {
1103 for (int i = 0; i < xp.Length; i++)
1104 {
1105 Points.Add(new PointD(xp[i], yp[i]));
1106 }
1107 UpdateBoundingBox();
1108 }
1112 public void AddPoints(int[] xp, int[] yp)
1113 {
1114 for (int i = 0; i < xp.Length; i++)
1115 {
1116 Points.Add(new PointD(xp[i], yp[i]));
1117 }
1118 UpdateBoundingBox();
1119 }
1123 public void RemovePoints(int[] indexs)
1124 {
1125 List<PointD> inds = new List<PointD>();
1126 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
1127 {
1128 bool found = false;
1129 for (int ind = 0; ind < indexs.Length; ind++)
1130 {
1131 if (indexs[ind] == i)
1132 found = true;
1133 }
1134 if (!found)
1135 inds.Add(Points[i]);
1136 }
1137 Points = inds;
1138 UpdateBoundingBox();
1139 }
1143 public int GetPointCount()
1144 {
1145 return Points.Count;
1146 }
1152 public PointD[] stringToPoints(string s)
1153 {
1154 List<PointD> pts = new List<PointD>();
1155 string[] ints = s.Split(' ');
1156 for (int i = 0; i < ints.Length; i++)
1157 {
1158 string[] sints;
1159 if (s.Contains("\t"))
1160 sints = ints[i].Split('\t');
1161 else
1162 sints = ints[i].Split(',');
1163 double x = double.Parse(sints[0]);
1164 double y = double.Parse(sints[1]);
1165 pts.Add(new PointD(x, y));
1166 }
1167 return pts.ToArray();
1168 }
1174 public string PointsToString(BioImage b)
1175 {
1176 string pts = "";
1177 PointD[] ps = b.ToImageSpace(Points);
1178 for (int j = 0; j < ps.Length; j++)
1179 {
1180 if (j == ps.Length - 1)
1181 pts += ps[j].X.ToString() + "," + ps[j].Y.ToString();
1182 else
1183 pts += ps[j].X.ToString() + "," + ps[j].Y.ToString() + " ";
1184 }
1185 return pts;
1186 }
1189 public void UpdateBoundingBox()
1190 {
1191 if (type == Type.Label)
1192 {
1193 if (text != "")
1194 {
1195 Size s = TextSize;
1196 BoundingBox = new RectangleD(Points[0].X, Points[0].Y, s.Width, s.Height);
1197 }
1198 }
1199 else
1200 {
1201 PointD min = new PointD(double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue);
1202 PointD max = new PointD(double.MinValue, double.MinValue);
1203 foreach (PointD p in Points)
1204 {
1205 if (min.X > p.X)
1206 min.X = p.X;
1207 if (min.Y > p.Y)
1208 min.Y = p.Y;
1209
1210 if (max.X < p.X)
1211 max.X = p.X;
1212 if (max.Y < p.Y)
1213 max.Y = p.Y;
1214 }
1215 RectangleD r = new RectangleD();
1216 r.X = min.X;
1217 r.Y = min.Y;
1218 r.W = max.X - min.X;
1219 r.H = max.Y - min.Y;
1220 if (r.W == 0)
1221 r.W = 1;
1222 if (r.H == 0)
1223 r.H = 1;
1224 BoundingBox = r;
1225 }
1226 }
1232 public override string ToString()
1233 {
1234 return type.ToString() + ", " + Text + " (" + W + ", " + H + "); " + " (" + Point.X + ", " + Point.Y + ") " + coord.ToString();
1235 }
1236 }
1237 public class Channel : IDisposable
1238 {
1239 public IntRange[] range;
1240 public ChannelInfo info;
1241 public Statistics[] stats;
1242 private ome.xml.model.enums.ContrastMethod contrastMethod = null;
1243 private ome.xml.model.enums.IlluminationType illuminationType = null;
1244 private ome.xml.model.enums.AcquisitionMode acquisitionMode = null;
1245 private int index;
1246 [Serializable]
1247 public struct ChannelInfo
1248 {
1249 internal string name;
1250 internal string ID;
1251 internal int index;
1252 internal string fluor;
1253 internal int samplesPerPixel;
1254 internal System.Drawing.Color? color;
1255 internal int emission;
1256 internal int excitation;
1257 internal int exposure;
1258 internal string lightSource;
1259 internal double lightSourceIntensity;
1260 internal int lightSourceWavelength;
1261 internal string contrastMethod;
1262 internal string illuminationType;
1263 internal int bitsPerPixel;
1264 internal int min, max;
1265 internal string diodeName;
1266 internal string lightSourceAttenuation;
1267 internal string acquisitionMode;
1268 public string Name
1269 {
1270 get { return name; }
1271 set { name = value; }
1272 }
1273 public int Index
1274 {
1275 get
1276 {
1277 return index;
1278 }
1279 set
1280 {
1281 index = value;
1282 }
1283
1284 }
1285 public int Min
1286 {
1287 get
1288 {
1289 return min;
1290 }
1291 set
1292 {
1293 if (value <= 0)
1294 {
1295 max = 0;
1296 return;
1297 }
1298 if (value > ushort.MaxValue)
1299 min = 0;
1300 else
1301 min = value;
1302 }
1303 }
1304 public int Max
1305 {
1306 get
1307 {
1308 return max;
1309 }
1310 set
1311 {
1312 if (value <= 0)
1313 {
1314 max = 1;
1315 return;
1316 }
1317 if (value > ushort.MaxValue)
1318 max = ushort.MaxValue;
1319 else
1320 max = value;
1321
1322 }
1323 }
1324 public string Fluor
1325 {
1326 get { return fluor; }
1327 set { fluor = value; }
1328 }
1329 public int SamplesPerPixel
1330 {
1331 get { return samplesPerPixel; }
1332 set { samplesPerPixel = value; }
1333 }
1334 public System.Drawing.Color? Color
1335 {
1336 get { return color; }
1337 set { color = value; }
1338 }
1339 public int Emission
1340 {
1341 get { return emission; }
1342 set { emission = value; }
1343 }
1344 public int Excitation
1345 {
1346 get { return excitation; }
1347 set { excitation = value; }
1348 }
1349 public int Exposure
1350 {
1351 get { return exposure; }
1352 set { exposure = value; }
1353 }
1354 public string LightSource
1355 {
1356 get { return lightSource; }
1357 set { lightSource = value; }
1358 }
1359 public double LightSourceIntensity
1360 {
1361 get { return lightSourceIntensity; }
1362 set { lightSourceIntensity = value; }
1363 }
1364 public int LightSourceWavelength
1365 {
1366 get { return lightSourceWavelength; }
1367 set { lightSourceWavelength = value; }
1368 }
1369 public string ContrastMethod
1370 {
1371 get
1372 {
1373 if (contrastMethod == null)
1374 return ome.xml.model.enums.ContrastMethod.BRIGHTFIELD.ToString();
1375 return contrastMethod;
1376 }
1377 set
1378 {
1379 contrastMethod = value;
1380 }
1381 }
1382 public string IlluminationType
1383 {
1384 get
1385 {
1386 if (illuminationType == null)
1387 return ome.xml.model.enums.IlluminationType.OTHER.ToString();
1388 return illuminationType;
1389 }
1390 set
1391 {
1392 illuminationType = value;
1393 }
1394 }
1395 public string DiodeName
1396 {
1397 get { return diodeName; }
1398 set
1399 {
1400 diodeName = value;
1401 }
1402 }
1403 public string LightSourceAttenuation
1404 {
1405 get { return lightSourceAttenuation; }
1406 set
1407 {
1408 lightSourceAttenuation = value;
1409 }
1410 }
1411 public string AcquisitionMode
1412 {
1413 get
1414 {
1415 if (acquisitionMode == null)
1416 return ome.xml.model.enums.AcquisitionMode.WIDEFIELD.ToString();
1417 return acquisitionMode;
1418 }
1419 set
1420 {
1421 acquisitionMode = value;
1422 }
1423 }
1424 }
1430 public static System.Drawing.Color SpectralColor(double l) // RGB <0,1> <- lambda l <400,700> [nm]
1431 {
1432 double t;
1433 double r = 0;
1434 double g = 0;
1435 double b = 0;
1436 if ((l >= 400.0) && (l < 410.0)) { t = (l - 400.0) / (410.0 - 400.0); r = +(0.33 * t) - (0.20 * t * t); }
1437 else if ((l >= 410.0) && (l < 475.0)) { t = (l - 410.0) / (475.0 - 410.0); r = 0.14 - (0.13 * t * t); }
1438 else if ((l >= 545.0) && (l < 595.0)) { t = (l - 545.0) / (595.0 - 545.0); r = +(1.98 * t) - (t * t); }
1439 else if ((l >= 595.0) && (l < 650.0)) { t = (l - 595.0) / (650.0 - 595.0); r = 0.98 + (0.06 * t) - (0.40 * t * t); }
1440 else if ((l >= 650.0) && (l < 700.0)) { t = (l - 650.0) / (700.0 - 650.0); r = 0.65 - (0.84 * t) + (0.20 * t * t); }
1441 if ((l >= 415.0) && (l < 475.0)) { t = (l - 415.0) / (475.0 - 415.0); g = +(0.80 * t * t); }
1442 else if ((l >= 475.0) && (l < 590.0)) { t = (l - 475.0) / (590.0 - 475.0); g = 0.8 + (0.76 * t) - (0.80 * t * t); }
1443 else if ((l >= 585.0) && (l < 639.0)) { t = (l - 585.0) / (639.0 - 585.0); g = 0.84 - (0.84 * t); }
1444 if ((l >= 400.0) && (l < 475.0)) { t = (l - 400.0) / (475.0 - 400.0); b = +(2.20 * t) - (1.50 * t * t); }
1445 else if ((l >= 475.0) && (l < 560.0)) { t = (l - 475.0) / (560.0 - 475.0); b = 0.7 - (t) + (0.30 * t * t); }
1446 r *= 255;
1447 g *= 255;
1448 b *= 255;
1449 return System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(255, (int)r, (int)g, (int)b);
1450 }
1451 public string Name
1452 {
1453 get { return info.name; }
1454 set { info.name = value; }
1455 }
1456 public int Index
1457 {
1458 get
1459 {
1460 return index;
1461 }
1462 set
1463 {
1464 index = value;
1465 }
1466 }
1467 public IntRange RangeR
1468 {
1469 get
1470 {
1471 return range[0];
1472 }
1473 }
1474 public IntRange RangeG
1475 {
1476 get
1477 {
1478 if (range.Length > 1)
1479 return range[1];
1480 else
1481 return range[0];
1482 }
1483 }
1484 public IntRange RangeB
1485 {
1486 get
1487 {
1488 if (range.Length > 1)
1489 return range[2];
1490 else
1491 return range[0];
1492 }
1493 }
1494 public string Fluor
1495 {
1496 get { return info.fluor; }
1497 set { info.fluor = value; }
1498 }
1499 public int SamplesPerPixel
1500 {
1501 get { return info.samplesPerPixel; }
1502 set
1503 {
1504 info.samplesPerPixel = value;
1505 range = new IntRange[info.samplesPerPixel];
1506 }
1507 }
1508 public System.Drawing.Color? Color
1509 {
1510 get { return info.color; }
1511 set { info.color = value; }
1512 }
1513 public System.Drawing.Color EmissionColor
1514 {
1515 get { return SpectralColor(Emission); }
1516 }
1517 public int Emission
1518 {
1519 get { return info.emission; }
1520 set { info.emission = value; }
1521 }
1522 public int Excitation
1523 {
1524 get { return info.excitation; }
1525 set { info.excitation = value; }
1526 }
1527 public int Exposure
1528 {
1529 get { return info.exposure; }
1530 set { info.exposure = value; }
1531 }
1532 public string LightSource
1533 {
1534 get { return info.lightSource; }
1535 set { info.lightSource = value; }
1536 }
1537 public double LightSourceIntensity
1538 {
1539 get { return info.lightSourceIntensity; }
1540 set { info.lightSourceIntensity = value; }
1541 }
1542 public int LightSourceWavelength
1543 {
1544 get { return info.lightSourceWavelength; }
1545 set { info.lightSourceWavelength = value; }
1546 }
1547 public string LightSourceAttenuation
1548 {
1549 get { return info.lightSourceAttenuation; }
1550 set { info.lightSourceAttenuation = value; }
1551 }
1552 public string DiodeName
1553 {
1554 get { return info.diodeName; }
1555 set { info.diodeName = value; }
1556 }
1557 public ome.xml.model.enums.ContrastMethod ContrastMethod
1558 {
1559 get { return contrastMethod; }
1560 set
1561 {
1562 contrastMethod = value;
1563 }
1564 }
1565 public ome.xml.model.enums.IlluminationType IlluminationType
1566 {
1567 get { return illuminationType; }
1568 set { illuminationType = value; }
1569 }
1570 public ome.xml.model.enums.AcquisitionMode AcquisitionMode
1571 {
1572 get { return acquisitionMode; }
1573 set { acquisitionMode = value; }
1574 }
1575
1576 public int BitsPerPixel
1577 {
1578 get { return info.bitsPerPixel; }
1579 set { info.bitsPerPixel = value; }
1580 }
1581 public Channel(int ind, int bitsPerPixel, int samples)
1582 {
1583 info = new ChannelInfo();
1584 if (bitsPerPixel == 16)
1585 info.Max = 65535;
1586 if (bitsPerPixel == 14)
1587 info.Max = 16383;
1588 if (bitsPerPixel == 12)
1589 info.Max = 4096;
1590 if (bitsPerPixel == 10)
1591 info.Max = 1024;
1592 if (bitsPerPixel == 8)
1593 info.Max = byte.MaxValue;
1594 info.samplesPerPixel = samples;
1595 range = new IntRange[info.SamplesPerPixel];
1596 for (int i = 0; i < range.Length; i++)
1597 {
1598 range[i] = new IntRange(0, info.Max);
1599 }
1600 info.min = 0;
1601 info.bitsPerPixel = bitsPerPixel;
1602 info.Name = ind.ToString();
1603 contrastMethod = ome.xml.model.enums.ContrastMethod.BRIGHTFIELD;
1604 illuminationType = ome.xml.model.enums.IlluminationType.TRANSMITTED;
1605 info.Fluor = "None";
1606 info.LightSource = "Unknown";
1607 info.diodeName = "LED";
1608 info.lightSourceAttenuation = "1.0";
1609 info.LightSource = null;
1610 Index = ind;
1611 }
1612 public Channel Copy()
1613 {
1614 Channel c = new Channel(info.index, info.bitsPerPixel, SamplesPerPixel);
1615 c.Name = Name;
1616 c.info.ID = info.ID;
1617 c.range = range;
1618 c.info.color = info.color;
1619 c.Fluor = Fluor;
1620 c.SamplesPerPixel = SamplesPerPixel;
1621 c.Emission = Emission;
1622 c.Excitation = Excitation;
1623 c.Exposure = Exposure;
1624 c.LightSource = LightSource;
1625 c.LightSourceIntensity = LightSourceIntensity;
1626 c.LightSourceWavelength = LightSourceWavelength;
1627 c.contrastMethod = contrastMethod;
1628 c.illuminationType = illuminationType;
1629 c.DiodeName = DiodeName;
1630 c.LightSourceAttenuation = LightSourceAttenuation;
1631 return c;
1632 }
1633 public override string ToString()
1634 {
1635 if (Name == "")
1636 return index.ToString();
1637 else
1638 return index + ", " + Name;
1639 }
1640 public void Dispose()
1641 {
1642 if (stats != null)
1643 {
1644 for (int i = 0; i < stats.Length; i++)
1645 {
1646 if (stats[i] != null)
1647 stats[i].Dispose();
1648 }
1649 }
1650 }
1651 }
1652 public class Plane
1653 {
1654 private double exposure;
1655 private ZCT coordinate;
1656 private double delta;
1657 private Point3D location;
1658 public double Exposure
1659 {
1660 get { return exposure; }
1661 set { exposure = value; }
1662 }
1663 public ZCT Coordinate
1664 {
1665 get { return coordinate; }
1666 set { coordinate = value; }
1667 }
1668 public double Delta
1669 {
1670 get { return delta; }
1671 set { delta = value; }
1672 }
1673 public Point3D Location
1674 {
1675 get { return location; }
1676 set { location = value; }
1677 }
1678 }
1679 public class BufferInfo : IDisposable
1680 {
1681 public ushort GetValueRGB(int x, int y, int RGBChannel)
1682 {
1683 if (bytes == null)
1684 return 0;
1685 if (x >= SizeX || x < 0)
1686 x = 0;
1687 if (y >= SizeY || y < 0)
1688 y = 0;
1689 int stridex = SizeX;
1690 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
1691 {
1692 int index2 = ((y * stridex + x) * 2 * RGBChannelsCount) + (RGBChannel * 2);
1693 return BitConverter.ToUInt16(bytes, index2);
1694 }
1695 else
1696 {
1697 int stride = SizeX;
1698 int index = ((y * stridex + x) * RGBChannelsCount) + RGBChannel;
1699 return bytes[index];
1700 }
1701 }
1702 public ColorS GetPixel(int ix, int iy)
1703 {
1704 if (isRGB)
1705 return new ColorS(GetValueRGB(ix, iy, 0), GetValueRGB(ix, iy, 1), GetValueRGB(ix, iy, 2));
1706 else
1707 {
1708 ushort s = GetValueRGB(ix, iy, 0);
1709 return new ColorS(s, s, s);
1710 }
1711 }
1712 public void SetPixel(int ix, int iy, ColorS col)
1713 {
1714 if (isRGB)
1715 {
1716 SetColorRGB(ix, iy, col);
1717 }
1718 else
1719 SetValue(ix, iy, col.R);
1720 }
1726 public void SetValue(int x, int y, ushort value)
1727 {
1728 int stridex = SizeX;
1729 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
1730 {
1731 int index2 = ((y * stridex + x) * 2 * RGBChannelsCount);
1732 byte upper = (byte)(value >> 8);
1733 byte lower = (byte)(value & 0xff);
1734 bytes[index2] = upper;
1735 bytes[index2 + 1] = lower;
1736 }
1737 else
1738 {
1739 int index = (y * stridex + x) * RGBChannelsCount;
1740 bytes[index] = (byte)value;
1741 }
1742 }
1750 public void SetValueRGB(int ix, int iy, int RGBChannel, ushort value)
1751 {
1752 int x = ix;
1753 int y = iy;
1754 //We invert the RGB channel parameter since pixels are in BGR order.
1755 if (RGBChannel == 2)
1756 RGBChannel = 0;
1757 else
1758 if (RGBChannel == 0)
1759 RGBChannel = 2;
1760 int stridex = SizeX;
1761 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
1762 {
1763 int index2 = ((y * stridex + x) * 2 * RGBChannelsCount) + (RGBChannel * 2);
1764 byte upper = (byte)(value >> 8);
1765 byte lower = (byte)(value & 0xff);
1766 bytes[index2] = upper;
1767 bytes[index2 + 1] = lower;
1768 }
1769 else
1770 {
1771 int index = ((y * stridex + x) * RGBChannelsCount) + RGBChannel;
1772 bytes[index] = (byte)value;
1773 }
1774 }
1780 public void SetColorRGB(int ix, int iy, ColorS value)
1781 {
1782 int x = ix;
1783 int y = iy;
1784 int stridex = SizeX;
1785 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
1786 {
1787 int index2 = ((y * stridex + x) * 6);
1788 bytes[index2] = value.bytes[5];
1789 bytes[index2 + 1] = value.bytes[4];
1790 bytes[index2 + 2] = value.bytes[3];
1791 bytes[index2 + 3] = value.bytes[2];
1792 bytes[index2 + 4] = value.bytes[1];
1793 bytes[index2 + 5] = value.bytes[0];
1794 }
1795 else
1796 {
1797 int index2 = ((y * stridex + x) * RGBChannelsCount);
1798 bytes[index2 + 2] = (byte)value.R;
1799 bytes[index2 + 1] = (byte)value.G;
1800 bytes[index2] = (byte)value.B;
1801 }
1802 }
1810 public static string CreateID(string filepath, int index)
1811 {
1812 if (filepath == null)
1813 return "";
1814 const char sep = '/';
1815 filepath = filepath.Replace("\\", "/");
1816 string s = filepath + sep + 'i' + sep + index;
1817 return s;
1818 }
1819 public string ID;
1820 public string File
1821 {
1822 get { return file; }
1823 set { file = value; }
1824 }
1825 public int HashID
1826 {
1827 get
1828 {
1829 return ID.GetHashCode();
1830 }
1831 }
1832 public int SizeX, SizeY;
1833 public int Stride
1834 {
1835 get
1836 {
1837 int s = 0;
1838 if (pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
1839 s = SizeX;
1840 else
1841 if (pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
1842 s = SizeX * 2;
1843 else
1844 if (pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
1845 s = SizeX * 3;
1846 else
1847 if (pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb || pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
1848 s = SizeX * 4;
1849 else
1850 s = SizeX * 3 * 2;
1851 return s;
1852 }
1853 }
1854 public int PaddedStride
1855 {
1856 get
1857 {
1858 return GetStridePadded(Stride);
1859 }
1860 }
1861 public byte[] PaddedBuffer
1862 {
1863 get
1864 {
1865 return GetPaddedBuffer(Bytes, SizeX, SizeY, Stride, PixelFormat);
1866 }
1867 }
1868 public bool LittleEndian
1869 {
1870 get
1871 {
1872 return littleEndian;
1873 }
1874 set
1875 {
1876 littleEndian = value;
1877 }
1878 }
1879 public long Length
1880 {
1881 get
1882 {
1883 return bytes.Length;
1884 }
1885 }
1886 public int RGBChannelsCount
1887 {
1888 get
1889 {
1890 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
1891 return 3;
1892 else
1893 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
1894 return 1;
1895 else
1896 return 4;
1897 }
1898 }
1899 public int BitsPerPixel
1900 {
1901 get
1902 {
1903 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
1904 {
1905 return 16;
1906 }
1907 else
1908 return 8;
1909 }
1910 }
1911 public ZCT Coordinate;
1912 public PixelFormat PixelFormat
1913 {
1914 get
1915 {
1916 return pixelFormat;
1917 }
1918 set
1919 {
1920 pixelFormat = value;
1921 }
1922 }
1923 public byte[] Bytes
1924 {
1925 get { return bytes; }
1926 set
1927 {
1928 bytes = value;
1929 }
1930 }
1931 public byte[] PaddedBytes
1932 {
1933 get
1934 {
1935 return GetPaddedBuffer(bytes, SizeX, SizeY, Stride, PixelFormat);
1936 }
1937 }
1938 /* Converting a byte array to an image. */
1939 public Image Image
1940 {
1941 get
1942 {
1943 return GetBitmap(SizeX, SizeY, Stride, PixelFormat, Bytes);
1944 }
1945 set
1946 {
1947 Bitmap bitmap;
1948 bitmap = (Bitmap)value;
1949 if (!LittleEndian)
1950 bitmap.RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
1951 PixelFormat = value.PixelFormat;
1952 SizeX = value.Width;
1953 SizeY = value.Height;
1954 bytes = GetBuffer(bitmap, Stride);
1955 if (LittleEndian)
1956 Array.Reverse(bytes);
1957 bitmap.Dispose();
1958 bitmap = null;
1959 GC.Collect();
1960 }
1961 }
1962 /* Converting a bitmap to a byte array. */
1963 public Image ImageRGB
1964 {
1965 get
1966 {
1967 return GetBitmapRGB(SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat, Bytes);
1968 }
1969 set
1970 {
1971 Bitmap bitmap;
1972 bitmap = (Bitmap)value;
1973 if (!LittleEndian)
1974 bitmap.RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
1975 PixelFormat = value.PixelFormat;
1976 SizeX = value.Width;
1977 SizeY = value.Height;
1978 bytes = GetBuffer(bitmap, Stride);
1979 if (LittleEndian)
1980 Array.Reverse(bytes);
1981 bitmap.Dispose();
1982 bitmap = null;
1983 GC.Collect();
1984 }
1985 }
1986 public IntPtr RGBData
1987 {
1988 get
1989 {
1990 return GetRGBData(SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat, bytes);
1991 }
1992 }
1993 public Plane Plane
1994 {
1995 get { return plane; }
1996 set { plane = value; }
1997 }
1998 public int PixelFormatSize
1999 {
2000 get
2001 {
2002 if (pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2003 return 1;
2004 else if (pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
2005 return 2;
2006 else if (pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2007 return 3;
2008 else if (pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb || pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
2009 return 4;
2010 else if (pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2011 return 6;
2012 throw new InvalidDataException("Bio only supports 8, 16, 24, 32, and 48 bit images.");
2013 }
2014 }
2015 private PixelFormat pixelFormat;
2016 public Statistics[] Stats
2017 {
2018 get { return stats; }
2019 set { stats = value; }
2020 }
2021 Statistics[] stats;
2022 byte[] bytes;
2023 string file;
2024 bool littleEndian = BitConverter.IsLittleEndian;
2025 Plane plane = null;
2031 public void SetImage(Bitmap bitmap, bool switchRGB)
2032 {
2033 if (switchRGB)
2034 bitmap = BufferInfo.SwitchRedBlue(bitmap);
2035 bitmap.RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
2036 PixelFormat = bitmap.PixelFormat;
2037 SizeX = bitmap.Width;
2038 SizeY = bitmap.Height;
2039 bytes = GetBuffer((Bitmap)bitmap, Stride);
2040 }
2048 private static int GetStridePadded(int stride)
2049 {
2050 if (stride % 4 == 0)
2051 return stride;
2052 int newstride = stride + 2;
2053 if (stride % 3 == 0 && stride % 2 != 0)
2054 {
2055 newstride = stride + 1;
2056 if (newstride % 4 != 0)
2057 newstride = stride + 3;
2058 }
2059 if (newstride % 4 != 0)
2060 return stride + 5;
2061 return newstride;
2062 }
2073 private static byte[] GetPaddedBuffer(byte[] bts, int w, int h, int stride, PixelFormat px)
2074 {
2075 if (stride == 0)
2076 return null;
2077 int newstride = GetStridePadded(stride);
2078 if (newstride == stride)
2079 return bts;
2080 byte[] newbts = new byte[newstride * h];
2081 if (px == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb || px == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb || px == PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb || px == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2082 {
2083 for (int y = 0; y < h; ++y)
2084 {
2085 for (int x = 0; x < w; ++x)
2086 {
2087 int index = (y * stride) + x;
2088 int index2 = (y * newstride) + x;
2089 newbts[index2] = bts[index];
2090 }
2091 }
2092 }
2093 else
2094 {
2095 for (int y = 0; y < h; ++y)
2096 {
2097 for (int x = 0; x < w * 2; ++x)
2098 {
2099 int index = (y * stride) + x;
2100 int index2 = (y * newstride) + x;
2101 newbts[index2] = bts[index];
2102 }
2103 }
2104 }
2105 return newbts;
2106 }
2120 public static BufferInfo[] RGB48To16(string file, int w, int h, int stride, byte[] bts, ZCT coord, int index, Plane plane)
2121 {
2122 BufferInfo[] bfs = new BufferInfo[3];
2123 Bitmap bmpr = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale);
2124 Bitmap bmpg = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale);
2125 Bitmap bmpb = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale);
2126
2127 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
2128 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
2129 BitmapData bmdr = bmpr.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmpr.PixelFormat);
2130 BitmapData bmdg = bmpg.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmpg.PixelFormat);
2131 BitmapData bmdb = bmpb.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmpb.PixelFormat);
2132 unsafe
2133 {
2134 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2135 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2136 {
2137 //getting the pixels of current row
2138 byte* rowr = (byte*)bmdr.Scan0 + (y * bmdr.Stride);
2139 byte* rowg = (byte*)bmdg.Scan0 + (y * bmdg.Stride);
2140 byte* rowb = (byte*)bmdb.Scan0 + (y * bmdb.Stride);
2141 int rowRGB = y * stride;
2142 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2143 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
2144 {
2145 int indexRGB = x * 6;
2146 int index16 = x * 2;
2147 //R
2148 rowr[index16 + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];
2149 rowr[index16] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];
2150 //G
2151 rowg[index16 + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];
2152 rowg[index16] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 3];
2153 //B
2154 rowb[index16 + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 4];
2155 rowb[index16] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 5];
2156
2157 }
2158 }
2159 }
2160 bmpr.UnlockBits(bmdr);
2161 bmpg.UnlockBits(bmdg);
2162 bmpb.UnlockBits(bmdb);
2163 bfs[0] = new BufferInfo(file, bmpr, new ZCT(coord.Z, 0, coord.T), index, plane);
2164 bfs[0].RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
2165 bfs[1] = new BufferInfo(file, bmpg, new ZCT(coord.Z, 0, coord.T), index + 1, plane);
2166 bfs[1].RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
2167 bfs[2] = new BufferInfo(file, bmpb, new ZCT(coord.Z, 0, coord.T), index + 2, plane);
2168 bfs[2].RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
2169 return bfs;
2170 }
2177 public static BufferInfo RGB16To48(BufferInfo[] bfs)
2178 {
2179 //If this is a 2 channel image we fill the last channel with black.
2180 if (bfs[2] == null)
2181 {
2182 byte[] bt = new byte[bfs[0].SizeY * (bfs[0].SizeX * 2 * 3)];
2183 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2184 for (int y = 0; y < bfs[0].SizeY; y++)
2185 {
2186 //getting the pixels of current row
2187 int rowRGB = y * (bfs[0].SizeX * 2 * 3);
2188 int row16 = y * (bfs[0].SizeX * 2);
2189 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2190 for (int x = 0; x < bfs[0].SizeX; x++)
2191 {
2192 int indexRGB = x * 6;
2193 int index16 = x * 2;
2194 //R
2195 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB] = 0;
2196 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] = 0;
2197 //G
2198 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] = bfs[1].Bytes[row16 + index16];
2199 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 3] = bfs[1].Bytes[row16 + index16 + 1];
2200 //B
2201 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 4] = bfs[0].Bytes[row16 + index16];
2202 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 5] = bfs[0].Bytes[row16 + index16 + 1];
2203 }
2204 }
2205 BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo(bfs[0].ID, bfs[0].SizeX, bfs[0].SizeY, PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb, bt, bfs[0].Coordinate, 0, bfs[0].Plane);
2206 return bf;
2207 }
2208 else
2209 {
2210 byte[] bt = new byte[bfs[0].SizeY * (bfs[0].SizeX * 2 * 3)];
2211 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2212 for (int y = 0; y < bfs[0].SizeY; y++)
2213 {
2214 //getting the pixels of current row
2215 int rowRGB = y * (bfs[0].SizeX * 2 * 3);
2216 int row16 = y * (bfs[0].SizeX * 2);
2217 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2218 for (int x = 0; x < bfs[0].SizeX; x++)
2219 {
2220 int indexRGB = x * 6;
2221 int index16 = x * 2;
2222 //R
2223 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB] = bfs[2].Bytes[row16 + index16];
2224 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] = bfs[2].Bytes[row16 + index16 + 1];
2225 //G
2226 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] = bfs[1].Bytes[row16 + index16];
2227 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 3] = bfs[1].Bytes[row16 + index16 + 1];
2228 //B
2229 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 4] = bfs[0].Bytes[row16 + index16];
2230 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 5] = bfs[0].Bytes[row16 + index16 + 1];
2231 }
2232 }
2233 BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo(bfs[0].ID, bfs[0].SizeX, bfs[0].SizeY, PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb, bt, bfs[0].Coordinate, 0, bfs[0].Plane);
2234 return bf;
2235 }
2236 }
2243 public static BufferInfo RGB16To48(BufferInfo bfs)
2244 {
2245 byte[] bt = new byte[bfs.SizeY * (bfs.SizeX * 2 * 3)];
2246 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2247 for (int y = 0; y < bfs.SizeY; y++)
2248 {
2249 //getting the pixels of current row
2250 int rowRGB = y * (bfs.SizeX * 2 * 3);
2251 int row16 = y * (bfs.SizeX * 2);
2252 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2253 for (int x = 0; x < bfs.SizeX; x++)
2254 {
2255 int indexRGB = x * 6;
2256 int index16 = x * 2;
2257 //R
2258 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB] = bfs.Bytes[row16 + index16];
2259 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] = bfs.Bytes[row16 + index16 + 1];
2260 //G
2261 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] = bfs.Bytes[row16 + index16];
2262 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 3] = bfs.Bytes[row16 + index16 + 1];
2263 //B
2264 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 4] = bfs.Bytes[row16 + index16];
2265 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 5] = bfs.Bytes[row16 + index16 + 1];
2266 }
2267 }
2268 BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo(bfs.ID, bfs.SizeX, bfs.SizeY, PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb, bt, bfs.Coordinate, 0, bfs.Plane);
2269 return bf;
2270 }
2282 public static Bitmap GetRGBBitmap(BufferInfo[] bfs, IntRange rr, IntRange rg, IntRange rb)
2283 {
2284 int stride;
2285 if (bfs[0].BitsPerPixel > 8)
2286 stride = bfs[0].SizeX * 6;
2287 else
2288 stride = bfs[0].SizeX * 3;
2289 int w = bfs[0].SizeX;
2290 int h = bfs[0].SizeY;
2291 byte[] bt = new byte[h * w * 3];
2292 if (bfs[0].BitsPerPixel == 8)
2293 {
2294 BufferInfo bf = BufferInfo.RGB8To24(bfs);
2295 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2296 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2297 {
2298 int rowRGB = y * stride;
2299 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2300 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
2301 {
2302 int indexRGB = x * 3;
2303 int indexRGBA = x * 3;
2304 float ri = ((float)bf.Bytes[rowRGB + indexRGB] - rr.Min);
2305 if (ri < 0)
2306 ri = 0;
2307 ri = ri / rr.Max;
2308 float gi = ((float)bf.Bytes[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] - rg.Min);
2309 if (gi < 0)
2310 gi = 0;
2311 gi = gi / rg.Max;
2312 float bi = ((float)bf.Bytes[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] - rb.Min);
2313 if (bi < 0)
2314 bi = 0;
2315 bi = bi / rb.Max;
2316 bt[rowRGB + indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(ri * 255);//byte R
2317 bt[rowRGB + indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(gi * 255);//byte G
2318 bt[rowRGB + indexRGBA] = (byte)(bi * 255);//byte B
2319 }
2320 }
2321 bf.Dispose();
2322 }
2323 else
2324 {
2325 BufferInfo bf = BufferInfo.RGB16To48(bfs);
2326 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2327 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2328 {
2329 //getting the pixels of current row
2330 int rowRGB = y * w * 6;
2331 int row = y * w * 3;
2332 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2333 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
2334 {
2335 int indexRGB = x * 6;
2336 int indexRGBA = x * 3;
2337 float ri = ((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bf.Bytes, rowRGB + indexRGB) - rr.Min);
2338 if (ri < 0)
2339 ri = 0;
2340 ri = ri / rr.Max;
2341 float gi = ((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bf.Bytes, rowRGB + indexRGB + 2) - rg.Min);
2342 if (gi < 0)
2343 gi = 0;
2344 gi = gi / rg.Max;
2345 float bi = ((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bf.Bytes, rowRGB + indexRGB + 4) - rb.Min);
2346 if (bi < 0)
2347 bi = 0;
2348 bi = bi / rb.Max;
2349 bt[row + indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(ri * 255);//byte R
2350 bt[row + indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(gi * 255);//byte G
2351 bt[row + indexRGBA] = (byte)(bi * 255);//byte B
2352 }
2353 }
2354 bf.Dispose();
2355 }
2356 return GetBitmap(w, h, w * 3, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, bt);
2357 }
2366 public static Bitmap GetEmissionBitmap(BufferInfo bfs, IntRange rr, System.Drawing.Color col)
2367 {
2368 int stride;
2369 if (bfs.BitsPerPixel > 8)
2370 stride = bfs.SizeX * 3 * 2;
2371 else
2372 stride = bfs.SizeX * 3;
2373 float r = (col.R / 255f);
2374 float g = (col.G / 255f);
2375 float b = (col.B / 255f);
2376
2377 int w = bfs.SizeX;
2378 int h = bfs.SizeY;
2379 byte[] bts = new byte[h * stride];
2380
2381 if (bfs.BitsPerPixel > 8)
2382 {
2383 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2384 {
2385 //getting the pixels of current row
2386 int rowRGB = y * (w * 2 * 3);
2387 int row16 = y * (w * 2);
2388 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2389 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
2390 {
2391 int indexRGB = x * 6;
2392 int index16 = x * 2;
2393
2394 float rf = (BitConverter.ToUInt16(bfs.Bytes, row16 + index16) / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * r;
2395 float gf = (BitConverter.ToUInt16(bfs.Bytes, row16 + index16) / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * g;
2396 float bf = (BitConverter.ToUInt16(bfs.Bytes, row16 + index16) / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * b;
2397 ushort rs = (ushort)(rf * ushort.MaxValue);
2398 ushort gs = (ushort)(gf * ushort.MaxValue);
2399 ushort bs = (ushort)(bf * ushort.MaxValue);
2400 byte[] rbb = BitConverter.GetBytes(rs);
2401 byte[] gbb = BitConverter.GetBytes(gs);
2402 byte[] bbb = BitConverter.GetBytes(bs);
2403 //R
2404 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB] = rbb[0];
2405 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] = rbb[1];
2406 //G
2407 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] = gbb[0];
2408 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 3] = gbb[1];
2409 //B
2410 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 4] = bbb[0];
2411 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 5] = bbb[1];
2412 }
2413 }
2414 }
2415 else
2416 {
2417 for (int y = 0; y < bfs.SizeY; y++)
2418 {
2419 //getting the pixels of current row
2420 int rowRGB = y * (bfs.SizeX * 3);
2421 int row8 = y * (bfs.SizeX);
2422 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2423 for (int x = 0; x < bfs.SizeX; x++)
2424 {
2425 int indexRGB = x * 3;
2426 int index8 = x;
2427
2428 float rf = (bfs.Bytes[row8 + index8] / 255f) * r;
2429 float gf = (bfs.Bytes[row8 + index8] / 255f) * g;
2430 float bf = (bfs.Bytes[row8 + index8] / 255f) * b;
2431 byte rs = (byte)(rf * byte.MaxValue);
2432 byte gs = (byte)(gf * byte.MaxValue);
2433 byte bs = (byte)(bf * byte.MaxValue);
2434 //R
2435 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB] = rs;
2436 //G
2437 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] = gs;
2438 //B
2439 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] = bs;
2440 }
2441 }
2442 }
2443 byte[] bt = new byte[h * (w * 3)];
2444 if (bfs.BitsPerPixel == 8)
2445 {
2446 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2447 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2448 {
2449 int row = y * stride;
2450 int rowRGB = y * w * 3;
2451 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2452 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
2453 {
2454 int indexRGB = x * 3;
2455 int indexRGBA = x * 3;
2456 float ri = ((float)bts[rowRGB + indexRGB] - rr.Min);
2457 if (ri < 0)
2458 ri = 0;
2459 ri = ri / rr.Max;
2460 float gi = ((float)bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] - rr.Min);
2461 if (gi < 0)
2462 gi = 0;
2463 gi = gi / rr.Max;
2464 float bi = ((float)bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] - rr.Min);
2465 if (bi < 0)
2466 bi = 0;
2467 bi = bi / rr.Max;
2468 bt[rowRGB + indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(ri * 255);//byte R
2469 bt[rowRGB + indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(gi * 255);//byte G
2470 bt[rowRGB + indexRGBA] = (byte)(bi * 255);//byte B
2471 }
2472 }
2473 }
2474 else
2475 {
2476 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2477 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2478 {
2479 //getting the pixels of current row
2480 int rowRGB = y * w * 3 * 2;
2481 int row = y * w * 3;
2482 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2483 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
2484 {
2485 int indexRGB = x * 6;
2486 int indexRGBA = x * 3;
2487 float ri = ((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) - rr.Min);
2488 if (ri < 0)
2489 ri = 0;
2490 ri = ri / rr.Max;
2491 float gi = ((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 2) - rr.Min);
2492 if (gi < 0)
2493 gi = 0;
2494 gi = gi / rr.Max;
2495 float bi = ((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 4) - rr.Min);
2496 if (bi < 0)
2497 bi = 0;
2498 bi = bi / rr.Max;
2499 bt[row + indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(ri * 255);//byte R
2500 bt[row + indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(gi * 255);//byte G
2501 bt[row + indexRGBA] = (byte)(bi * 255);//byte B
2502 }
2503 }
2504 }
2505 bts = null;
2506 Bitmap bmp;
2507 if (bfs.BitsPerPixel > 8)
2508 return GetBitmap(w, h, w * 3, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, bt);
2509 else
2510 return GetBitmap(w, h, w * 3 * 2, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, bt);
2511 }
2520 public static Bitmap GetEmissionBitmap(BufferInfo[] bfs, Channel[] chans)
2521 {
2522 Bitmap bm = new Bitmap(bfs[0].SizeX, bfs[0].SizeY, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);
2523 Merge m = new Merge(bm);
2524 for (int i = 0; i < chans.Length; i++)
2525 {
2526 m.OverlayImage = bm;
2527 Bitmap b = GetEmissionBitmap(bfs[i], chans[i].range[0], chans[i].EmissionColor);
2528 bm = m.Apply(b);
2529 }
2530 return bm;
2531 }
2538 public static BufferInfo RGB8To24(BufferInfo[] bfs)
2539 {
2540 //If this is a 2 channel image we fill the last channel with black.
2541 if (bfs[2] == null)
2542 {
2543 byte[] bt = new byte[bfs[0].SizeY * (bfs[0].SizeX * 3)];
2544 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2545 for (int y = 0; y < bfs[0].SizeY; y++)
2546 {
2547 //getting the pixels of current row
2548 int rowRGB = y * (bfs[0].SizeX * 3);
2549 int row8 = y * (bfs[0].SizeX);
2550 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2551 for (int x = 0; x < bfs[0].SizeX; x++)
2552 {
2553 int indexRGB = x * 3;
2554 int index8 = x;
2555 //R
2556 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB] = 0;
2557 //G
2558 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] = bfs[1].Bytes[row8 + index8];
2559 //B
2560 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] = bfs[0].Bytes[row8 + index8];
2561 }
2562 }
2563 return new BufferInfo(bfs[0].ID, bfs[0].SizeX, bfs[0].SizeY, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, bt, bfs[0].Coordinate, 0);
2564 }
2565 else
2566 {
2567 byte[] bt = new byte[bfs[0].SizeY * (bfs[0].SizeX * 3)];
2568 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2569 for (int y = 0; y < bfs[0].SizeY; y++)
2570 {
2571 //getting the pixels of current row
2572 int rowRGB = y * (bfs[0].SizeX * 3);
2573 int row8 = y * (bfs[0].SizeX);
2574 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2575 for (int x = 0; x < bfs[0].SizeX; x++)
2576 {
2577 int indexRGB = x * 3;
2578 int index8 = x;
2579 //R
2580 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB] = bfs[2].Bytes[row8 + index8];
2581 //G
2582 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] = bfs[1].Bytes[row8 + index8];
2583 //B
2584 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] = bfs[0].Bytes[row8 + index8];
2585 }
2586 }
2587 return new BufferInfo(bfs[0].ID, bfs[0].SizeX, bfs[0].SizeY, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, bt, bfs[0].Coordinate, 0);
2588 }
2589 }
2595 public static BufferInfo RGB8To24(BufferInfo bfs)
2596 {
2597 byte[] bt = new byte[bfs.SizeY * (bfs.SizeX * 3)];
2598 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2599 for (int y = 0; y < bfs.SizeY; y++)
2600 {
2601 //getting the pixels of current row
2602 int rowRGB = y * (bfs.SizeX * 3);
2603 int row8 = y * (bfs.SizeX);
2604 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2605 for (int x = 0; x < bfs.SizeX; x++)
2606 {
2607 int indexRGB = x * 3;
2608 int index8 = x;
2609 //R
2610 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB] = bfs.Bytes[row8 + index8];
2611 //G
2612 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] = bfs.Bytes[row8 + index8];
2613 //B
2614 bt[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] = bfs.Bytes[row8 + index8];
2615 }
2616 }
2617 BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo(bfs.ID, bfs.SizeX, bfs.SizeY, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, bt, bfs.Coordinate, 0);
2618 return bf;
2619 }
2625 public static Bitmap[] RGB24To8(Bitmap info)
2626 {
2627 Bitmap[] bfs = new Bitmap[3];
2628 ExtractChannel cr = new ExtractChannel((short)0);
2629 ExtractChannel cg = new ExtractChannel((short)1);
2630 ExtractChannel cb = new ExtractChannel((short)2);
2631 bfs[0] = cr.Apply(info);
2632 bfs[1] = cg.Apply(info);
2633 bfs[2] = cb.Apply(info);
2634 cr = null;
2635 cg = null;
2636 cb = null;
2637 return bfs;
2638 }
2649 public static unsafe Bitmap GetBitmap(int w, int h, int stride, PixelFormat px, byte[] bts)
2650 {
2651 fixed (byte* numPtr1 = bts)
2652 {
2653 if (stride % 4 == 0)
2654 {
2655 return new Bitmap(w, h, stride, px, new IntPtr((void*)numPtr1));
2656 }
2657 int newstride = GetStridePadded(stride);
2658 byte[] newbts = GetPaddedBuffer(bts, w, h, stride, px);
2659 fixed (byte* numPtr2 = newbts)
2660 {
2661 return new Bitmap(w, h, newstride, px, new IntPtr((void*)numPtr2));
2662 }
2663 }
2664 }
2673 public static unsafe Bitmap GetBitmapRGB(int w, int h, PixelFormat px, byte[] bts)
2674 {
2675 if (px == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
2676 {
2677 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
2678 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
2679 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
2680 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
2681 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
2682 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2683 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2684 {
2685 //getting the pixels of current row
2686 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
2687 int rowRGB = y * w * 4;
2688 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2689 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
2690 {
2691 int indexRGB = x * 4;
2692 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
2693 row[indexRGBA + 3] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 3];//byte A
2694 row[indexRGBA + 2] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];//byte R
2695 row[indexRGBA + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];//byte G
2696 row[indexRGBA] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];//byte B
2697 }
2698 }
2699 //unlocking bits and disposing image
2700 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
2701 return bmp;
2702 }
2703 else if (px == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2704 {
2705 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
2706 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
2707 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
2708 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
2709 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
2710 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2711 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2712 {
2713 //getting the pixels of current row
2714 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
2715 int rowRGB = y * w * 3;
2716 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2717 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
2718 {
2719 int indexRGB = x * 3;
2720 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
2721 row[indexRGBA + 3] = byte.MaxValue;//byte A
2722 row[indexRGBA + 2] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];//byte R
2723 row[indexRGBA + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];//byte G
2724 row[indexRGBA] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];//byte B
2725 }
2726 }
2727 //unlocking bits and disposing image
2728 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
2729 return bmp;
2730 }
2731 else
2732 if (px == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2733 {
2734 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
2735 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
2736 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
2737 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
2738 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
2739 unsafe
2740 {
2741 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2742 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2743 {
2744 //getting the pixels of current row
2745 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
2746 int rowRGB = y * w * 6;
2747 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2748 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
2749 {
2750 int indexRGB = x * 6;
2751 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
2752 int b = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) / 255);
2753 int g = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 2) / 255);
2754 int r = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 4) / 255);
2755 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
2756 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
2757 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(g);//byte G
2758 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(r);//byte B
2759 }
2760 }
2761 }
2762 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
2763 return bmp;
2764 }
2765 else
2766 if (px == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2767 {
2768 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
2769 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
2770 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
2771 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
2772 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
2773 unsafe
2774 {
2775 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2776 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2777 {
2778 //getting the pixels of current row
2779 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
2780 int rowRGB = y * w;
2781 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2782 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
2783 {
2784 int indexRGB = x;
2785 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
2786 byte b = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];
2787 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
2788 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
2789 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
2790 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
2791 }
2792 }
2793 }
2794 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
2795 return bmp;
2796 }
2797 else
2798 if (px == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
2799 {
2800 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
2801 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
2802 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
2803 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
2804 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
2805 unsafe
2806 {
2807 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2808 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2809 {
2810 //getting the pixels of current row
2811 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
2812 int rowRGB = y * w * 2;
2813 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2814 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
2815 {
2816 int indexRGB = x * 2;
2817 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
2818 ushort b = (ushort)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) / 255);
2819 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
2820 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
2821 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
2822 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
2823 }
2824 }
2825 }
2826 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
2827 return bmp;
2828 }
2829
2830 throw new NotSupportedException("Pixelformat " + px + " is not supported.");
2831 }
2840 public static unsafe IntPtr GetRGBData(int w, int h, PixelFormat px, byte[] bts)
2841 {
2842 if (px == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2843 {
2844 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
2845 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
2846 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
2847 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
2848 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
2849 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2850 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2851 {
2852 //getting the pixels of current row
2853 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
2854 int rowRGB = y * w * 3;
2855 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2856 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
2857 {
2858 int indexRGB = x * 3;
2859 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
2860 row[indexRGBA + 3] = byte.MaxValue;//byte A
2861 row[indexRGBA + 2] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];//byte R
2862 row[indexRGBA + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];//byte G
2863 row[indexRGBA] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];//byte B
2864 }
2865 }
2866 //unlocking bits and disposing image
2867 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
2868 return bmd.Scan0;
2869 }
2870 else
2871 if (px == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2872 {
2873 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
2874 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
2875 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
2876 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
2877 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
2878 unsafe
2879 {
2880 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2881 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2882 {
2883 //getting the pixels of current row
2884 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
2885 int rowRGB = y * w * 6;
2886 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2887 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
2888 {
2889 int indexRGB = x * 6;
2890 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
2891 int b = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) / 255);
2892 int g = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 2) / 255);
2893 int r = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 4) / 255);
2894 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
2895 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
2896 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(g);//byte G
2897 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(r);//byte B
2898 }
2899 }
2900 }
2901 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
2902 return bmd.Scan0;
2903 }
2904 else
2905 if (px == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2906 {
2907 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
2908 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
2909 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
2910 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
2911 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
2912 unsafe
2913 {
2914 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2915 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2916 {
2917 //getting the pixels of current row
2918 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
2919 int rowRGB = y * w;
2920 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2921 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
2922 {
2923 int indexRGB = x;
2924 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
2925 byte b = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];
2926 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
2927 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
2928 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
2929 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
2930 }
2931 }
2932 }
2933 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
2934 return bmd.Scan0;
2935 }
2936 else
2937 if (px == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
2938 {
2939 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
2940 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
2941 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
2942 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
2943 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
2944 unsafe
2945 {
2946 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2947 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2948 {
2949 //getting the pixels of current row
2950 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
2951 int rowRGB = y * w * 2;
2952 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2953 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
2954 {
2955 int indexRGB = x * 2;
2956 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
2957 ushort b = (ushort)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) / 255);
2958 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
2959 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
2960 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
2961 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
2962 }
2963 }
2964 }
2965 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
2966 return bmd.Scan0;
2967 }
2968 throw new NotSupportedException("Pixelformat " + px + " is not supported.");
2969 }
2982 public static Bitmap GetFiltered(int w, int h, int stride, PixelFormat px, byte[] bts, IntRange rr, IntRange rg, IntRange rb)
2983 {
2984 if (px == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2985 {
2986 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);
2987 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
2988 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
2989 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
2990 unsafe
2991 {
2992 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
2993 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
2994 {
2995 //getting the pixels of current row
2996 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
2997 int rowRGB = y * stride;
2998 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
2999 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
3000 {
3001 int indexRGB = x * 3;
3002 int indexRGBA = x * 3;
3003 row[indexRGBA + 2] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];//byte R
3004 row[indexRGBA + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];//byte G
3005 row[indexRGBA] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];//byte B
3006 float ri = ((float)bts[rowRGB + indexRGB] - rr.Min);
3007 if (ri < 0)
3008 ri = 0;
3009 ri = ri / (float)rr.Max;
3010 float gi = ((float)bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] - rg.Min);
3011 if (gi < 0)
3012 gi = 0;
3013 gi = gi / (float)rg.Max;
3014 float bi = ((float)bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] - rb.Min);
3015 if (bi < 0)
3016 bi = 0;
3017 bi = bi / (float)rb.Max;
3018 int b = (int)(ri * 255f);
3019 int g = (int)(gi * 255f);
3020 int r = (int)(bi * 255f);
3021 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
3022 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(g);//byte G
3023 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(r);//byte B
3024 }
3025 }
3026 }
3027 //unlocking bits and disposing image
3028 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
3029 return bmp;
3030 }
3031 else
3032 if (px == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
3033 {
3034 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb);
3035 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
3036 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
3037 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
3038 unsafe
3039 {
3040 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
3041 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3042 {
3043 //getting the pixels of current row
3044 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
3045 int rowRGB = y * stride;
3046 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
3047 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
3048 {
3049 int indexRGB = x * 4;
3050 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
3051 row[indexRGBA + 2] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];//byte R
3052 row[indexRGBA + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];//byte G
3053 row[indexRGBA] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];//byte B
3054 float ri = ((float)bts[rowRGB + indexRGB] - rr.Min);
3055 if (ri < 0)
3056 ri = 0;
3057 ri = ri / (float)rr.Max;
3058 float gi = ((float)bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] - rg.Min);
3059 if (gi < 0)
3060 gi = 0;
3061 gi = gi / (float)rg.Max;
3062 float bi = ((float)bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] - rb.Min);
3063 if (bi < 0)
3064 bi = 0;
3065 bi = bi / (float)rb.Max;
3066 int b = (int)(ri * 255f);
3067 int g = (int)(gi * 255f);
3068 int r = (int)(bi * 255f);
3069 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
3070 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(g);//byte G
3071 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(r);//byte B
3072 }
3073 }
3074 }
3075 //unlocking bits and disposing image
3076 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
3077 return bmp;
3078 }
3079 else
3080 if (px == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
3081 {
3082 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
3083 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
3084 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
3085 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
3086 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
3087 unsafe
3088 {
3089 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
3090 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3091 {
3092 //getting the pixels of current row
3093 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
3094 int rowRGB = y * stride;
3095 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
3096 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
3097 {
3098 int indexRGB = x * 6;
3099 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
3100 float ri = ((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) - rr.Min);
3101 if (ri < 0)
3102 ri = 0;
3103 ri = ri / (float)rr.Max;
3104 float gi = ((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 2) - rg.Min);
3105 if (gi < 0)
3106 gi = 0;
3107 gi = gi / (float)rg.Max;
3108 float bi = ((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 4) - rb.Min);
3109 if (bi < 0)
3110 bi = 0;
3111 bi = bi / (float)rb.Max;
3112 int b = (int)(ri * 255f);
3113 int g = (int)(gi * 255f);
3114 int r = (int)(bi * 255f);
3115 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
3116 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
3117 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(g);//byte G
3118 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(r);//byte B
3119 }
3120 }
3121 }
3122
3123 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
3124 return bmp;
3125 }
3126 else
3127 if (px == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
3128 {
3129 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
3130 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
3131 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
3132 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
3133 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
3134 unsafe
3135 {
3136 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
3137 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3138 {
3139 //getting the pixels of current row
3140 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
3141 int rowRGB = y * stride;
3142 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
3143 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
3144 {
3145 int indexRGB = x * 2;
3146 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
3147 float ri = (float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) - rr.Min;
3148 if (ri < 0)
3149 ri = 0;
3150 ri = ri / rr.Max;
3151 int b = (int)(ri * 255);
3152 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
3153 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
3154 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
3155 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
3156 }
3157 }
3158 }
3159 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
3160 return bmp;
3161 }
3162 else
3163 if (px == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
3164 {
3165 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
3166 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
3167 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
3168 System.Drawing.Rectangle rec = new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
3169 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
3170 unsafe
3171 {
3172 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
3173 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3174 {
3175 //getting the pixels of current row
3176 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
3177 int rowRGB = y * stride;
3178 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
3179 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
3180 {
3181 int indexRGB = x;
3182 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
3183 float ri = (float)bts[rowRGB + indexRGB] - rr.Min;
3184 if (ri < 0)
3185 ri = 0;
3186 ri = ri / rr.Max;
3187 int b = (int)(ri * 255);
3188 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
