3189 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
3190 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
3191 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
3192 }
3193 }
3194 }
3195
3196 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
3197 return bmp;
3198 }
3199 throw new InvalidDataException("Bio supports only 8, 16 24, 32, 48 bit images.");
3200 }
3209 public Bitmap GetFiltered(IntRange rr, IntRange rg, IntRange rb)
3210 {
3211 return BufferInfo.GetFiltered(SizeX, SizeY, Stride, PixelFormat, Bytes, rr, rg, rb);
3212 }
3216 public void Crop(Rectangle r)
3217 {
3218 //This crop function supports 16 bit images unlike Bitmap class.
3219 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
3220 {
3221 if (RGBChannelsCount == 1)
3222 {
3223 byte[] bts = null;
3224 int bytesPer = 2;
3225 int stridenew = r.Width * bytesPer;
3226 int strideold = Stride;
3227 bts = new byte[(stridenew * r.Height)];
3228 for (int y = 0; y < r.Height; y++)
3229 {
3230 for (int x = 0; x < stridenew; x += bytesPer)
3231 {
3232 int indexnew = (y * stridenew + x);
3233 int indexold = ((y + r.Y) * strideold + (x + (r.X * bytesPer)));// + r.X;
3234 bts[indexnew] = bytes[indexold];
3235 bts[indexnew + 1] = bytes[indexold + 1];
3236 }
3237 }
3238 bytes = bts;
3239 }
3240 else
3241 {
3242 byte[] bts = null;
3243 int bytesPer = 6;
3244 int stridenew = r.Width * bytesPer;
3245 int strideold = Stride;
3246 bts = new byte[(stridenew * r.Height)];
3247 for (int y = 0; y < r.Height; y++)
3248 {
3249 for (int x = 0; x < stridenew; x += bytesPer)
3250 {
3251 int indexnew = (y * stridenew + x);
3252 int indexold = ((y + r.Y) * strideold + (x + (r.X * bytesPer)));// + r.X;
3253 bts[indexnew] = bytes[indexold];
3254 bts[indexnew + 1] = bytes[indexold + 1];
3255 bts[indexnew + 2] = bytes[indexold + 2];
3256 bts[indexnew + 3] = bytes[indexold + 3];
3257 bts[indexnew + 4] = bytes[indexold + 4];
3258 bts[indexnew + 5] = bytes[indexold + 5];
3259 }
3260 }
3261 bytes = bts;
3262 }
3263 }
3264 else
3265 {
3266 Image = ((Bitmap)Image).Clone(r, PixelFormat);
3267 }
3268 SizeX = r.Width;
3269 SizeY = r.Height;
3270 }
3277 public Bitmap GetCropBitmap(Rectangle r)
3278 {
3279 //This crop function supports 16 bit images unlike Bitmap class.
3280 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
3281 {
3282 byte[] bts = null;
3283 if (RGBChannelsCount == 1)
3284 {
3285 int bytesPer = 2;
3286 int stridenew = r.Width * bytesPer;
3287 int strideold = Stride;
3288 bts = new byte[(stridenew * r.Height)];
3289 for (int y = 0; y < r.Height; y++)
3290 {
3291 for (int x = 0; x < stridenew; x += bytesPer)
3292 {
3293 int indexnew = (y * stridenew + x) * RGBChannelsCount;
3294 int indexold = (((y + r.Y) * strideold + (x + (r.X * bytesPer))) * RGBChannelsCount);// + r.X;
3295 bts[indexnew] = bytes[indexold];
3296 bts[indexnew + 1] = bytes[indexold + 1];
3297 }
3298 }
3299 return new Bitmap(r.Width, r.Height, stridenew, PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale, Marshal.UnsafeAddrOfPinnedArrayElement(bts, 0));
3300 }
3301 else
3302 {
3303 int bytesPer = 6;
3304 int stridenew = r.Width * bytesPer;
3305 int strideold = Stride;
3306 bts = new byte[(stridenew * r.Height)];
3307 for (int y = 0; y < r.Height; y++)
3308 {
3309 for (int x = 0; x < stridenew; x += bytesPer)
3310 {
3311 int indexnew = (y * stridenew + x);
3312 int indexold = ((y + r.Y) * strideold + (x + (r.X * bytesPer)));// + r.X;
3313 bts[indexnew] = bytes[indexold];
3314 bts[indexnew + 1] = bytes[indexold + 1];
3315 bts[indexnew + 2] = bytes[indexold + 2];
3316 bts[indexnew + 3] = bytes[indexold + 3];
3317 bts[indexnew + 4] = bytes[indexold + 4];
3318 bts[indexnew + 5] = bytes[indexold + 5];
3319 }
3320 }
3321 //bytes = bts;
3322 return new Bitmap(r.Width, r.Height, stridenew, PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb, Marshal.UnsafeAddrOfPinnedArrayElement(bts, 0));
3323 }
3324 }
3325 else
3326 {
3327 return ((Bitmap)Image).Clone(r, PixelFormat);
3328 }
3329
3330 }
3336 public BufferInfo GetCropBuffer(Rectangle r)
3337 {
3338 BufferInfo inf = null;
3339 //This crop function supports 16 bit images unlike Bitmap class.
3340 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
3341 {
3342 byte[] bts = null;
3343 if (RGBChannelsCount == 1)
3344 {
3345 int bytesPer = 2;
3346 int stridenew = r.Width * bytesPer;
3347 int strideold = Stride;
3348 bts = new byte[(stridenew * r.Height)];
3349 for (int y = 0; y < r.Height; y++)
3350 {
3351 for (int x = 0; x < stridenew; x += bytesPer)
3352 {
3353 int indexnew = (y * stridenew + x) * RGBChannelsCount;
3354 int indexold = (((y + r.Y) * strideold + (x + (r.X * bytesPer))) * RGBChannelsCount);// + r.X;
3355 bts[indexnew] = bytes[indexold];
3356 bts[indexnew + 1] = bytes[indexold + 1];
3357 }
3358 }
3359 BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo(r.Width, r.Height, PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale, bts, Coordinate, ID);
3360 return bf;
3361 }
3362 else
3363 {
3364 int bytesPer = 6;
3365 int stridenew = r.Width * bytesPer;
3366 int strideold = Stride;
3367 bts = new byte[(stridenew * r.Height)];
3368 for (int y = 0; y < r.Height; y++)
3369 {
3370 for (int x = 0; x < stridenew; x += bytesPer)
3371 {
3372 int indexnew = (y * stridenew + x);
3373 int indexold = ((y + r.Y) * strideold + (x + (r.X * bytesPer)));// + r.X;
3374 bts[indexnew] = bytes[indexold];
3375 bts[indexnew + 1] = bytes[indexold + 1];
3376 bts[indexnew + 2] = bytes[indexold + 2];
3377 bts[indexnew + 3] = bytes[indexold + 3];
3378 bts[indexnew + 4] = bytes[indexold + 4];
3379 bts[indexnew + 5] = bytes[indexold + 5];
3380 }
3381 }
3382 BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo(r.Width, r.Height, PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb, bts, Coordinate, ID);
3383 return bf;
3384 }
3385 }
3386 else
3387 {
3388 Bitmap bmp = ((Bitmap)Image).Clone(r, PixelFormat);
3389 return new BufferInfo(ID, bmp, Coordinate, 0);
3390 }
3391 }
3392 /* Creating a new BufferInfo object. */
3393 public BufferInfo(string file, int w, int h, PixelFormat px, byte[] bts, ZCT coord, int index)
3394 {
3395 ID = CreateID(file, index);
3396 SizeX = w;
3397 SizeY = h;
3398 pixelFormat = px;
3399 Coordinate = coord;
3400 Bytes = bts;
3401 if (isRGB)
3402 SwitchRedBlue();
3403 }
3404 /* Creating a new BufferInfo object. */
3405 public BufferInfo(string file, int w, int h, PixelFormat px, byte[] bts, ZCT coord, int index, Plane plane)
3406 {
3407 ID = CreateID(file, index);
3408 SizeX = w;
3409 SizeY = h;
3410 pixelFormat = px;
3411 Coordinate = coord;
3412 Bytes = bts;
3413 if (isRGB)
3414 SwitchRedBlue();
3415 Plane = plane;
3416 }
3417 /* Creating a new BufferInfo object. */
3418 public BufferInfo(string file, int w, int h, PixelFormat px, byte[] byts, ZCT coord, int index, bool littleEndian = true, bool interleaved = true)
3419 {
3420 ID = CreateID(file, index);
3421 SizeX = w;
3422 SizeY = h;
3423 pixelFormat = px;
3424 Coordinate = coord;
3425 Bytes = byts;
3426 if (!interleaved)
3427 {
3428 byte[] bts = new byte[Length];
3429 int strplane = 0;
3430 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
3431 strplane = w * 2;
3432 else
3433 strplane = w;
3434 if (RGBChannelsCount == 1)
3435 {
3436 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3437 {
3438 int x = 0;
3439 int str1 = Stride * y;
3440 int str2 = strplane * y;
3441 for (int st = 0; st < strplane; st++)
3442 {
3443 bts[str1 + x] = bytes[str2 + st];
3444 x++;
3445 }
3446 }
3447 }
3448 else
3449 {
3450 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
3451 {
3452 int ind = strplane * h;
3453 int ind2 = strplane * h * 2;
3454 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3455 {
3456 int i = 0;
3457 int x = 0;
3458 int str1 = Stride * y;
3459 int str2 = strplane * y;
3460 for (int st = 0; st < strplane; st += 2)
3461 {
3462 bts[str1 + x + 0] = bytes[str2 + st];
3463 bts[str1 + x + 1] = bytes[str2 + st + 1];
3464 bts[str1 + x + 2] = bytes[ind + str2 + st];
3465 bts[str1 + x + 3] = bytes[ind + str2 + st + 1];
3466 bts[str1 + x + 4] = bytes[ind2 + str2 + st];
3467 bts[str1 + x + 5] = bytes[ind2 + str2 + st + 1];
3468 if (i == 1)
3469 {
3470 i = 0; x += 6;
3471 }
3472 i++;
3473 }
3474 }
3475 }
3476 else
3477 {
3478 int ind = strplane * h;
3479 int indb = ind * 2;
3480 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3481 {
3482 int x = 0;
3483 int str1 = Stride * y;
3484 int str2 = strplane * y;
3485 for (int st = 0; st < strplane; st++)
3486 {
3487 bts[str1 + x + 2] = bytes[str2 + st];
3488 bts[str1 + x + 1] = bytes[ind + str2 + st];
3489 bts[str1 + x] = bytes[indb + str2 + st];
3490 x += 3;
3491 }
3492 }
3493 }
3494 }
3495 bytes = bts;
3496 }
3497 if (!littleEndian)
3498 {
3499 Array.Reverse(Bytes);
3500 RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
3501 }
3502 if (isRGB)
3503 SwitchRedBlue();
3504 }
3505 /* Creating a new BufferInfo object. */
3506 public BufferInfo(string file, int w, int h, PixelFormat px, byte[] byts, ZCT coord, int index, Plane plane, bool littleEndian = true, bool interleaved = true)
3507 {
3508 ID = CreateID(file, index);
3509 SizeX = w;
3510 SizeY = h;
3511 pixelFormat = px;
3512 Coordinate = coord;
3513 Bytes = byts;
3514 if (!interleaved)
3515 {
3516 byte[] bts = new byte[Length];
3517 int strplane = 0;
3518 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
3519 strplane = w * 2;
3520 else
3521 strplane = w;
3522 if (RGBChannelsCount == 1)
3523 {
3524 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3525 {
3526 int x = 0;
3527 int str1 = Stride * y;
3528 int str2 = strplane * y;
3529 for (int st = 0; st < strplane; st++)
3530 {
3531 bts[str1 + x] = bytes[str2 + st];
3532 x++;
3533 }
3534 }
3535 }
3536 else
3537 {
3538 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
3539 {
3540 int ind = strplane * h;
3541 int ind2 = strplane * h * 2;
3542 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3543 {
3544 int i = 0;
3545 int x = 0;
3546 int str1 = Stride * y;
3547 int str2 = strplane * y;
3548 for (int st = 0; st < strplane; st += 2)
3549 {
3550 bts[str1 + x + 0] = bytes[str2 + st];
3551 bts[str1 + x + 1] = bytes[str2 + st + 1];
3552 bts[str1 + x + 2] = bytes[ind + str2 + st];
3553 bts[str1 + x + 3] = bytes[ind + str2 + st + 1];
3554 bts[str1 + x + 4] = bytes[ind2 + str2 + st];
3555 bts[str1 + x + 5] = bytes[ind2 + str2 + st + 1];
3556 if (i == 1)
3557 {
3558 i = 0; x += 6;
3559 }
3560 i++;
3561 }
3562 }
3563 }
3564 else
3565 {
3566 int ind = strplane * h;
3567 int indb = ind * 2;
3568 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3569 {
3570 int x = 0;
3571 int str1 = Stride * y;
3572 int str2 = strplane * y;
3573 for (int st = 0; st < strplane; st++)
3574 {
3575 bts[str1 + x + 2] = bytes[str2 + st];
3576 bts[str1 + x + 1] = bytes[ind + str2 + st];
3577 bts[str1 + x] = bytes[indb + str2 + st];
3578 x += 3;
3579 }
3580 }
3581 }
3582 }
3583 bytes = bts;
3584 }
3585 if (!littleEndian)
3586 {
3587 Array.Reverse(Bytes);
3588 RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
3589 }
3590 if (isRGB)
3591 SwitchRedBlue();
3592 Plane = plane;
3593 }
3594 public BufferInfo(string file, Image im, ZCT coord, int index)
3595 {
3596 ID = CreateID(file, index);
3597 SizeX = im.Width;
3598 SizeY = im.Height;
3599 pixelFormat = im.PixelFormat;
3600 Coordinate = coord;
3601 if (isRGB)
3602 SwitchRedBlue();
3603 Image = im;
3604 }
3605 public BufferInfo(string file, Image im, ZCT coord, int index, Plane pl)
3606 {
3607 ID = CreateID(file, index);
3608 SizeX = im.Width;
3609 SizeY = im.Height;
3610 pixelFormat = im.PixelFormat;
3611 Coordinate = coord;
3612 if (isRGB)
3613 SwitchRedBlue();
3614 Image = im;
3615 Plane = pl;
3616 }
3617 public BufferInfo(int w, int h, PixelFormat px, byte[] bts, ZCT coord, string id)
3618 {
3619 ID = id;
3620 SizeX = w;
3621 SizeY = h;
3622 pixelFormat = px;
3623 Coordinate = coord;
3624 if (isRGB)
3625 SwitchRedBlue();
3626 Bytes = bts;

3634 public static Bitmap SwitchRedBlue(Bitmap image)
3635 {
3636 ExtractChannel cr = new ExtractChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.R);
3637 ExtractChannel cb = new ExtractChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.B);
3638 // apply the filter
3639 Bitmap rImage = cr.Apply(image);
3640 Bitmap bImage = cb.Apply(image);
3641
3642 ReplaceChannel replaceRFilter = new ReplaceChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.R, bImage);
3643 replaceRFilter.ApplyInPlace(image);
3644
3645 ReplaceChannel replaceBFilter = new ReplaceChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.B, rImage);
3646 replaceBFilter.ApplyInPlace(image);
3647 rImage.Dispose();
3648 bImage.Dispose();
3649 return image;
3650 }
3654 public void SwitchRedBlue()
3655 {
3656 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale || Bytes == null)
3657 return;
3658 //BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo(SizeX, SizeY,PixelFormat, bytes, Coordinate, ID);
3659 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
3660 for (int y = 0; y < SizeY; y++)
3661 {
3662 for (int x = 0; x < Stride; x += 3)
3663 {
3664 int i = y * Stride + x;
3665 byte bb = bytes[i + 2];
3666 bytes[i + 2] = bytes[i];
3667 bytes[i] = bb;
3668 }
3669 }
3670 else
3671 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb)
3672 for (int y = 0; y < SizeY; y++)
3673 {
3674 for (int x = 0; x < Stride; x += 4)
3675 {
3676 int i = y * Stride + x;
3677 byte bb = bytes[i + 2];
3678 bytes[i + 2] = bytes[i];
3679 bytes[i] = bb;
3680 }
3681 }
3682 else
3683 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
3684 {
3685 for (int y = 0; y < SizeY; y++)
3686 {
3687 //getting the pixels of current row
3688 int rowRGB = y * (Stride);
3689 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
3690 for (int x = 0; x < Stride; x += 6)
3691 {
3692 int indexRGB = x;
3693 byte b1 = bytes[rowRGB + indexRGB];
3694 byte b2 = bytes[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];
3695 //B
3696 bytes[rowRGB + indexRGB] = bytes[rowRGB + indexRGB + 4];
3697 bytes[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] = bytes[rowRGB + indexRGB + 5];
3698 //R
3699 bytes[rowRGB + indexRGB + 4] = b1;
3700 bytes[rowRGB + indexRGB + 5] = b2;
3701 }
3702 }
3703 }
3704 }
3712 public byte[] GetSaveBytes(bool littleEndian)
3713 {
3714 BufferInfo bf = this.Copy();
3715 if (!littleEndian)
3716 {
3717 bf.SwitchRedBlue();
3718 bf.RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
3719 }
3720 Bitmap bitmap = (Bitmap)bf.Image;
3721 BitmapData data = bitmap.LockBits(new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, SizeX, SizeY), ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, PixelFormat);
3722 IntPtr ptr = data.Scan0;
3723 int length = this.bytes.Length;
3724 byte[] bytes = new byte[length];
3725 Marshal.Copy(ptr, bytes, 0, length);
3726 if (!littleEndian)
3727 Array.Reverse(bytes);
3728 bitmap.UnlockBits(data);
3729 bitmap.Dispose();
3730 return bytes;
3731 }
3741 public static byte[] GetBuffer(Bitmap bmp, int stride)
3742 {
3743 BitmapData data = bmp.LockBits(new System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, bmp.Width, bmp.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, bmp.PixelFormat);
3744 IntPtr ptr = data.Scan0;
3745 int length = data.Stride * bmp.Height;
3746 byte[] bytes = new byte[length];
3747 Marshal.Copy(ptr, bytes, 0, length);
3748 Array.Reverse(bytes);
3749 bmp.UnlockBits(data);
3750
3751 return bytes;
3752 }
3760 public static Bitmap To24Bit(Bitmap b)
3761 {
3762 Bitmap bm = new Bitmap(b.Width, b.Height, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);
3763 System.Drawing.Graphics g = System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage(bm);
3764 if (b.PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale || b.PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
3765 {
3766 g.DrawImage(AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp(b), 0, 0);
3767 }
3768 else
3769 {
3770 g.DrawImage(b, 0, 0);
3771 }
3772 g.Dispose();
3773 return bm;
3774 }
3781 public static Bitmap To32Bit(Bitmap b)
3782 {
3783 Bitmap bm = new Bitmap(b.Width, b.Height, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
3784 if (b.PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale || b.PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
3785 {
3786 bm = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp(b);
3787 }
3788 System.Drawing.Graphics g = System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage(bm);
3789 g.DrawImage(b, 0, 0);
3790 return bm;
3791 }
3794 public void RGBTo32Bit()
3795 {
3796 Bitmap bm = new Bitmap(SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
3797 System.Drawing.Graphics g = System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage(bm);
3798 g.DrawImage((Bitmap)Image, 0, 0);
3799 Image = bm;
3800 }
3809 public static Bitmap SwitchChannels(Bitmap image, int c1, int c2)
3810 {
3811 ExtractChannel cr = new ExtractChannel((short)c1);
3812 ExtractChannel cb = new ExtractChannel((short)c2);
3813 // apply the filter
3814 Bitmap rImage = cr.Apply(image);
3815 Bitmap bImage = cb.Apply(image);
3816 ReplaceChannel replaceRFilter = new ReplaceChannel((short)c1, bImage);
3817 replaceRFilter.ApplyInPlace(image);
3818 ReplaceChannel replaceBFilter = new ReplaceChannel((short)c2, rImage);
3819 replaceBFilter.ApplyInPlace(image);
3820 rImage.Dispose();
3821 bImage.Dispose();
3822 return image;
3823 }
3824
3829 public BufferInfo Copy()
3830 {
3831 byte[] bt = new byte[Bytes.Length];
3832 for (int i = 0; i < bt.Length; i++)
3833 {
3834 bt[i] = bytes[i];
3835 }
3836 BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo(SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat, bt, Coordinate, ID);
3837 bf.plane = Plane;
3838 return bf;
3839 }
3844 public BufferInfo CopyInfo()
3845 {
3846 BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo(SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat, null, Coordinate, ID);
3847 bf.bytes = new byte[bf.Stride * bf.SizeY];
3848 bf.plane = Plane;
3849 return bf;
3850 }
3853 public void To8Bit()
3854 {
3855 Bitmap bm = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp((Bitmap)Image);
3856 bm.RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
3857 Image = bm;
3858 }
3860 public void To16Bit()
3861 {
3862 Bitmap bm = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert8bppTo16bpp((Bitmap)Image);
3863 Image = bm;
3864 }
3865
3869 public void ToRGB()
3870 {
3871 int stride;
3872 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
3873 stride = SizeX * 3 * 2;
3874 else
3875 stride = SizeX * 3;
3876
3877 int w = SizeX;
3878 int h = SizeY;
3879 byte[] bts = null;
3880 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
3881 {
3882 return;
3883 }
3884 else
3885 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
3886 {
3887 bts = new byte[h * SizeX * 3 * 2];
3888 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3889 {
3890 //getting the pixels of current row
3891 int rowRGB = y * (w * 2 * 3);
3892 int row16 = y * (w * 2);
3893 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
3894 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
3895 {
3896 int indexRGB = x * 6;
3897 int index16 = x * 2;
3898 //R
3899 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB] = Bytes[row16 + index16];
3900 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] = Bytes[row16 + index16 + 1];
3901 //G
3902 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] = Bytes[row16 + index16];
3903 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 3] = Bytes[row16 + index16 + 1];
3904 //B
3905 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 4] = Bytes[row16 + index16];
3906 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 5] = Bytes[row16 + index16 + 1];
3907 }
3908 }
3909 Bytes = bts;
3910 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
3911 }
3912 else
3913 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
3914 {
3915 return;
3916 }
3917 else
3918 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
3919 {
3920 bts = new byte[h * SizeX * 3];
3921 for (int y = 0; y < SizeY; y++)
3922 {
3923 //getting the pixels of current row
3924 int rowRGB = y * (SizeX * 3);
3925 int row8 = y * (SizeX);
3926 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
3927 for (int x = 0; x < SizeX; x++)
3928 {
3929 int indexRGB = x * 3;
3930 int index8 = x;
3931 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB] = Bytes[row8 + index8];
3932 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1] = Bytes[row8 + index8];
3933 bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2] = Bytes[row8 + index8];
3934 }
3935 }
3936 Bytes = bts;
3937 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
3938 }
3939 }
3943 public void RotateFlip(RotateFlipType rot)
3944 {
3945 Bitmap fl = (Bitmap)Image.Clone();
3946 fl.RotateFlip(rot);
3947 Image = fl;
3948 fl.Dispose();
3949 }
3950 /* Checking if the image is RGB or not. */
3951 public bool isRGB
3952 {
3953 get
3954 {
3955 if (pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed || pixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
3956 return false;
3957 else
3958 return true;
3959 }
3960 }
3964 public override string ToString()
3965 {
3966 return ID;
3967 }
3969 public void Dispose()
3970 {
3971 bytes = null;
3972 if (stats != null)
3973 {
3974 for (int i = 0; i < stats.Length; i++)
3975 {
3976 if (stats[i] != null)
3977 stats[i].Dispose();
3978 }
3979 }
3980 ID = null;
3981 file = null;
3982 GC.Collect();
3983 }
3984
3985 public static BufferInfo operator /(BufferInfo a, BufferInfo b)
3986 {
3987 BufferInfo bf = a.CopyInfo();
3988 for (int y = 0; y < a.SizeY; y++)
3989 {
3990 for (int x = 0; x < a.SizeX; x++)
3991 {
3992 bf.SetPixel(x, y, a.GetPixel(x, y) / b.GetPixel(x, y));
3993 }
3994 }
3995 return bf;
3996 }
3997 public static BufferInfo operator *(BufferInfo a, BufferInfo b)
3998 {
3999 BufferInfo bf = a.CopyInfo();
4000 for (int y = 0; y < a.SizeY; y++)
4001 {
4002 for (int x = 0; x < a.SizeX; x++)
4003 {
4004 bf.SetPixel(x, y, a.GetPixel(x, y) * b.GetPixel(x, y));
4005 }
4006 }
4007 return bf;
4008 }
4009 public static BufferInfo operator +(BufferInfo a, BufferInfo b)
4010 {
4011 BufferInfo bf = a.CopyInfo();
4012 for (int y = 0; y < a.SizeY; y++)
4013 {
4014 for (int x = 0; x < a.SizeX; x++)
4015 {
4016 bf.SetPixel(x, y, a.GetPixel(x, y) + b.GetPixel(x, y));
4017 }
4018 }
4019 return bf;
4020 }
4021 public static BufferInfo operator -(BufferInfo a, BufferInfo b)
4022 {
4023 BufferInfo bf = a.CopyInfo();
4024 for (int y = 0; y < a.SizeY; y++)
4025 {
4026 for (int x = 0; x < a.SizeX; x++)
4027 {
4028 bf.SetPixel(x, y, a.GetPixel(x, y) - b.GetPixel(x, y));
4029 }
4030 }
4031 return bf;
4032 }
4033
4034 public static BufferInfo operator /(BufferInfo a, float b)
4035 {
4036 BufferInfo bf = a.CopyInfo();
4037 for (int y = 0; y < a.SizeY; y++)
4038 {
4039 for (int x = 0; x < a.SizeX; x++)
4040 {
4041 bf.SetPixel(x, y, a.GetPixel(x, y) / b);
4042 }
4043 }
4044 return bf;
4045 }
4046 public static BufferInfo operator *(BufferInfo a, float b)
4047 {
4048 BufferInfo bf = a.CopyInfo();
4049 for (int y = 0; y < a.SizeY; y++)
4050 {
4051 for (int x = 0; x < a.SizeX; x++)
4052 {
4053 bf.SetPixel(x, y, a.GetPixel(x, y) * b);
4054 }
4055 }
4056 return bf;
4057 }
4058 public static BufferInfo operator +(BufferInfo a, float b)
4059 {
4060 BufferInfo bf = a.CopyInfo();
4061 for (int y = 0; y < a.SizeY; y++)
4062 {
4063 for (int x = 0; x < a.SizeX; x++)
4064 {
4065 bf.SetPixel(x, y, a.GetPixel(x, y) + b);
4066 }
4067 }
4068 return bf;
4069 }
4070 public static BufferInfo operator -(BufferInfo a, float b)
4071 {
4072 BufferInfo bf = a.CopyInfo();
4073 for (int y = 0; y < a.SizeY; y++)
4074 {
4075 for (int x = 0; x < a.SizeX; x++)
4076 {
4077 bf.SetPixel(x, y, a.GetPixel(x, y) - b);
4078 }
4079 }
4080 return bf;
4081 }
4082
4083 public static BufferInfo operator /(BufferInfo a, ColorS b)
4084 {
4085 BufferInfo bf = a.CopyInfo();
4086 for (int y = 0; y < a.SizeY; y++)
4087 {
4088 for (int x = 0; x < a.SizeX; x++)
4089 {
4090 bf.SetPixel(x, y, a.GetPixel(x, y) / b);
4091 }
4092 }
4093 return bf;
4094 }
4095 public static BufferInfo operator *(BufferInfo a, ColorS b)
4096 {
4097 BufferInfo bf = a.Copy();
4098 for (int y = 0; y < a.SizeY; y++)
4099 {
4100 for (int x = 0; x < a.SizeX; x++)
4101 {
4102 bf.SetPixel(x, y, a.GetPixel(x, y) * b);
4103 }
4104 }
4105 return bf;
4106 }
4107 public static BufferInfo operator +(BufferInfo a, ColorS b)
4108 {
4109 BufferInfo bf = a.CopyInfo();
4110 for (int y = 0; y < a.SizeY; y++)
4111 {
4112 for (int x = 0; x < a.SizeX; x++)
4113 {
4114 bf.SetPixel(x, y, a.GetPixel(x, y) + b);
4115 }
4116 }
4117 return bf;
4118 }
4119 public static BufferInfo operator -(BufferInfo a, ColorS b)
4120 {
4121 BufferInfo bf = a.CopyInfo();
4122 for (int y = 0; y < a.SizeY; y++)
4123 {
4124 for (int x = 0; x < a.SizeX; x++)
4125 {
4126 bf.SetPixel(x, y, a.GetPixel(x, y) - b);
4127 }
4128 }
4129 return bf;
4130 }
4131 }
4132
4133 /* It's a class that holds a string, an IFilter, and a Type */
4134 public class Filt
4135 {
4136 /* Defining an enum. */
4137 public enum Type
4138 {
4139 Base,
4140 Base2,
4141 InPlace,
4142 InPlace2,
4143 InPlacePartial,
4144 Resize,
4145 Rotate,
4146 Transformation,
4147 Copy
4148 }
4149 public string name;
4150 public IFilter filt;
4151 public Type type;
4152 public Filt(string s, IFilter f, Type t)
4153 {
4154 name = s;
4155 filt = f;
4156 type = t;
4157 }
4158 }
4159 public static class Filters
4160 {
4166 public static Filt GetFilter(string name)
4167 {
4168 return filters[name];
4169 }
4170 public static Dictionary<string, Filt> filters = new Dictionary<string, Filt>();
4179 public static BioImage Base(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
4180 {
4181 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
4182 if (!inPlace)
4183 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
4184 try
4185 {
4186 Filt f = filters[name];
4187 BaseFilter fi = (BaseFilter)f.filt;
4188 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
4189 {
4190 img.Buffers[i].SetImage(fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i].Image), false); ;
4191 }
4192 if (!inPlace)
4193 {
4194 Images.AddImage(img, true);
4195 }
4196 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Filters.Base(" + '"' + id +
4197 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
4198 }
4199 catch (Exception e)
4200 {
4201 MessageBox.Show(e.ToString(), "Filter Error");
4202 }
4203 return img;
4204 }
4215 public static BioImage Base2(string id, string id2, string name, bool inPlace)
4216 {
4217 BioImage c2 = Images.GetImage(id);
4218 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id2);
4219 if (!inPlace)
4220 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
4221 try
4222 {
4223 Filt f = filters[name];
4224 BaseFilter2 fi = (BaseFilter2)f.filt;
4225 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
4226 {
4227 fi.OverlayImage = (Bitmap)c2.Buffers[i].Image;
4228 img.Buffers[i].SetImage(fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i].Image), false);
4229 }
4230 if (!inPlace)
4231 {
4232 Images.AddImage(img, true);
4233 }
4234 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Filters.Base2(" + '"' + id + '"' + "," +
4235 '"' + id2 + '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
4236 return img;
4237 }
4238 catch (Exception e)
4239 {
4240 MessageBox.Show(e.ToString(), "Filter Error");
4241 }
4242 return img;
4243 }
4252 public static BioImage InPlace(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
4253 {
4254 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
4255 if (!inPlace)
4256 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
4257 try
4258 {
4259 Filt f = filters[name];
4260 BaseInPlaceFilter fi = (BaseInPlaceFilter)f.filt;
4261 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
4262 {
4263 img.Buffers[i].SetImage(fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i].Image), false);
4264 }
4265 if (!inPlace)
4266 {
4267 Images.AddImage(img, true);
4268 }
4269 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Filters.InPlace(" + '"' + id +
4270 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
4271 return img;
4272 }
4273 catch (Exception e)
4274 {
4275 MessageBox.Show(e.ToString(), "Filter Error");
4276 }
4277 return img;
4278 }
4289 public static BioImage InPlace2(string id, string id2, string name, bool inPlace)
4290 {
4291 BioImage c2 = Images.GetImage(id);
4292 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id2);
4293 if (!inPlace)
4294 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
4295 try
4296 {
4297 Filt f = filters[name];
4298 BaseInPlaceFilter2 fi = (BaseInPlaceFilter2)f.filt;
4299 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
4300 {
4301 fi.OverlayImage = (Bitmap)c2.Buffers[i].Image;
4302 img.Buffers[i].SetImage(fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i].Image), false);
4303 }
4304 if (!inPlace)
4305 {
4306 Images.AddImage(img, true);
4307 }
4308 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Filters.InPlace2(" + '"' + id + '"' + "," +
4309 '"' + id2 + '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
4310 return img;
4311 }
4312 catch (Exception e)
4313 {
4314 MessageBox.Show(e.ToString(), "Filter Error");
4315 }
4316 return img;
4317 }
4326 public static BioImage InPlacePartial(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
4327 {
4328 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
4329 if (!inPlace)
4330 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
4331 try
4332 {
4333 Filt f = filters[name];
4334 BaseInPlacePartialFilter fi = (BaseInPlacePartialFilter)f.filt;
4335 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
4336 {
4337 img.Buffers[i].SetImage(fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i].Image), false);
4338 }
4339 if (!inPlace)
4340 {
4341 Images.AddImage(img, true);
4342 }
4343 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Filters.InPlacePartial(" + '"' + id +
4344 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
4345 return img;
4346 }
4347 catch (Exception e)
4348 {
4349 MessageBox.Show(e.ToString(), "Filter Error");
4350 }
4351 return img;
4352 }
4362 public static BioImage Resize(string id, string name, bool inPlace, int w, int h)
4363 {
4364 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
4365 if (!inPlace)
4366 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
4367 try
4368 {
4369 Filt f = filters[name];
4370 BaseResizeFilter fi = (BaseResizeFilter)f.filt;
4371 fi.NewHeight = h;
4372 fi.NewWidth = w;
4373 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
4374 {
4375 img.Buffers[i].SetImage(fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i].Image), false);
4376 }
4377 if (!inPlace)
4378 {
4379 Images.AddImage(img, true);
4380 }
4381 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Filters.Resize(" + '"' + id +
4382 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + "," + w + "," + h + ");");
4383 }
4384 catch (Exception e)
4385 {
4386 MessageBox.Show(e.ToString(), "Filter Error");
4387 }
4388 return img;
4389 }
4402 public static BioImage Rotate(string id, string name, bool inPlace, float angle, int a, int r, int g, int b)
4403 {
4404 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
4405 if (!inPlace)
4406 img = BioImage.Copy(Images.GetImage(id));
4407 try
4408 {
4409 Filt f = filters[name];
4410 BaseRotateFilter fi = (BaseRotateFilter)f.filt;
4411 fi.Angle = angle;
4412 fi.FillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(a, r, g, b);
4413 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
4414 {
4415 img.Buffers[i].SetImage(fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i].Image), false);
4416 }
4417 if (!inPlace)
4418 {
4419 Images.AddImage(img,true);
4420 }
4421 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Filters.Rotate(" + '"' + id +
4422 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + "," + angle.ToString() + "," +
4423 a + "," + r + "," + g + "," + b + ");");
4424 }
4425 catch (Exception e)
4426 {
4427 MessageBox.Show(e.ToString(), "Filter Error");
4428 }
4429 return img;
4430
4431 }
4441 public static BioImage Transformation(string id, string name, bool inPlace, float angle)
4442 {
4443 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
4444 if (!inPlace)
4445 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
4446 try
4447 {
4448 Filt f = filters[name];
4449 BaseTransformationFilter fi = (BaseTransformationFilter)f.filt;
4450 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
4451 {
4452 img.Buffers[i].SetImage(fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i].Image), false);
4453 }
4454 if (!inPlace)
4455 {
4456 Images.AddImage(img,true);
4457 }
4458 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Filters.Transformation(" + '"' + id +
4459 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + "," + angle + ");");
4460 }
4461 catch (Exception e)
4462 {
4463 MessageBox.Show(e.ToString(), "Filter Error");
4464 }
4465 return img;
4466 }
4475 public static BioImage Copy(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
4476 {
4477 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
4478 if (!inPlace)
4479 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
4480 try
4481 {
4482 Filt f = filters[name];
4483 BaseUsingCopyPartialFilter fi = (BaseUsingCopyPartialFilter)f.filt;
4484 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
4485 {
4486 img.Buffers[i].Image = fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i].Image);
4487 }
4488 if (!inPlace)
4489 {
4490 Images.AddImage(img, true);
4491 }
4492 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Filters.Copy(" + '"' + id +
4493 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
4494 }
4495 catch (Exception e)
4496 {
4497 MessageBox.Show(e.ToString(), "Filter Error");
4498 }
4499 return img;
4500 }
4510 public static BioImage Crop(string id, double x, double y, double w, double h)
4511 {
4512 BioImage c = Images.GetImage(id);
4513 RectangleF r = c.ToImageSpace(new RectangleD(x, y, w, h));
4514 Rectangle rec = new Rectangle((int)r.X, (int)r.Y, (int)r.Width, (int)r.Height);
4515 BioImage img = BioImage.Copy(c, false);
4516 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
4517 {
4518 img.Buffers[i].Crop(rec);
4519 }
4520 Images.AddImage(img,false);
4521 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Filters.Crop(" + '"' + id + '"' + "," + x + "," + y + "," + w + "," + h + ");");
4522 App.tabsView.AddTab(img);
4523 return img;
4524 }
4531 public static BioImage Crop(string id, RectangleD r)
4532 {
4533 return Crop(id, r.X, r.Y, r.W, r.H);
4534 }
4537 public static void Init()
4538 {
4539 //Base Filters
4540 Filt f = new Filt("AdaptiveSmoothing", new AdaptiveSmoothing(), Filt.Type.Base);
4541 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4542 f = new Filt("BayerFilter", new BayerFilter(), Filt.Type.Base);
4543 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4544 f = new Filt("BayerFilterOptimized", new BayerFilterOptimized(), Filt.Type.Base);
4545 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4546 f = new Filt("BayerDithering", new BayerDithering(), Filt.Type.Base);
4547 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4548 f = new Filt("ConnectedComponentsLabeling", new ConnectedComponentsLabeling(), Filt.Type.Base);
4549 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4550 f = new Filt("ExtractChannel", new ExtractChannel(), Filt.Type.Base);
4551 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4552 f = new Filt("ExtractNormalizedRGBChannel", new ExtractNormalizedRGBChannel(), Filt.Type.Base);
4553 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4554 f = new Filt("Grayscale", new Grayscale(0.2125, 0.7154, 0.0721), Filt.Type.Base);
4555 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4556 //f = new Filt("TexturedFilter", new TexturedFilter());
4557 //filters.Add(f.name, f);
4558 f = new Filt("WaterWave", new WaterWave(), Filt.Type.Base);
4559 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4560 f = new Filt("YCbCrExtractChannel", new YCbCrExtractChannel(), Filt.Type.Base);
4561 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4562
4563 //BaseFilter2
4564 f = new Filt("ThresholdedDifference", new ThresholdedDifference(), Filt.Type.Base2);
4565 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4566 f = new Filt("ThresholdedEuclideanDifference", new ThresholdedDifference(), Filt.Type.Base2);
4567 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4568
4569
4570 //BaseInPlaceFilter
4571 f = new Filt("BackwardQuadrilateralTransformation", new BackwardQuadrilateralTransformation(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
4572 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4573 f = new Filt("BlobsFiltering", new BlobsFiltering(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
4574 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4575 f = new Filt("BottomHat", new BottomHat(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
4576 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4577 f = new Filt("BradleyLocalThresholding", new BradleyLocalThresholding(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
4578 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4579 f = new Filt("CanvasCrop", new CanvasCrop(Rectangle.Empty), Filt.Type.InPlace);
4580 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4581 f = new Filt("CanvasFill", new CanvasFill(Rectangle.Empty), Filt.Type.InPlace);
4582 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4583 f = new Filt("CanvasMove", new CanvasMove(new IntPoint()), Filt.Type.InPlace);
4584 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4585 f = new Filt("FillHoles", new FillHoles(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
4586 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4587 f = new Filt("FlatFieldCorrection", new FlatFieldCorrection(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
4588 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4589 f = new Filt("TopHat", new TopHat(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
4590 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4591
4592 //BaseInPlaceFilter2
4593 f = new Filt("Add", new Add(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
4594 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4595 f = new Filt("Difference", new Difference(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
4596 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4597 f = new Filt("Intersect", new Intersect(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
4598 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4599 f = new Filt("Merge", new Merge(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
4600 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4601 f = new Filt("Morph", new Morph(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
4602 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4603 f = new Filt("MoveTowards", new MoveTowards(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
4604 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4605 f = new Filt("StereoAnaglyph", new StereoAnaglyph(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
4606 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4607 f = new Filt("Subtract", new Subtract(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
4608 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4609 //f = new Filt("Add", new TexturedMerge(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
4610 //filters.Add(f.name, f);
4611
4612 //BaseInPlacePartialFilter
4613 f = new Filt("AdditiveNoise", new AdditiveNoise(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
4614 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4615
4616 //f = new Filt("ApplyMask", new ApplyMask(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial2);
4617 //filters.Add(f.name, f);
4618 f = new Filt("BrightnessCorrection", new BrightnessCorrection(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
4619 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4620 f = new Filt("ChannelFiltering", new ChannelFiltering(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
4621 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4622 f = new Filt("ColorFiltering", new ColorFiltering(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
4623 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4624 f = new Filt("ColorRemapping", new ColorRemapping(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
4625 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4626 f = new Filt("ContrastCorrection", new ContrastCorrection(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
4627 filters.Add(f.name, f);

4710 filters.Add(f.name, f);

4717 //filters.Add(f.name, f);
4718 f = new Filt("Shrink", new Shrink(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
4719 filters.Add(f.name, f);

4728 f = new Filt("BinaryDilatation3x3", new BinaryDilatation3x3(), Filt.Type.Copy);
4729 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4730 f = new Filt("BilateralSmoothing ", new BilateralSmoothing(), Filt.Type.Copy);
4731 filters.Add(f.name, f);

4733 filters.Add(f.name, f);
4734
4735 }
4736 }
4737 /* It calculates the statistics of an image */
4738 public class Statistics
4739 {
4740 private int[] values = null;
4741 public int[] Values
4742 {
4743 get { return values; }
4744 set { values = value; }
4745 }
4746 private int bitsPerPixel;
4747 private int min = ushort.MaxValue;
4748 private int max = ushort.MinValue;
4749 private float stackMin = ushort.MaxValue;
4750 private float stackMax = ushort.MinValue;
4751 private float stackMean = 0;
4752 private float stackMedian = 0;
4753 private float mean = 0;
4754 private float median = 0;
4755 private float meansum = 0;
4756 private float[] stackValues = new float[ushort.MaxValue];
4757 private int count = 0;
4758 public int Min
4759 {
4760 get { return min; }
4761 }
4762 public int Max
4763 {
4764 get { return max; }
4765 }
4766 public double Mean
4767 {
4768 get { return mean; }
4769 }
4770 public int BitsPerPixel
4771 {
4772 get { return bitsPerPixel; }
4773 }
4774 public float Median
4775 {
4776 get
4777 {
4778 return median;
4779 }
4780 }
4781 public float StackMedian
4782 {
4783 get
4784 {
4785 return stackMedian;
4786 }
4787 }
4788 public float StackMean
4789 {
4790 get
4791 {
4792 return stackMean;
4793 }
4794 }
4795 public float StackMax
4796 {
4797 get
4798 {
4799 return stackMax;
4800 }
4801 }
4802 public float StackMin
4803 {
4804 get
4805 {
4806 return stackMin;
4807 }
4808 }
4809 public float[] StackValues
4810 {
4811 get { return stackValues; }
4812 }
4813 public Statistics(bool bit16)
4814 {
4815 values = new int[ushort.MaxValue + 1];
4816 if (bit16)
4817 {
4818 bitsPerPixel = 16;
4819 }
4820 else
4821 {
4822 bitsPerPixel = 8;
4823 }
4824 }
4836 public static Statistics[] FromBytes(byte[] bts, int w, int h, int rGBChannels, int BitsPerPixel, int stride)
4837 {
4838 Statistics[] sts = new Statistics[rGBChannels];
4839 bool bit16 = false;
4840 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
4841 bit16 = true;
4842 for (int i = 0; i < rGBChannels; i++)
4843 {
4844 sts[i] = new Statistics(bit16);
4845 sts[i].max = ushort.MinValue;
4846 sts[i].min = ushort.MaxValue;
4847 sts[i].bitsPerPixel = BitsPerPixel;
4848 }
4849
4850 float sumr = 0;
4851 float sumg = 0;
4852 float sumb = 0;
4853 float suma = 0;
4854 if (BitsPerPixel > 8)
4855 {
4856 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
4857 {
4858 for (int x = 0; x < stride; x += 2 * rGBChannels)
4859 {
4860 if (rGBChannels == 3)
4861 {
4862 ushort b = BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, (y * stride + (x)));
4863 ushort g = BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, (y * stride + (x + 2)));
4864 ushort r = BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, (y * stride + (x + 4)));
4865 if (sts[0].max < r)
4866 sts[0].max = r;
4867 if (sts[0].min > r)
4868 sts[0].min = r;
4869 sts[0].values[r]++;
4870 sumr += r;
4871 if (sts[1].max < g)
4872 sts[1].max = g;
4873 if (sts[1].min > g)
4874 sts[1].min = g;
4875 sts[1].values[g]++;
4876 sumg += g;
4877 if (sts[2].max < b)
4878 sts[2].max = b;
4879 if (sts[2].min > b)
4880 sts[2].min = b;
4881 sts[2].values[b]++;
4882 sumb += b;
4883 }
4884 else
4885 {
4886 ushort r = BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, (y * stride + (x)));
4887 if (sts[0].max < r)
4888 sts[0].max = r;
4889 if (sts[0].min > r)
4890 sts[0].min = r;
4891 sts[0].values[r]++;
4892 sumr += r;
4893 }
4894 }
4895 }
4896 }
4897 else
4898 {
4899 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
4900 {
4901 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
4902 {
4903 if (rGBChannels > 1)
4904 {
4905 byte b = bts[y * stride + x];
4906 byte g = bts[y * stride + (x + 1)];
4907 byte r = bts[y * stride + (x + 2)];
4908 byte a = 0;
4909 if (rGBChannels == 4)
4910 {
4911 a = bts[y * stride + x];
4912 b = bts[y * stride + (x + 1)];
4913 g = bts[y * stride + (x + 2)];
4914 r = bts[y * stride + (x + 3)];
4915
4916 if (sts[0].max < a)
4917 sts[0].max = a;
4918 if (sts[0].min > a)
4919 sts[0].min = a;
4920 sts[0].values[a]++;
4921 suma += a;
4922 if (sts[1].max < b)
4923 sts[1].max = b;
4924 if (sts[1].min > b)
4925 sts[1].min = b;
4926 sts[1].values[b]++;
4927 sumb += b;
4928 if (sts[2].max < g)
4929 sts[2].max = g;
4930 if (sts[2].min > g)
4931 sts[2].min = g;
4932 sts[2].values[g]++;
4933 sumg += g;
4934 if (sts[3].max < r)
4935 sts[3].max = r;
4936 if (sts[3].min > r)
4937 sts[3].min = r;
4938 sts[3].values[r]++;
4939 sumr += r;
4940 }
4941 else
4942 {
4943 if (sts[0].max < r)
4944 sts[0].max = r;
4945 if (sts[0].min > r)
4946 sts[0].min = r;
4947 sts[0].values[r]++;
4948 sumr += r;
4949 if (sts[1].max < g)
4950 sts[1].max = g;
4951 if (sts[1].min > g)
4952 sts[1].min = g;
4953 sts[1].values[g]++;
4954 sumg += g;
4955 if (sts[2].max < b)
4956 sts[2].max = b;
4957 if (sts[2].min > b)
4958 sts[2].min = b;
4959 sts[2].values[b]++;
4960 sumb += b;
4961 }
4962 }
4963 else
4964 {
4965 byte r = bts[y * stride + x];
4966 if (sts[0].max < r)
4967 sts[0].max = r;
4968 if (sts[0].min > r)
4969 sts[0].min = r;
4970 sts[0].values[r]++;
4971 sumr += r;
4972 }
4973 }
4974 }
4975 }
4976
4977 sts[0].mean = sumr / (float)(w * h);
4978 if (rGBChannels > 1)
4979 {
4980 sts[1].mean = sumg / (float)(w * h);
4981 sts[2].mean = sumb / (float)(w * h);
4982 if (rGBChannels == 4)
4983 sts[3].mean = suma / (float)(w * h);
4984 }
4985
4986 for (int i = 0; i < sts[0].values.Length; i++)
4987 {
4988 if (sts[0].median < sts[0].values[i])
4989 sts[0].median = sts[0].values[i];
4990 }
4991 if (rGBChannels > 1)
4992 {
4993 for (int i = 0; i < sts[1].values.Length; i++)
4994 {
4995 if (sts[1].median < sts[1].values[i])
4996 sts[1].median = sts[1].values[i];
4997 if (sts[2].median < sts[2].values[i])
4998 sts[2].median = sts[2].values[i];
4999 if (rGBChannels == 4)
5000 {
5001 if (sts[3].median < sts[3].values[i])
5002 sts[3].median = sts[3].values[i];
5003 }
5004 }
5005 }
5006 return sts;
5007 }
5013 public static Statistics[] FromBytes(BufferInfo bf)
5014 {
5015 return FromBytes(bf.Bytes, bf.SizeX, bf.SizeY, bf.RGBChannelsCount, bf.BitsPerPixel, bf.Stride);
5016 }
5017 public static BioImage b = null;
5018 public static Dictionary<string, BufferInfo> list = new Dictionary<string, BufferInfo>();
5020 public static void FromBytes()
5021 {
5022 string name = Thread.CurrentThread.Name;
5023 list[name].Stats = FromBytes(list[name]);
5024 list.Remove(name);
5025 }
5029 public static void CalcStatistics(BufferInfo bf)
5030 {
5031 bf.Stats = null;
5032 Thread th = new Thread(FromBytes);
5033 th.Name = bf.ID;
5034 list.Add(th.Name.ToString(), bf);
5035 th.Start();
5036 }
5038 public static void ClearCalcBuffer()
5039 {
5040 list.Clear();
5041 }
5045 public void AddStatistics(Statistics s)
5046 {
5047 if (stackValues == null)
5048 {
5049 if (bitsPerPixel > 8)
5050 stackValues = new float[ushort.MaxValue + 1];
5051 else
5052 stackValues = new float[byte.MaxValue + 1];
5053 }
5054 if (stackMax < s.max)
5055 stackMax = s.max;
5056 if (stackMin > s.min)
5057 stackMin = s.min;
5058 meansum += s.mean;
5059 for (int i = 0; i < stackValues.Length; i++)
5060 {
5061 stackValues[i] += s.values[i];
5062 }
5063 values = s.values;
5064 count++;
5065 }
5078 public void MeanHistogram()
5079 {
5080 for (int i = 0; i < stackValues.Length; i++)
5081 {
5082 stackValues[i] /= (float)count;
5083 }
5084 stackMean = (float)meansum / (float)count;
5085
5086 for (int i = 0; i < stackValues.Length; i++)
5087 {
5088 if (stackMedian < stackValues[i])
5089 stackMedian = (float)stackValues[i];
5090 }
5091
5092 }
5093
5100 public PointF[] GetPoints(int bin)
5101 {
5102 PointF[] pts = new PointF[stackValues.Length];
5103 for (int x = 0; x < stackValues.Length; x += bin)
5104 {
5105 pts[x].X = x;
5106 pts[x].Y = stackValues[x];
5107 }
5108 return pts;
5109 }
5111 public void Dispose()
5112 {
5113 stackValues = null;
5114 values = null;
5115 }
5117 public void DisposeHistogram()
5118 {
5119 stackValues = null;
5120 values = null;
5121 }
5122 }
5123 /* The class is used to store the physical and stage sizes of an image */
5124 public class ImageInfo
5125 {
5126 bool HasPhysicalXY;
5127 bool HasPhysicalXYZ = false;
5128 private double physicalSizeX = -1;
5129 private double physicalSizeY = -1;
5130 private double physicalSizeZ = -1;
5131 public double PhysicalSizeX
5132 {
5133 get { return physicalSizeX; }
5134 set
5135 {
5136 physicalSizeX = value;
5137 HasPhysicalXY = true;
5138 }
5139 }
5140 public double PhysicalSizeY
5141 {
5142 get { return physicalSizeY; }
5143 set
5144 {
5145 physicalSizeY = value;
5146 HasPhysicalXY = true;
5147 }
5148 }
5149 public double PhysicalSizeZ
5150 {
5151 get { return physicalSizeZ; }
5152 set
5153 {
5154 physicalSizeZ = value;
5155 HasPhysicalXYZ = true;
5156 }
5157 }
5158
5159 bool HasStageXY = false;
5160 bool HasStageXYZ = false;
5161 public double stageSizeX = -1;
5162 public double stageSizeY = -1;
5163 public double stageSizeZ = -1;
5164 public double StageSizeX
5165 {
5166 get { return stageSizeX; }
5167 set
5168 {
5169 stageSizeX = value;
5170 HasStageXY = true;
5171 }
5172 }
5173 public double StageSizeY
5174 {
5175 get { return stageSizeY; }
5176 set
5177 {
5178 stageSizeY = value;
5179 HasStageXY = true;
5180 }
5181 }
5182 public double StageSizeZ
5183 {
5184 get { return stageSizeZ; }
5185 set
5186 {
5187 stageSizeZ = value;
5188 HasStageXYZ = true;
5189 }
5190 }
5191
5192 private int series = 0;
5193 public int Series
5194 {
5195 get { return series; }
5196 set { series = value; }
5197 }
5198
5199 public ImageInfo Copy()
5200 {
5201 ImageInfo inf = new ImageInfo();
5202 inf.PhysicalSizeX = PhysicalSizeX;
5203 inf.PhysicalSizeY = PhysicalSizeY;
5204 inf.PhysicalSizeZ = PhysicalSizeZ;
5205 inf.StageSizeX = StageSizeX;
5206 inf.StageSizeY = StageSizeY;
5207 inf.StageSizeZ = StageSizeZ;
5208 inf.HasPhysicalXY = HasPhysicalXY;
5209 inf.HasPhysicalXYZ = HasPhysicalXYZ;
5210 inf.StageSizeX = StageSizeX;
5211 inf.StageSizeY = StageSizeY;
5212 inf.StageSizeZ = StageSizeZ;
5213 inf.HasStageXY = HasStageXY;
5214 inf.HasStageXYZ = HasStageXYZ;
5215 return inf;
5216 }
5217
5218 }
5219 public class BioImage : IDisposable
5220 {
5221 public int[,,] Coords;
5222 private ZCT coordinate;
5223 /* A property. */
5224 public ZCT Coordinate
5225 {
5226 get
5227 {
5228 return coordinate;
5229 }
5230 set
5231 {
5232 coordinate = value;
5233 }
5234 }
5235
5236 private string id;
5237 public List<Channel> Channels = new List<Channel>();
5238 public List<Resolution> Resolutions = new List<Resolution>();
5239 public List<BufferInfo> Buffers = new List<BufferInfo>();
5240 public VolumeD Volume
5241 {
5242 get { return new VolumeD(new Point3D(StageSizeX, StageSizeY, StageSizeZ), new Point3D(SizeX * PhysicalSizeX, SizeY * PhysicalSizeY, SizeZ * PhysicalSizeZ)); }
5243 }
5244 public List<ROI> Annotations = new List<ROI>();
5245 public OpenSlideImage slideImage;
5246 public string filename = "";
5247 public string script = "";
5248 public string Filename
5249 {
5250 get
5251 {
5252 return filename;
5253 }
5254 set
5255 {
5256 filename = value;
5257 }
5258 }
5259 public int[] rgbChannels = new int[3];
5260 public int RGBChannelCount
5261 {
5262 get
5263 {
5264 return Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount;
5265 }
5266 }
5267 public int? MacroResolution { get; set; }
5268 public int? LabelResolution { get; set; }
5269 void SetLabelMacroResolutions()
5270 {
5271 int i = 0;
5272 Size s = new Size(int.MaxValue, int.MaxValue);
5273 bool noMacro = true;
5274 PixelFormat pf = Resolutions[0].PixelFormat;
5275 foreach (Resolution res in Resolutions)
5276 {
5277 if (res.SizeX < s.Width && res.SizeY < s.Height)
5278 {
5279 //If the pixel format changes it means this is the macro resolution.
5280 if (pf != res.PixelFormat)
5281 {
5282 noMacro = false;
5283 break;
5284 }
5285 pf = res.PixelFormat;
5286 s = new Size(res.SizeX, res.SizeY);
5287 }
5288 else
5289 {
5290 //If this level is bigger than the previous this is the macro resolution.
5291 noMacro = false;
5292 break;
5293 }
5294 i++;
5295 }
5296 if (!noMacro)
5297 {
5298 MacroResolution = i;
5299 LabelResolution = i + 1;
5300 }
5301 }
5302 public int bitsPerPixel;
5303 public int imagesPerSeries = 0;
5304 public int seriesCount = 1;
5305 public double frameInterval = 0;
5306 public bool littleEndian = false;
5307 public bool isGroup = false;
5308 public long loadTimeMS = 0;
5309 public long loadTimeTicks = 0;
5310 public bool selected = false;
5311 private bool ispyramidal = false;
5312 public int resolution = 0;
5313 public Statistics Statistics
5314 {
5315 get
5316 {
5317 return statistics;
5318 }
5319 set
5320 {
5321 statistics = value;
5322 }
5323 }
5324 private int sizeZ, sizeC, sizeT;
5325 private Statistics statistics;
5326 int tileX, tileY;
5327 ImageInfo imageInfo = new ImageInfo();
5328 public static BioImage Copy(BioImage b, bool rois)
5329 {
5330 BioImage bi = new BioImage(b.ID);
5331 if (rois)
5332 foreach (ROI an in b.Annotations)
5333 {
5334 bi.Annotations.Add(an);
5335 }
5336 foreach (BufferInfo bf in b.Buffers)
5337 {
5338 bi.Buffers.Add(bf.Copy());
5339 }
5340 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
5341 {
5342 bi.Channels.Add(c);
5343 }
5344 bi.Coords = b.Coords;
5345 bi.sizeZ = b.sizeZ;
5346 bi.sizeC = b.sizeC;
5347 bi.sizeT = b.sizeT;
5348 bi.series = b.series;
5349 bi.seriesCount = b.seriesCount;
5350 bi.frameInterval = b.frameInterval;
5351 bi.littleEndian = b.littleEndian;
5352 bi.isGroup = b.isGroup;
5353 bi.imageInfo = b.imageInfo.Copy();
5354 bi.bitsPerPixel = b.bitsPerPixel;
5355 bi.file = b.file;
5356 bi.filename = b.filename;
5357 bi.Resolutions = b.Resolutions;
5358 bi.statistics = b.statistics;
5359 return bi;
5360 }
5361 public static BioImage Copy(BioImage b)
5362 {
5363 return Copy(b, true);
5364 }
5365 public BioImage Copy(bool rois)
5366 {
5367 return BioImage.Copy(this, rois);
5368 }
5369 public BioImage Copy()
5370 {
5371 return BioImage.Copy(this, true);
5372 }
5373 public static BioImage CopyInfo(BioImage b, bool copyAnnotations, bool copyChannels)
5374 {
5375 BioImage bi = new BioImage(b.ID);
5376 if (copyAnnotations)
5377 foreach (ROI an in b.Annotations)
5378 {
5379 bi.Annotations.Add(an);
5380 }
5381 if (copyChannels)
5382 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
5383 {
5384 bi.Channels.Add(c.Copy());
5385 }
5386
5387 bi.Coords = b.Coords;
5388 bi.sizeZ = b.sizeZ;
5389 bi.sizeC = b.sizeC;
5390 bi.sizeT = b.sizeT;
5391 bi.series = b.series;
5392 bi.seriesCount = b.seriesCount;
5393 bi.frameInterval = b.frameInterval;
5394 bi.littleEndian = b.littleEndian;
5395 bi.isGroup = b.isGroup;
5396 bi.imageInfo = b.imageInfo.Copy();
5397 bi.bitsPerPixel = b.bitsPerPixel;
5398 bi.Resolutions = b.Resolutions;
5399 bi.Coordinate = b.Coordinate;
5400 bi.file = b.file;
5401 bi.Filename = b.Filename;
5402 bi.ID = Images.GetImageName(b.file);
5403 bi.statistics = b.statistics;
5404 return bi;
5405 }
5406 public string ID
5407 {
5408 get { return id; }
5409 set { id = value; }
5410 }
5411 public int ImageCount
5412 {
5413 get
5414 {
5415 return Buffers.Count;
5416 }
5417 }
5418 public double PhysicalSizeX
5419 {
5420 get { return Resolution.PhysicalSizeX; }
5421 }
5422 public double PhysicalSizeY
5423 {
5424 get { return Resolution.PhysicalSizeY; }
5425 }
5426 public double PhysicalSizeZ
5427 {
5428 get { return imageInfo.PhysicalSizeZ; }
5429 }
5430 public int TileX
5431 {
5432 get { return tileX; }
5433 }
5434 public int TileY
5435 {
5436 get { return tileY; }
5437 }
5438 public double StageSizeX
5439 {
5440 get
5441 {
5442 return imageInfo.StageSizeX + (PhysicalSizeX * tileX);
5443 }
5444 }
5445 public double StageSizeY
5446 {
5447 get
5448 {
5449 return imageInfo.StageSizeY + (PhysicalSizeY * tileY);
5450 }
5451 }
5452 public double StageSizeZ
5453 {
5454 get
5455 {
5456 return imageInfo.StageSizeZ;
5457 }
5458 }
5459 public Resolution Resolution
5460 {
5461 get
5462 {
5463 return Resolutions[resolution];
5464 }
5465 }
5466 public int series
5467 {
5468 get
5469 {
5470 return imageInfo.Series;
5471 }
5472 set
5473 {
5474 imageInfo.Series = value;
5475 }
5476 }
5477 public List<NetVips.Image> vipPages = new List<NetVips.Image>();
5478 static bool initialized = false;
5479 public Channel RChannel
5480 {
5481 get
5482 {
5483 if (Channels[0].range.Length == 1)
5484 return Channels[rgbChannels[0]];
5485 else
5486 return Channels[0];
5487 }
5488 }
5489 public Channel GChannel
5490 {
5491 get
5492 {
5493 if (Channels[0].range.Length == 1)
5494 return Channels[rgbChannels[1]];
5495 else
5496 return Channels[0];
5497 }
5498 }
5499 public Channel BChannel
5500 {
5501 get
5502 {
5503 if (Channels[0].range.Length == 1)
5504 {
5505 if (Channels.Count < 3)
5506 return GChannel;
5507 else
5508 return Channels[rgbChannels[2]];
5509 }
5510 else
5511 return Channels[0];
5512 }
5513 }
5514 public static bool Planes = false;
5515 /* It's a class that holds the information that is stored in the ImageJ description file */
5516 public class ImageJDesc
5517 {
5518 public string ImageJ;
5519 public int images = 0;
5520 public int channels = 0;
5521 public int slices = 0;
5522 public int frames = 0;
5523 public bool hyperstack;
5524 public string mode;
5525 public string unit;
5526 public double finterval = 0;
5527 public double spacing = 0;
5528 public bool loop;
5529 public double min = 0;
5530 public double max = 0;
5531 public int count;
5532 public bool bit8color = false;
5533
5534 public ImageJDesc FromImage(BioImage b)
5535 {
5536 ImageJ = "";
5537 images = b.ImageCount;
5538 channels = b.SizeC;
5539 slices = b.SizeZ;
5540 frames = b.SizeT;
5541 hyperstack = true;
5542 mode = "grayscale";
5543 unit = "micron";
5544 finterval = b.frameInterval;
5545 spacing = b.PhysicalSizeZ;
5546 loop = false;
5547 /*
5548 double dmax = double.MinValue;
5549 double dmin = double.MaxValue;
5550 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
5551 {
5552 if(dmax < c.Max)
5553 dmax = c.Max;
5554 if(dmin > c.Min)
5555 dmin = c.Min;
5556 }
5557 min = dmin;
5558 max = dmax;
5559 */
5560 min = b.Channels[0].RangeR.Min;
5561 max = b.Channels[0].RangeR.Max;
5562 return this;
5563 }
5564 public string GetString()
5565 {
5566 string s = "";
5567 s += "ImageJ=" + ImageJ + "\n";
5568 s += "images=" + images + "\n";
5569 s += "channels=" + channels.ToString() + "\n";
5570 s += "slices=" + slices.ToString() + "\n";
5571 s += "frames=" + frames.ToString() + "\n";
5572 s += "hyperstack=" + hyperstack.ToString() + "\n";
5573 s += "mode=" + mode.ToString() + "\n";
5574 s += "unit=" + unit.ToString() + "\n";
5575 s += "finterval=" + finterval.ToString() + "\n";
5576 s += "spacing=" + spacing.ToString() + "\n";
5577 s += "loop=" + loop.ToString() + "\n";
5578 s += "min=" + min.ToString() + "\n";
5579 s += "max=" + max.ToString() + "\n";
5580 return s;
5581 }
5582 public void SetString(string desc)
5583 {
5584 string[] lines = desc.Split(new string[] { "\r\n", "\r", "\n" }, StringSplitOptions.None);
5585 int maxlen = 20;
5586 for (int i = 0; i < lines.Length; i++)
5587 {
5588 if (i < maxlen)
5589 {
5590 string[] sp = lines[i].Split('=');
5591 if (sp[0] == "ImageJ")
5592 ImageJ = sp[1];
5593 if (sp[0] == "images")
5594 images = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
5595 if (sp[0] == "channels")
5596 channels = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
5597 if (sp[0] == "slices")
5598 slices = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
5599 if (sp[0] == "frames")
5600 frames = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
5601 if (sp[0] == "hyperstack")
5602 hyperstack = bool.Parse(sp[1]);
5603 if (sp[0] == "mode")
5604 mode = sp[1];
5605 if (sp[0] == "unit")
5606 unit = sp[1];
5607 if (sp[0] == "finterval")
5608 finterval = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
5609 if (sp[0] == "spacing")
5610 spacing = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
5611 if (sp[0] == "loop")
5612 loop = bool.Parse(sp[1]);
5613 if (sp[0] == "min")
5614 min = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
5615 if (sp[0] == "max")
5616 max = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
5617 if (sp[0] == "8bitcolor")
5618 bit8color = bool.Parse(sp[1]);
5619 }
5620 else
5621 return;
5622 }
5623
5624 }
5625 }
5626 public int SizeX
5627 {
5628 get
5629 {
5630 if (Buffers.Count > 0)
5631 return Buffers[0].SizeX;
5632 else return 0;
5633 }
5634 }
5635 public int SizeY
5636 {
5637 get
5638 {
5639 if (Buffers.Count > 0)
5640 return Buffers[0].SizeY;
5641 else return 0;
5642 }
5643 }
5644 public int SizeZ
5645 {
5646 get { return sizeZ; }
5647 }
5648 public int SizeC
5649 {
5650 get { return sizeC; }
5651 }
5652 public int SizeT
5653 {
5654 get { return sizeT; }
5655 }
5656 public IntRange RRange
5657 {
5658 get
5659 {
5660 return RChannel.RangeR;
5661 }
5662 }
5663 public IntRange GRange
5664 {
5665 get
5666 {
5667 return GChannel.RangeG;
5668 }
5669 }
5670 public IntRange BRange
5671 {
5672 get
5673 {
5674 return BChannel.RangeB;
5675 }
5676 }
5677 public BufferInfo SelectedBuffer
5678 {
5679 get
5680 {
5681 return Buffers[Coords[Coordinate.Z, Coordinate.C, Coordinate.T]];
5682 }
5683 }
5684 public Stopwatch watch = new Stopwatch();
5685 public bool isRGB
5686 {
5687 get
5688 {
5689 if (RGBChannelCount == 3 || RGBChannelCount == 4)
5690 return true;
5691 else
5692 return false;
5693 }
5694 }
5695 public bool isTime
5696 {
5697 get
5698 {
5699 if (SizeT > 1)
5700 return true;
5701 else
5702 return false;
5703 }
5704 }
5705 public bool isSeries
5706 {
5707 get
5708 {
5709 if (seriesCount > 1)
5710 return true;
5711 else
5712 return false;
5713 }
5714 }
5715 public bool isPyramidal
5716 {
5717 get
5718 {
5719 return ispyramidal;
5720 }
5721 }
5722 public string file;
5723 public static bool Initialized
5724 {
5725 get
5726 {
5727 return initialized;
5728 }
5729 }
5730
5734 public void To8Bit()
5735 {
5736 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
5737 To24Bit();
5738 PixelFormat px = Buffers[0].PixelFormat;
5739 if (px == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
5740 return;
5741 if (px == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
5742 {
5743 To24Bit();
5744 List<BufferInfo> bfs = new List<BufferInfo>();
5745 int index = 0;
5746 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
5747 {
5748 Bitmap[] bs = BufferInfo.RGB24To8((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
5749 BufferInfo br = new BufferInfo(ID, bs[2], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index, Buffers[i].Plane);
5750 BufferInfo bg = new BufferInfo(ID, bs[1], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 1, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 1, Buffers[i].Plane);
5751 BufferInfo bb = new BufferInfo(ID, bs[0], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 2, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 2, Buffers[i].Plane);
5752 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
5753 {
5754 bs[b].Dispose();
5755 }
5756 bs = null;
5757 GC.Collect();
5758 Statistics.CalcStatistics(br);
5759 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bg);
5760 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bb);
5761 bfs.Add(br);
5762 bfs.Add(bg);
5763 bfs.Add(bb);
5764 index += 3;
5765 }
5766 Buffers = bfs;
5767 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 3, SizeT);
5768 }
5769 else if (px == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
5770 {
5771 List<BufferInfo> bfs = new List<BufferInfo>();
5772 int index = 0;
5773 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
5774 {
5775 Bitmap[] bs = BufferInfo.RGB24To8((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
5776 BufferInfo br = new BufferInfo(ID, bs[2], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index, Buffers[i].Plane);
5777 BufferInfo bg = new BufferInfo(ID, bs[1], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 1, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 1, Buffers[i].Plane);
5778 BufferInfo bb = new BufferInfo(ID, bs[0], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 2, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 2, Buffers[i].Plane);
5779 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
5780 {
5781 bs[b].Dispose();
5782 bs[b] = null;
5783 }
5784 bs = null;
5785 GC.Collect();
5786 Statistics.CalcStatistics(br);
5787 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bg);
5788 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bb);
5789 bfs.Add(br);
5790 bfs.Add(bg);
5791 bfs.Add(bb);
5792 index += 3;
5793 }
5794 Buffers = bfs;
5795 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 3, SizeT);
5796 }
5797 else
5798 {
5799 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
5800 {
5801 Bitmap b = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
5802 Buffers[i].Image = b;
5803 b.Dispose();
5804 b = null;
5805 GC.Collect();
5806 Statistics.CalcStatistics(Buffers[i]);
5807 }
5808 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
5809 {
5810 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 8;
5811 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
5812 {
5813 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
5814 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
5815 }
5816 }
5817
5818 }
5819 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
5820 do
5821 {
5822 Thread.Sleep(100);
5823 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
5824 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
5825 AutoThreshold(this, false);
5826 bitsPerPixel = 8;
5827 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Table.GetImage(" + '"' + ID + '"' + ")" + "." + "To8Bit();");
5828 }
5832 public void To16Bit()
5833 {
5834 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
5835 To24Bit();
5836 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
5837 return;
5838 bitsPerPixel = 16;
5839 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
5840 {
5841 List<BufferInfo> bfs = new List<BufferInfo>();
5842 int index = 0;
5843 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
5844 {
5845 Array.Reverse(Buffers[i].Bytes);
5846 BufferInfo[] bs = BufferInfo.RGB48To16(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].Stride, Buffers[i].Bytes, Buffers[i].Coordinate, index, Buffers[i].Plane);
5847 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bs[0]);
5848 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bs[1]);
5849 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bs[2]);
5850 bfs.AddRange(bs);
5851 index += 3;
5852 }
5853 Buffers = bfs;
5854 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, SizeC * 3, SizeT);
5855 if (Channels[0].SamplesPerPixel == 3)
5856 {
5857 Channel c = Channels[0].Copy();
5858 c.SamplesPerPixel = 1;
5859 c.range = new IntRange[1];
5860 Channels.Clear();
5861 Channels.Add(c);
5862 Channels.Add(c.Copy());
5863 Channels.Add(c.Copy());
5864 Channels[1].Index = 1;
5865 Channels[2].Index = 2;
5866 }
5867 }
5868 else if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
5869 {
5870 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
5871 {
5872 Bitmap b = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert8bppTo16bpp((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
5873 Buffers[i].Image = b;
5874 b.Dispose();
5875 b = null;
5876 GC.Collect();
5877 Statistics.CalcStatistics(Buffers[i]);
5878 }
5879 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
5880 {
5881 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
5882 {
5883 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
5884 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
5885 }
5886 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 16;
5887 }
5888 }
5889 else if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
5890 {
5891 List<BufferInfo> bfs = new List<BufferInfo>();
5892 int index = 0;
5893 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
5894 {
5895 Bitmap[] bs = BufferInfo.RGB24To8((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
5896 BufferInfo br = new BufferInfo(ID, bs[2], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index, Buffers[i].Plane);
5897 BufferInfo bg = new BufferInfo(ID, bs[1], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 1, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 1, Buffers[i].Plane);
5898 BufferInfo bb = new BufferInfo(ID, bs[0], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 2, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 2, Buffers[i].Plane);
5899 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
5900 {
5901 bs[b].Dispose();
5902 bs[b] = null;
5903 }
5904 bs = null;
5905 GC.Collect();
5906 br.To16Bit();
5907 bg.To16Bit();
5908 bb.To16Bit();
5909 Statistics.CalcStatistics(br);
5910 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bg);
5911 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bb);
5912 bfs.Add(br);
5913 bfs.Add(bg);
5914 bfs.Add(bb);
5915 index += 3;
5916 }
5917 Buffers = bfs;
5918 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 3, SizeT);
5919 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
5920 {
5921 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
5922 {
5923 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
5924 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
5925 }
5926 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 16;
5927 }
5928 }
5929 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
5930 do
5931 {
5932 Thread.Sleep(100);
5933 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
5934 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
5935 AutoThreshold(this, false);
5936 StackThreshold(true);
5937 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Table.GetImage(" + '"' + ID + '"' + ")" + "." + "To16Bit();");
5938 }
5942 public void To24Bit()
5943 {
5944 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
5945 return;
5946 bitsPerPixel = 8;
5947 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb)
5948 {
5949 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
5950 {
5951 Bitmap b = BufferInfo.To24Bit((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
5952 Buffers[i].Image = b;
5953 b.Dispose();
5954 b = null;
5955 GC.Collect();
5956 Statistics.CalcStatistics(Buffers[i]);
5957 }
5958 if (Channels.Count == 4)
5959 {
5960 Channels.RemoveAt(0);
5961 }
5962 else
5963 {
5964 Channels[0].SamplesPerPixel = 3;
5965 }
5966 }
5967 else
5968 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
5969 {
5970 //We run 8bit so we get 24 bit rgb.
5971 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
5972 {
5973 Bitmap b = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
5974 Buffers[i].Image = b;
5975 Statistics.CalcStatistics(Buffers[i]);
5976 }
5977 if (Channels[0].SamplesPerPixel == 3)
5978 {
5979 Channel c = Channels[0].Copy();
5980 c.SamplesPerPixel = 1;
5981 c.range = new IntRange[1];
5982 Channels.Clear();
5983 Channels.Add(c);
5984 Channels.Add(c.Copy());
5985 Channels.Add(c.Copy());
5986 Channels[1].Index = 1;
5987 Channels[2].Index = 2;
5988 }
5989 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
5990 {
5991 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
5992 {
5993 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
5994 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
5995 }
5996 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 8;
5997 }
5998 }
5999 else
6000 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
6001 {
6002 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
6003 {
6004 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
6005 {
6006 Bitmap b = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
6007 Buffers[i].Image = b;
6008 b.Dispose();
6009 b = null;
6010 GC.Collect();
6011 }
6012 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
6013 {
6014 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
6015 {
6016 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
6017 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
6018 }
6019 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 8;
6020 }
6021 }
6022 List<BufferInfo> bfs = new List<BufferInfo>();
6023 if (Buffers.Count % 3 != 0 && Buffers.Count % 2 != 0)
6024 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
6025 {
6026 BufferInfo bs = new BufferInfo(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
6027 BufferInfo bbs = BufferInfo.RGB16To48(bs);
6028 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bbs);
6029 bs.Dispose();
6030 bs = null;
6031 bfs.Add(bbs);
6032 }
6033 else
6034 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i += Channels.Count)
6035 {
6036 BufferInfo[] bs = new BufferInfo[3];
6037 bs[0] = new BufferInfo(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
6038 bs[1] = new BufferInfo(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 1].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 1].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.T), i + 1, Buffers[i + 1].Plane);
6039 if (Channels.Count > 2)
6040 bs[2] = new BufferInfo(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 2].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 2].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 2].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 2].Coordinate.T), i + 2, Buffers[i + 2].Plane);
6041 BufferInfo bbs = BufferInfo.RGB8To24(bs);
6042 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
6043 {
6044 if (bs[b] != null)
6045 bs[b].Dispose();
6046 bs[b] = null;
6047 }
6048 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bbs);
6049 bfs.Add(bbs);
6050 }
6051 Buffers = bfs;
6052 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 1, SizeT);
6053 }
6054 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
6055 do
6056 {
6057 Thread.Sleep(100);
6058 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
6059 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
6060 AutoThreshold(this, false);
6061 //StackThreshold(false);
6062 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Table.GetImage(" + '"' + ID + '"' + ")" + "." + "To24Bit();");
6063 }
6067 public void To32Bit()
6068 {
6069 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
6070 return;
6071 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat != PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
6072 {
6073 To24Bit();
6074 }
6075 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
6076 {
6077 Bitmap b = BufferInfo.To32Bit((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
6078 Buffers[i].Image = b;
6079 Statistics.CalcStatistics(Buffers[i]);
6080 b.Dispose();
6081 b = null;
6082 }
6083 GC.Collect();
6084 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
6085 do
6086 {
6087 Thread.Sleep(50);
6088 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
6089 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
6090 AutoThreshold(this, false);
6091 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Table.GetImage(" + '"' + ID + '"' + ")" + "." + "To32Bit();");
6092 }
6096 public void To48Bit()
6097 {
6098 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
6099 To24Bit();
6100 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
6101 return;
6102 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
6103 {
6104 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
6105 {
6106 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
6107 {
6108 Bitmap b = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert8bppTo16bpp((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
6109 Buffers[i].Image = b;
6110 b.Dispose();
6111 b = null;
6112 }
6113 }
6114 GC.Collect();
6115 List<BufferInfo> bfs = new List<BufferInfo>();
6116 if (Buffers.Count % 3 != 0 && Buffers.Count % 2 != 0)
6117 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
6118 {
6119 BufferInfo bs = new BufferInfo(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
6120 BufferInfo bbs = BufferInfo.RGB16To48(bs);
6121 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bbs);
6122 bs.Dispose();
6123 bs = null;
6124 bfs.Add(bbs);
6125 }
6126 else
6127 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i += Channels.Count)
6128 {
6129 BufferInfo[] bs = new BufferInfo[3];
6130 if (Channels.Count > 2)
6131 {
6132 bs[2] = new BufferInfo(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
6133 bs[1] = new BufferInfo(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 1].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 1].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.T), i + 1, Buffers[i + 1].Plane);
6134 bs[0] = new BufferInfo(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 2].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 2].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 2].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 2].Coordinate.T), i + 2, Buffers[i + 2].Plane);
6135 }
6136 else
6137 {
6138 bs[0] = new BufferInfo(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
6139 bs[1] = new BufferInfo(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 1].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 1].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.T), i + 1, Buffers[i + 1].Plane);
6140 }
6141 BufferInfo bbs = BufferInfo.RGB16To48(bs);
6142 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
6143 {
6144 if (bs[b] != null)
6145 bs[b].Dispose();
6146 bs[b] = null;
6147 }
6148 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bbs);
6149 bfs.Add(bbs);
6150 }
6151 GC.Collect();
6152 Buffers = bfs;
6153 int index = 0;
6154 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 1, SizeT);
6155
6156 }
6157 else
6158 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
6159 {
6160 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
6161 {
6162 Bitmap b = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert8bppTo16bpp((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
6163 Buffers[i].Image = b;
6164 b.Dispose();
6165 Statistics.CalcStatistics(Buffers[i]);
6166 }
6167 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
6168 {
6169 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
6170 {
6171 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
6172 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
6173 }
6174 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 16;
6175 }
6176 }
6177 else
6178 {
6179 int index = 0;
6180 List<BufferInfo> buffers = new List<BufferInfo>();
6181 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i += 3)
6182 {
6183 BufferInfo[] bf = new BufferInfo[3];
6184 bf[0] = Buffers[i];
6185 bf[1] = Buffers[i + 1];
6186 bf[2] = Buffers[i + 2];
6187 BufferInfo inf = BufferInfo.RGB16To48(bf);
6188 buffers.Add(inf);
6189 Statistics.CalcStatistics(inf);
6190 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
6191 {
6192 bf[b].Dispose();
6193 }
6194 index++;
6195 }
6196 Buffers = buffers;
6197 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 1, SizeT);
6198 }
6199 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
6200 do
6201 {
6202 Thread.Sleep(50);
6203 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
6204 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
6205 bitsPerPixel = 16;
6206 AutoThreshold(this, false);
6207 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.Table.GetImage(" + '"' + ID + '"' + ")" + "." + "To48Bit();");
6208 }
6212 public void RotateFlip(RotateFlipType rot)
6213 {
6214 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
6215 {
6216 Buffers[i].RotateFlip(rot);
6217 }
6218 }
6227 public void Bake(int rmin, int rmax, int gmin, int gmax, int bmin, int bmax)
6228 {
6229 Bake(new IntRange(rmin, rmax), new IntRange(gmin, gmax), new IntRange(bmin, bmax));
6230 }
6237 public void Bake(IntRange rf, IntRange gf, IntRange bf)
6238 {
6239 BioImage bm = new BioImage(Images.GetImageName(ID));
6240 bm = CopyInfo(this, true, true);
6241 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
6242 {
6243 ZCT co = Buffers[i].Coordinate;
6244 Bitmap b = GetFiltered(i, rf, gf, bf);
6245 BufferInfo inf = new BufferInfo(bm.ID, b, co, i);
6246 Statistics.CalcStatistics(inf);
6247 bm.Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = i;
6248 bm.Buffers.Add(inf);
6249 }
6250 foreach (Channel item in bm.Channels)
6251 {
6252 for (int i = 0; i < item.range.Length; i++)
6253 {
6254 item.range[i].Min = 0;
6255 if (bm.bitsPerPixel > 8)
6256 item.range[i].Max = ushort.MaxValue;
6257 else
6258 item.range[i].Max = 255;
6259 }
6260 }
6261 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
6262 do
6263 {
6264 Thread.Sleep(50);
6265 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
6266 AutoThreshold(bm, false);
6267 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
6268 Images.AddImage(bm, false);
6269 App.tabsView.AddTab(bm);
6270 Recorder.AddLine("ImageView.SelectedImage.Bake(" + rf.Min + "," + rf.Max + "," + gf.Min + "," + gf.Max + "," + bf.Min + "," + bf.Max + ");");
6271 }
6272
6273 static bool vips = false;
6274 public static void OpenVips(BioImage b, int pagecount)
6275 {
6276 try
6277 {
6278 for (int i = 0; i < pagecount; i++)
6279 {
6280 b.vipPages.Add(NetVips.Image.Tiffload(b.file, i));
6281 }
6282 }
6283 catch (Exception e)
6284 {
6285 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
6286 }
6287
6288 }
6289 public static void OpenVip(BioImage b, int pagenumber, int x, int y, int w, int h)
6290 {
6291 try
6292 {
6293 NetVips.Image im = NetVips.Image.Tiffload(b.file, pagenumber);
6294 b.vipPages.Add(im);
6295 BufferInfo bf = GetTile(b, new ZCT(0, 0, 0), pagenumber, x, y, w, h);
6296 b.Buffers.Add(bf);
6297 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
6298 }
6299 catch (Exception e)
6300 {
6301 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
6302 }
6303
6304 }
6305 public void UpdateCoords()
6306 {
6307 int z = 0;
6308 int c = 0;
6309 int t = 0;
6310 Coords = new int[SizeZ, SizeC, SizeT];
6311 for (int im = 0; im < Buffers.Count; im++)
6312 {
6313 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
6314 Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = im;
6315 Buffers[im].Coordinate = co;
6316 if (c < SizeC - 1)
6317 c++;
6318 else
6319 {
6320 c = 0;
6321 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
6322 z++;
6323 else
6324 {
6325 z = 0;
6326 if (t < SizeT - 1)
6327 t++;
6328 else
6329 t = 0;
6330 }
6331 }
6332 }
6333 }
6340 public void UpdateCoords(int sz, int sc, int st)
6341 {
6342 int z = 0;
6343 int c = 0;
6344 int t = 0;
6345 sizeZ = sz;
6346 sizeC = sc;
6347 sizeT = st;
6348 Coords = new int[sz, sc, st];
6349 for (int im = 0; im < Buffers.Count; im++)
6350 {
6351 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
6352 Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = im;
6353 Buffers[im].Coordinate = co;
6354 if (c < SizeC - 1)
6355 c++;
6356 else
6357 {
6358 c = 0;
6359 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
6360 z++;
6361 else
6362 {
6363 z = 0;
6364 if (t < SizeT - 1)
6365 t++;
6366 else
6367 t = 0;
6368 }
6369 }
6370 }
6371 }
6378 public void UpdateCoords(int sz, int sc, int st, string order)
6379 {
6380 int z = 0;
6381 int c = 0;
6382 int t = 0;
6383 sizeZ = sz;
6384 sizeC = sc;
6385 sizeT = st;
6386 Coords = new int[sz, sc, st];
6387 if (order == "XYCZT")
6388 {
6389 for (int im = 0; im < Buffers.Count; im++)
6390 {
6391 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
6392 Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = im;
6393 Buffers[im].Coordinate = co;
6394 if (c < SizeC - 1)
6395 c++;
6396 else
6397 {
6398 c = 0;
6399 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
6400 z++;
6401 else
6402 {
6403 z = 0;
6404 if (t < SizeT - 1)
6405 t++;
6406 else
6407 t = 0;
6408 }
6409 }
6410 }
6411 }
6412 else if (order == "XYZCT")
6413 {
6414 for (int im = 0; im < Buffers.Count; im++)
6415 {
6416 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
6417 Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = im;
6418 Buffers[im].Coordinate = co;
6419 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
6420 z++;
6421 else
6422 {
6423 z = 0;
6424 if (c < SizeC - 1)
6425 c++;
6426 else
6427 {
6428 c = 0;
6429 if (t < SizeT - 1)
6430 t++;
6431 else
6432 t = 0;
6433 }
6434 }
6435 }
6436 }
6437 }
6438
6444 public double ToImageSizeX(double d)
6445 {
6446 if (isPyramidal)
6447 return d;
6448 else
6449 return d / Resolution.PhysicalSizeX;
6450 }
6456 public double ToImageSizeY(double d)
6457 {
6458 if (isPyramidal)
6459 return d;
6460 else
6461 return d / Resolution.PhysicalSizeY;
6462 }
6468 public double ToImageSpaceX(double x)
6469 {
6470 if (isPyramidal)
6471 return x;
6472 else
6473 return (float)((x - StageSizeX) / Resolution.PhysicalSizeX);
6474 }
6480 public double ToImageSpaceY(double y)
6481 {
6482 if (isPyramidal)
6483 return y;
6484 else
6485 return (float)((y - StageSizeY) / Resolution.PhysicalSizeY);
6486 }
6493 public PointD ToImageSpace(PointD p)
6494 {
6495 return new PointD((float)ToImageSpaceX(p.X), (float)ToImageSpaceY(p.Y));
6496 }
6497
6503 public PointD[] ToImageSpace(List<PointD> p)
6504 {
6505 PointD[] ps = new PointD[p.Count];
6506 for (int i = 0; i < p.Count; i++)
6507 {
6508 ps[i] = ToImageSpace(p[i]);
6509 }
6510 return ps;
6511 }
6518 public PointF[] ToImageSpace(PointF[] p)
6519 {
6520 PointF[] ps = new PointF[p.Length];
6521 for (int i = 0; i < p.Length; i++)
6522 {
6523 PointF pp = new PointF();
