6524 ps[i] = ToImageSpace(new PointD(p[i].X, p[i].Y)).ToPointF();
6525 }
6526 return ps;
6527 }
6533 public System.Drawing.RectangleF ToImageSpace(RectangleD p)
6534 {
6535 System.Drawing.RectangleF r = new RectangleF();
6536 System.Drawing.Point pp = new System.Drawing.Point();
6537 r.X = (int)((p.X - StageSizeX) / Resolution.PhysicalSizeX);
6538 r.Y = (int)((p.Y - StageSizeY) / Resolution.PhysicalSizeY);
6539 r.Width = (int)(p.W / Resolution.PhysicalSizeX);
6540 r.Height = (int)(p.H / Resolution.PhysicalSizeY);
6541 return r;
6542 }
6548 public PointD ToStageSpace(PointD p)
6549 {
6550 PointD pp = new PointD();
6551 pp.X = ((p.X * Resolution.PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
6552 pp.Y = ((p.Y * Resolution.PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
6553 return pp;
6554 }
6565 public static PointD ToStageSpace(PointD p, double physicalSizeX, double physicalSizeY, double volumeX, double volumeY)
6566 {
6567 PointD pp = new PointD();
6568 pp.X = ((p.X * physicalSizeX) + volumeX);
6569 pp.Y = ((p.Y * physicalSizeY) + volumeY);
6570 return pp;
6571 }
6578 public RectangleD ToStageSpace(RectangleD p)
6579 {
6580 RectangleD r = new RectangleD();
6581 r.X = ((p.X * PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
6582 r.Y = ((p.Y * PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
6583 r.W = (p.W * Resolution.PhysicalSizeX);
6584 r.H = (p.H * Resolution.PhysicalSizeY);
6585 return r;
6586 }
6597 public static RectangleD ToStageSpace(RectangleD p, double physicalSizeX, double physicalSizeY, double volumeX, double volumeY)
6598 {
6599 RectangleD r = new RectangleD();
6600 r.X = ((p.X * physicalSizeX) + volumeX);
6601 r.Y = ((p.Y * physicalSizeY) + volumeY);
6602 r.W = (p.W * physicalSizeX);
6603 r.H = (p.H * physicalSizeY);
6604 return r;
6605 }
6612 public PointD[] ToStageSpace(PointD[] p)
6613 {
6614 PointD[] ps = new PointD[p.Length];
6615 for (int i = 0; i < p.Length; i++)
6616 {
6617 PointD pp = new PointD();
6618 pp.X = ((p[i].X * PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
6619 pp.Y = ((p[i].Y * PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
6620 ps[i] = pp;
6621 }
6622 return ps;
6623 }
6635 public static PointD[] ToStageSpace(PointD[] p, double physicalSizeX, double physicalSizeY, double volumeX, double volumeY)
6636 {
6637 PointD[] ps = new PointD[p.Length];
6638 for (int i = 0; i < p.Length; i++)
6639 {
6640 PointD pp = new PointD();
6641 pp.X = ((p[i].X * physicalSizeX) + volumeX);
6642 pp.Y = ((p[i].Y * physicalSizeY) + volumeY);
6643 ps[i] = pp;
6644 }
6645 return ps;
6646 }
6653 public PointD ToStageSpace(PointD p, int resolution)
6654 {
6655 PointD pp = new PointD();
6656 pp.X = ((p.X * Resolutions[resolution].PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
6657 pp.Y = ((p.Y * Resolutions[resolution].PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
6658 return pp;
6659 }
6660 public BioImage(string file)
6661 {
6662 id = file;
6663 filename = Images.GetImageName(id);
6664 Coordinate = new ZCT();
6665 rgbChannels[0] = 0;
6666 rgbChannels[1] = 0;
6667 rgbChannels[2] = 0;
6668 }
6682 public static BioImage Substack(BioImage orig, int ser, int zs, int ze, int cs, int ce, int ts, int te)
6683 {
6684 BioImage b = CopyInfo(orig, false, false);
6685 b.ID = Images.GetImageName(orig.ID);
6686 int i = 0;
6687 b.Coords = new int[ze - zs, ce - cs, te - ts];
6688 b.sizeZ = ze - zs;
6689 b.sizeC = ce - cs;
6690 b.sizeT = te - ts;
6691 for (int ti = 0; ti < b.SizeT; ti++)
6692 {
6693 for (int zi = 0; zi < b.SizeZ; zi++)
6694 {
6695 for (int ci = 0; ci < b.SizeC; ci++)
6696 {
6697 int ind = orig.Coords[zs + zi, cs + ci, ts + ti];
6698 BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo(Images.GetImageName(orig.id), orig.SizeX, orig.SizeY, orig.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, orig.Buffers[ind].Bytes, new ZCT(zi, ci, ti), i);
6699 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
6700 b.Buffers.Add(bf);
6701 b.Coords[zi, ci, ti] = i;
6702 i++;
6703 }
6704 }
6705 }
6706 for (int ci = cs; ci < ce; ci++)
6707 {
6708 b.Channels.Add(orig.Channels[ci]);
6709 }
6710 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
6711 do
6712 {
6713 Thread.Sleep(100);
6714 } while (b.Buffers[b.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
6715 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
6716 AutoThreshold(b, false);
6717 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
6718 b.StackThreshold(true);
6719 else
6720 b.StackThreshold(false);
6721 Images.AddImage(b, false);
6722 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.Substack(" + '"' + orig.Filename + '"' + "," + ser + "," + zs + "," + ze + "," + cs + "," + ce + "," + ts + "," + te + ");");
6723 return b;
6724 }
6731 public static BioImage MergeChannels(BioImage b2, BioImage b)
6732 {
6733 BioImage res = new BioImage(b2.ID);
6734 res.ID = Images.GetImageName(b2.ID);
6735 res.series = b2.series;
6736 res.sizeZ = b2.SizeZ;
6737 int cOrig = b2.SizeC;
6738 res.sizeC = b2.SizeC + b.SizeC;
6739 res.sizeT = b2.SizeT;
6740 res.bitsPerPixel = b2.bitsPerPixel;
6741 res.imageInfo = b2.imageInfo;
6742 res.littleEndian = b2.littleEndian;
6743 res.seriesCount = b2.seriesCount;
6744 res.imagesPerSeries = res.ImageCount / res.seriesCount;
6745 res.Coords = new int[res.SizeZ, res.SizeC, res.SizeT];
6746
6747 int i = 0;
6748 int cc = 0;
6749 for (int ti = 0; ti < res.SizeT; ti++)
6750 {
6751 for (int zi = 0; zi < res.SizeZ; zi++)
6752 {
6753 for (int ci = 0; ci < res.SizeC; ci++)
6754 {
6755 ZCT co = new ZCT(zi, ci, ti);
6756 if (ci < cOrig)
6757 {
6758 //If this channel is part of the image b1 we add planes from it.
6759 BufferInfo copy = new BufferInfo(b2.id, b2.SizeX, b2.SizeY, b2.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b2.Buffers[i].Bytes, co, i);
6760 if (b2.littleEndian)
6761 copy.RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
6762 res.Coords[zi, ci, ti] = i;
6763 res.Buffers.Add(b2.Buffers[i]);
6764 res.Buffers.Add(copy);
6765 //Lets copy the ROI's from the original image.
6766 List<ROI> anns = b2.GetAnnotations(zi, ci, ti);
6767 if (anns.Count > 0)
6768 res.Annotations.AddRange(anns);
6769 }
6770 else
6771 {
6772 //This plane is not part of b1 so we add the planes from b2 channels.
6773 BufferInfo copy = new BufferInfo(b.id, b.SizeX, b.SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b.Buffers[i].Bytes, co, i);
6774 if (b2.littleEndian)
6775 copy.RotateFlip(RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
6776 res.Coords[zi, ci, ti] = i;
6777 res.Buffers.Add(b.Buffers[i]);
6778 res.Buffers.Add(copy);
6779
6780 //Lets copy the ROI's from the original image.
6781 List<ROI> anns = b.GetAnnotations(zi, cc, ti);
6782 if (anns.Count > 0)
6783 res.Annotations.AddRange(anns);
6784 }
6785 i++;
6786 }
6787 }
6788 }
6789 for (int ci = 0; ci < res.SizeC; ci++)
6790 {
6791 if (ci < cOrig)
6792 {
6793 res.Channels.Add(b2.Channels[ci].Copy());
6794 }
6795 else
6796 {
6797 res.Channels.Add(b.Channels[cc].Copy());
6798 res.Channels[cOrig + cc].Index = ci;
6799 cc++;
6800 }
6801 }
6802 Images.AddImage(res, false);
6803 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
6804 do
6805 {
6806 Thread.Sleep(100);
6807 } while (res.Buffers[res.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
6808 AutoThreshold(res, false);
6809 if (res.bitsPerPixel > 8)
6810 res.StackThreshold(true);
6811 else
6812 res.StackThreshold(false);
6813 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.MergeChannels(" + '"' + b.ID + '"' + "," + '"' + b2.ID + '"' + ");");
6814 return res;
6815 }
6822 public static BioImage MergeChannels(string bname, string b2name)
6823 {
6824 BioImage b = Images.GetImage(bname);
6825 BioImage b2 = Images.GetImage(b2name);
6826 return MergeChannels(b, b2);
6827 }
6833 public static BioImage MergeZ(BioImage b)
6834 {
6835 BioImage bi = BioImage.CopyInfo(b, true, true);
6836 int ind = 0;
6837 for (int c = 0; c < b.SizeC; c++)
6838 {
6839 for (int t = 0; t < b.sizeT; t++)
6840 {
6841 Merge m = new Merge((Bitmap)b.Buffers[b.Coords[0, c, t]].Image);
6842 Bitmap bm = new Bitmap(b.SizeX, b.SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat);
6843 for (int i = 1; i < b.sizeZ; i++)
6844 {
6845 m.OverlayImage = bm;
6846 bm = m.Apply((Bitmap)b.Buffers[b.Coords[i, c, t]].Image);
6847 }
6848 BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo(b.file, bm, new ZCT(0, c, t), ind);
6849 bi.Buffers.Add(bf);
6850 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
6851 ind++;
6852 }
6853 }
6854 Images.AddImage(bi, false);
6855 bi.UpdateCoords(1, b.SizeC, b.SizeT);
6856 bi.Coordinate = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
6857 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
6858 do
6859 {
6860 Thread.Sleep(100);
6861 } while (bi.Buffers[bi.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
6862 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
6863 AutoThreshold(bi, false);
6864 if (bi.bitsPerPixel > 8)
6865 bi.StackThreshold(true);
6866 else
6867 bi.StackThreshold(false);
6868 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.MergeZ(" + '"' + b.ID + '"' + ");");
6869 return bi;
6870 }
6876 public static BioImage MergeT(BioImage b)
6877 {
6878 BioImage bi = BioImage.CopyInfo(b, true, true);
6879 int ind = 0;
6880 for (int c = 0; c < b.SizeC; c++)
6881 {
6882 for (int z = 0; z < b.sizeZ; z++)
6883 {
6884 Merge m = new Merge((Bitmap)b.Buffers[b.Coords[z, c, 0]].Image);
6885 Bitmap bm = new Bitmap(b.SizeX, b.SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat);
6886 for (int i = 1; i < b.sizeT; i++)
6887 {
6888 m.OverlayImage = bm;
6889 bm = m.Apply((Bitmap)b.Buffers[b.Coords[z, c, i]].Image);
6890 }
6891 BufferInfo bf = new BufferInfo(b.file, bm, new ZCT(z, c, 0), ind);
6892 bi.Buffers.Add(bf);
6893 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
6894 ind++;
6895 }
6896 }
6897 Images.AddImage(bi, false);
6898 bi.UpdateCoords(1, b.SizeC, b.SizeT);
6899 bi.Coordinate = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
6900 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
6901 do
6902 {
6903 Thread.Sleep(100);
6904 } while (bi.Buffers[bi.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
6905 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
6906 AutoThreshold(bi, false);
6907 if (bi.bitsPerPixel > 8)
6908 bi.StackThreshold(true);
6909 else
6910 bi.StackThreshold(false);
6911 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.MergeT(" + '"' + b.ID + '"' + ");");
6912 return bi;
6913 }
6917 public BioImage[] SplitChannels()
6918 {
6919 BioImage[] bms;
6920 if (isRGB)
6921 {
6922 bms = new BioImage[3];
6923 BioImage ri = new BioImage(Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(ID) + "-1" + Path.GetExtension(ID));
6924 BioImage gi = new BioImage(Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(ID) + "-2" + Path.GetExtension(ID));
6925 BioImage bi = new BioImage(Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(ID) + "-3" + Path.GetExtension(ID));
6926
6927 ri.sizeC = 1;
6928 gi.sizeC = 1;
6929 bi.sizeC = 1;
6930 ri.sizeZ = SizeZ;
6931 gi.sizeZ = SizeZ;
6932 bi.sizeZ = SizeZ;
6933 ri.sizeT = SizeT;
6934 gi.sizeT = SizeT;
6935 bi.sizeT = SizeT;
6936
6937 ri.Coords = new int[SizeZ, 1, SizeT];
6938 gi.Coords = new int[SizeZ, 1, SizeT];
6939 bi.Coords = new int[SizeZ, 1, SizeT];
6940 int ind = 0;
6941 for (int i = 0; i < ImageCount; i++)
6942 {
6943 if (Buffers[i].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
6944 {
6945 //For 48bit images we need to use our own function as AForge won't give us a proper image.
6946 BufferInfo[] bfs = BufferInfo.RGB48To16(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].Stride, Buffers[i].Bytes, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind, Buffers[i].Plane);
6947 ind += 3;
6948 ri.Buffers.Add(bfs[0]);
6949 gi.Buffers.Add(bfs[1]);
6950 bi.Buffers.Add(bfs[2]);
6951 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bfs[0]);
6952 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bfs[1]);
6953 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bfs[2]);
6954 ri.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
6955 gi.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
6956 bi.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
6957 }
6958 else
6959 {
6960
6961 Bitmap rImage = extractR.Apply((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
6962 BufferInfo rbf = new BufferInfo(ri.ID, rImage, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind++);
6963 Statistics.CalcStatistics(rbf);
6964 ri.Buffers.Add(rbf);
6965 ri.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
6966
6967 Bitmap gImage = extractG.Apply((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
6968 BufferInfo gbf = new BufferInfo(gi.ID, gImage, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind++);
6969 Statistics.CalcStatistics(gbf);
6970 gi.Buffers.Add(gbf);
6971 gi.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
6972
6973 Bitmap bImage = extractB.Apply((Bitmap)Buffers[i].Image);
6974 //Clipboard.SetImage(bImage);
6975 BufferInfo bbf = new BufferInfo(bi.ID, bImage, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind++);
6976 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bbf);
6977 bi.Buffers.Add(bbf);
6978 bi.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
6979
6980 }
6981 }
6982 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
6983 do
6984 {
6985 Thread.Sleep(100);
6986 } while (bi.Buffers[bi.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
6987
6988 ri.Channels.Add(Channels[0].Copy());
6989 gi.Channels.Add(Channels[0].Copy());
6990 bi.Channels.Add(Channels[0].Copy());
6991 AutoThreshold(ri, false);
6992 AutoThreshold(gi, false);
6993 AutoThreshold(bi, false);
6994 Images.AddImage(ri, true);
6995 Images.AddImage(gi, true);
6996 Images.AddImage(bi, true);
6997 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
6998 bms[0] = ri;
6999 bms[1] = gi;
7000 bms[2] = bi;
7001 }
7002 else
7003 {
7004 bms = new BioImage[SizeC];
7005 for (int c = 0; c < SizeC; c++)
7006 {
7007 BioImage b = BioImage.Substack(this, 0, 0, SizeZ, c, c + 1, 0, SizeT);
7008 bms[c] = b;
7009 }
7010 }
7011
7012 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
7013 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.SplitChannels(" + '"' + Filename + '"' + ");");
7014 return bms;
7015 }
7021 public static BioImage[] SplitChannels(BioImage bb)
7022 {
7023 return bb.SplitChannels();
7024 }
7030 public static BioImage[] SplitChannels(string name)
7031 {
7032 return SplitChannels(Images.GetImage(name));
7033 }
7034
7035 public static LevelsLinear filter8 = new LevelsLinear();
7036 public static LevelsLinear16bpp filter16 = new LevelsLinear16bpp();
7037 private static ExtractChannel extractR = new ExtractChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.R);
7038 private static ExtractChannel extractG = new ExtractChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.G);
7039 private static ExtractChannel extractB = new ExtractChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.B);
7040
7048 public Image GetImageByCoord(int z, int c, int t)
7049 {
7050 return Buffers[Coords[z, c, t]].ImageRGB;
7051 }
7059 public Bitmap GetBitmap(int z, int c, int t)
7060 {
7061 return (Bitmap)Buffers[Coords[z, c, t]].Image;
7062 }
7068 public int GetIndex(int ix, int iy)
7069 {
7070 if (ix > SizeX || iy > SizeY || ix < 0 || iy < 0)
7071 return 0;
7072 int stridex = SizeX;
7073 int x = ix;
7074 int y = iy;
7075 if (bitsPerPixel > 8)
7076 {
7077 return (y * stridex + x) * 2;
7078 }
7079 else
7080 {
7081 return (y * stridex + x);
7082 }
7083 }
7090 public int GetIndexRGB(int ix, int iy, int index)
7091 {
7092 int stridex = SizeX;
7093 //For 16bit (2*8bit) images we multiply buffer index by 2
7094 int x = ix;
7095 int y = iy;
7096 if (bitsPerPixel > 8)
7097 {
7098 return (y * stridex + x) * 2 * index;
7099 }
7100 else
7101 {
7102 return (y * stridex + x) * index;
7103 }
7104 }
7110 public ushort GetValue(ZCTXY coord)
7111 {
7112 if (coord.X < 0 || coord.Y < 0 || coord.X > SizeX || coord.Y > SizeY)
7113 {
7114 return 0;
7115 }
7116 if (isRGB)
7117 {
7118 if (coord.C == 0)
7119 return GetValueRGB(coord, 0);
7120 else if (coord.C == 1)
7121 return GetValueRGB(coord, 1);
7122 else if (coord.C == 2)
7123 return GetValueRGB(coord, 2);
7124 }
7125 else
7126 return GetValueRGB(coord, 0);
7127 return 0;
7128 }
7135 public ushort GetValueRGB(ZCTXY coord, int index)
7136 {
7137 int ind = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
7138 ColorS c = Buffers[ind].GetPixel(coord.X, coord.Y);
7139 if (index == 0)
7140 return c.R;
7141 else
7142 if (index == 1)
7143 return c.G;
7144 else
7145 if (index == 2)
7146 return c.B;
7147 throw new IndexOutOfRangeException();
7148 }
7156 public ushort GetValue(ZCT coord, int x, int y)
7157 {
7158 return GetValueRGB(new ZCTXY(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T, x, y), 0);
7159 }
7169 public ushort GetValue(int z, int c, int t, int x, int y)
7170 {
7171 return GetValue(new ZCTXY(z, c, t, x, y));
7172 }
7181 public ushort GetValueRGB(ZCT coord, int x, int y, int RGBindex)
7182 {
7183 ZCTXY c = new ZCTXY(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T, x, y);
7184 if (isRGB)
7185 {
7186 return GetValueRGB(c, RGBindex);
7187 }
7188 else
7189 return GetValue(coord, x, y);
7190 }
7201 public ushort GetValueRGB(int z, int c, int t, int x, int y, int RGBindex)
7202 {
7203 return GetValueRGB(new ZCT(z, c, t), x, y, RGBindex);
7204 }
7209 public void SetValue(ZCTXY coord, ushort value)
7210 {
7211 int i = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
7212 Buffers[i].SetValue(coord.X, coord.Y, value);
7213 }
7220 public void SetValue(int x, int y, int ind, ushort value)
7221 {
7222 Buffers[ind].SetValue(x, y, value);
7223 }
7230 public void SetValue(int x, int y, ZCT coord, ushort value)
7231 {
7232 SetValue(x, y, Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T], value);
7233 }
7239 public void SetValueRGB(ZCTXY coord, int RGBindex, ushort value)
7240 {
7241 int ind = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
7242 Buffers[ind].SetValueRGB(coord.X, coord.Y, RGBindex, value);
7243 }
7249 public Bitmap GetBitmap(ZCT coord)
7250 {
7251 return (Bitmap)GetImageByCoord(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T);
7252 }
7261 public Bitmap GetFiltered(ZCT coord, IntRange r, IntRange g, IntRange b)
7262 {
7263 int index = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
7264 return GetFiltered(index, r, g, b);
7265 }
7274 public Bitmap GetFiltered(int ind, IntRange r, IntRange g, IntRange b)
7275 {
7276 if (Buffers[ind].BitsPerPixel > 8)
7277 {
7278 BioImage.filter16.InRed = r;
7279 BioImage.filter16.InGreen = g;
7280 BioImage.filter16.InBlue = b;
7281 return BioImage.filter16.Apply((Bitmap)Buffers[ind].Image);
7282 }
7283 else
7284 {
7285 // set ranges
7286 BioImage.filter8.InRed = r;
7287 BioImage.filter8.InGreen = g;
7288 BioImage.filter8.InBlue = b;
7289 //We give the filter an RGB image (ImageRGB) instead of Image as with some padded 8-bit images
7290 //AForge will return an invalid managed Bitmap which causes a crash due to faulty image properties.
7291 return BioImage.filter8.Apply((Bitmap)Buffers[ind].ImageRGB);
7292 }
7293 }
7300 public Bitmap GetChannelImage(int ind, RGB rGB)
7301 {
7302 BufferInfo bf = Buffers[ind];
7303 if (bf.isRGB)
7304 {
7305 if (rGB == RGB.R)
7306 return extractR.Apply((Bitmap)Buffers[ind].Image);
7307 else
7308 if (rGB == RGB.G)
7309 return extractG.Apply((Bitmap)Buffers[ind].Image);
7310 else
7311 return extractB.Apply((Bitmap)Buffers[ind].Image);
7312 }
7313 else
7314 throw new InvalidOperationException();
7315 }
7324 public Bitmap GetEmission(ZCT coord, IntRange rf, IntRange gf, IntRange bf)
7325 {
7326 if (RGBChannelCount == 1)
7327 {
7328 BufferInfo[] bs = new BufferInfo[Channels.Count];
7329 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
7330 {
7331 int index = Coords[coord.Z, c, coord.T];
7332 bs[c] = Buffers[index];
7333 }
7334 return BufferInfo.GetEmissionBitmap(bs, Channels.ToArray());
7335 }
7336 else
7337 {
7338 int index = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
7339 return (Bitmap)Buffers[index].Image;
7340 }
7341 }
7350 public Bitmap GetRGBBitmap(ZCT coord, IntRange rf, IntRange gf, IntRange bf)
7351 {
7352 int index = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
7353 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
7354 {
7355 if (Channels.Count >= 3)
7356 {
7357 BufferInfo[] bs = new BufferInfo[3];
7358 bs[0] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index];
7359 bs[1] = Buffers[index + GChannel.Index];
7360 bs[2] = Buffers[index + BChannel.Index];
7361 return BufferInfo.GetRGBBitmap(bs, rf, gf, bf);
7362 }
7363 else
7364 {
7365 BufferInfo[] bs = new BufferInfo[3];
7366 bs[0] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index];
7367 bs[1] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index + 1];
7368 bs[2] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index + 2];
7369 return BufferInfo.GetRGBBitmap(bs, rf, gf, bf);
7370 }
7371 }
7372 else
7373 return (Bitmap)Buffers[index].Image;
7374 }
7375
7376 public static Stopwatch swatch = new Stopwatch();
7383 public List<ROI> GetAnnotations(ZCT coord)
7384 {
7385 List<ROI> annotations = new List<ROI>();
7386 foreach (ROI an in Annotations)
7387 {
7388 if (an == null)
7389 continue;
7390 if (an.coord == coord)
7391 annotations.Add(an);
7392 }
7393 return annotations;
7394 }
7403 public List<ROI> GetAnnotations(int Z, int C, int T)
7404 {
7405 List<ROI> annotations = new List<ROI>();
7406 foreach (ROI an in Annotations)
7407 {
7408 if (an.coord.Z == Z && an.coord.Z == Z && an.coord.C == C && an.coord.T == T)
7409 annotations.Add(an);
7410 }
7411 return annotations;
7412 }
7413
7414 public bool Loading = false;
7417 public static void Initialize()
7418 {
7419 //We initialize OME on a seperate thread so the user doesn't have to wait for initialization to
7420 //view images.
7421 System.Threading.Thread t = new System.Threading.Thread(new System.Threading.ThreadStart(InitOME));
7422 t.Start();
7423 }
7425 private static void InitOME()
7426 {
7427 factory = new ServiceFactory();
7428 service = (OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService));
7429 reader = new ImageReader();
7430 writer = new ImageWriter();
7431 initialized = true;
7432 }
7438 public static void SaveFile(string file, string ID)
7439 {
7440 string[] sts = new string[1];
7441 sts[0] = file;
7442 SaveSeries(sts, ID);
7443 }
7448 public static void SaveSeries(string[] files, string ID)
7449 {
7450 string desc = "";
7451 int stride = 0;
7452 ImageJDesc j = new ImageJDesc();
7453 BioImage bi = Images.GetImage(files[0]);
7454 j.FromImage(bi);
7455 desc = j.GetString();
7456 for (int fi = 0; fi < files.Length; fi++)
7457 {
7458 string file = files[fi];
7459
7460 BioImage b = Images.GetImage(file);
7461 string fn = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(ID);
7462 string dir = Path.GetDirectoryName(ID);
7463 stride = b.Buffers[0].Stride;
7464
7465 //Save ROIs to CSV file.
7466 if (b.Annotations.Count > 0)
7467 {
7468 string f = dir + "//" + fn + ".csv";
7469 ExportROIsCSV(f, b.Annotations);
7470 }
7471
7472 //Embed ROI's to image description.
7473 for (int i = 0; i < b.Annotations.Count; i++)
7474 {
7475 desc += "-ROI:" + b.series + ":" + ROIToString(b.Annotations[i]) + NewLine;
7476 }
7477 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
7478 {
7479 string cj = JsonConvert.SerializeObject(c.info, Formatting.None);
7480 desc += "-Channel:" + fi + ":" + cj + NewLine;
7481 }
7482 string json = JsonConvert.SerializeObject(b.imageInfo, Formatting.None);
7483 desc += "-ImageInfo:" + fi + ":" + json + NewLine;
7484 }
7485
7486 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(ID, "w");
7487 for (int fi = 0; fi < files.Length; fi++)
7488 {
7489 int im = 0;
7490 string file = files[fi];
7491 Progress pr = new Progress(file, "Saving");
7492 pr.Show();
7493 Application.DoEvents();
7494 BioImage b = Images.GetImage(file);
7495 int sizec = 1;
7496 if (!b.isRGB)
7497 {
7498 sizec = b.SizeC;
7499 }
7500 byte[] buffer;
7501 for (int c = 0; c < sizec; c++)
7502 {
7503 for (int z = 0; z < b.SizeZ; z++)
7504 {
7505 for (int t = 0; t < b.SizeT; t++)
7506 {
7507 image.SetDirectory((short)(im + (b.Buffers.Count * fi)));
7508 image.SetField(TiffTag.IMAGEWIDTH, b.SizeX);
7509 image.SetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION, desc);
7510 image.SetField(TiffTag.IMAGELENGTH, b.SizeY);
7511 image.SetField(TiffTag.BITSPERSAMPLE, b.bitsPerPixel);
7512 image.SetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL, b.RGBChannelCount);
7513 image.SetField(TiffTag.ROWSPERSTRIP, b.SizeY);
7514 image.SetField(TiffTag.ORIENTATION, BitMiracle.LibTiff.Classic.Orientation.TOPLEFT);
7515 image.SetField(TiffTag.PLANARCONFIG, PlanarConfig.CONTIG);
7516 image.SetField(TiffTag.PHOTOMETRIC, Photometric.MINISBLACK);
7517 image.SetField(TiffTag.ROWSPERSTRIP, image.DefaultStripSize(0));
7518 if (b.PhysicalSizeX != -1 && b.PhysicalSizeY != -1)
7519 {
7520 image.SetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION, (b.PhysicalSizeX * b.SizeX) / ((b.PhysicalSizeX * b.SizeX) * b.PhysicalSizeX));
7521 image.SetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION, (b.PhysicalSizeY * b.SizeY) / ((b.PhysicalSizeY * b.SizeY) * b.PhysicalSizeY));
7522 image.SetField(TiffTag.RESOLUTIONUNIT, ResUnit.NONE);
7523 }
7524 else
7525 {
7526 image.SetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION, 100.0);
7527 image.SetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION, 100.0);
7528 image.SetField(TiffTag.RESOLUTIONUNIT, ResUnit.INCH);
7529 }
7530 // specify that it's a page within the multipage file
7531 image.SetField(TiffTag.SUBFILETYPE, FileType.PAGE);
7532 // specify the page number
7533 buffer = b.Buffers[im].GetSaveBytes(true);
7534 image.SetField(TiffTag.PAGENUMBER, im + (b.Buffers.Count * fi), b.Buffers.Count * files.Length);
7535 for (int i = 0, offset = 0; i < b.SizeY; i++)
7536 {
7537 image.WriteScanline(buffer, offset, i, 0);
7538 offset += stride;
7539 }
7540 image.WriteDirectory();
7541 pr.UpdateProgressF((float)im / (float)b.ImageCount);
7542 Application.DoEvents();
7543 im++;
7544 }
7545 }
7546 }
7547 pr.Close();
7548 }
7549 image.Dispose();
7550
7551 }
7558 public static BioImage[] OpenSeries(string file)
7559 {
7560 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
7561 int pages = image.NumberOfDirectories();
7562 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
7563 int sp = image.GetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL)[0].ToInt();
7564 ImageJDesc imDesc = new ImageJDesc();
7565 int count = 1;
7566 if (f != null)
7567 {
7568 string desc = f[0].ToString();
7569 if (desc.StartsWith("ImageJ"))
7570 {
7571 imDesc.SetString(desc);
7572 if (imDesc.channels != 0)
7573 count = imDesc.channels;
7574 }
7575 }
7576 int scount = (pages * sp) / count;
7577 BioImage[] bs = new BioImage[pages];
7578 image.Close();
7579 for (int i = 0; i < pages; i++)
7580 {
7581 bs[i] = OpenFile(file, i, true);
7582 }
7583 return bs;
7584 }
7590 public static BioImage OpenFile(string file)
7591 {
7592 return OpenFile(file, 0, true);
7593 }
7594 static bool IsTiffTiled(string imagePath)
7595 {
7596 if (imagePath.EndsWith(".tif") || imagePath.EndsWith(".tiff"))
7597 {
7598 using (Tiff tiff = Tiff.Open(imagePath, "r"))
7599 {
7600 if (tiff == null)
7601 {
7602 throw new Exception("Failed to open TIFF image.");
7603 }
7604 bool t = tiff.IsTiled();
7605 tiff.Close();
7606 return t;
7607 }
7608 }
7609 else return false;
7610 }
7611 static void InitDirectoryResolution(BioImage b, Tiff image, ImageJDesc jdesc = null)
7612 {
7613 Resolution res = new Resolution();
7614 FieldValue[] rs = image.GetField(TiffTag.RESOLUTIONUNIT);
7615 string unit = "NONE";
7616 if (rs != null)
7617 unit = rs[0].ToString();
7618 if (jdesc != null)
7619 res.PhysicalSizeZ = jdesc.finterval;
7620 else
7621 res.PhysicalSizeZ = 2.54 / 96;
7622 if (unit == "CENTIMETER")
7623 {
7624 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION) != null)
7625 {
7626 double x = image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
7627 res.PhysicalSizeX = (1000 / x);
7628 }
7629 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION) != null)
7630 {
7631 double y = image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
7632 res.PhysicalSizeY = (1000 / y);
7633 }
7634 }
7635 else
7636 if (unit == "INCH")
7637 {
7638 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION) != null)
7639 {
7640 double x = image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
7641 res.PhysicalSizeX = (2.54 / x) / 2.54;
7642 }
7643 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION) != null)
7644 {
7645 double y = image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
7646 res.PhysicalSizeY = (2.54 / y) / 2.54;
7647 }
7648 }
7649 else
7650 if (unit == "NONE")
7651 {
7652 if (jdesc != null)
7653 {
7654 if (jdesc.unit == "micron")
7655 {
7656 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION) != null)
7657 {
7658 double x = image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
7659 res.PhysicalSizeX = (2.54 / x) / 2.54;
7660 }
7661 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION) != null)
7662 {
7663 double y = image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
7664 res.PhysicalSizeY = (2.54 / y) / 2.54;
7665 }
7666 }
7667 }
7668 else
7669 {
7670 res.PhysicalSizeX = 2.54 / 96;
7671 res.PhysicalSizeY = 2.54 / 96;
7672 res.PhysicalSizeZ = 2.54 / 96;
7673 }
7674 }
7675 res.SizeX = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEWIDTH)[0].ToInt();
7676 res.SizeY = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGELENGTH)[0].ToInt();
7677 int bitsPerPixel = image.GetField(TiffTag.BITSPERSAMPLE)[0].ToInt();
7678 int RGBChannelCount = image.GetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL)[0].ToInt();
7679 res.PixelFormat = GetPixelFormat(RGBChannelCount, bitsPerPixel);
7680 b.Resolutions.Add(res);
7681 }
7689 public static BioImage OpenFile(string file, int series, bool newTab)
7690 {
7691 return OpenFile(file, series, newTab, true, false, 0, 0, 1920, 1080);
7692 }
7700 public static BioImage OpenFile(string file, int series, bool newTab, bool addToImages, bool tile, int x, int y, int w, int h)
7701 {
7702 if (isOME(file))
7703 {
7704 return OpenOME(file);
7705 }
7706 vips = VipsSupport(file);
7707 Stopwatch st = new Stopwatch();
7708 st.Start();
7709 Progress pr = new Progress(file, "Opening");
7710 pr.Show();
7711 Application.DoEvents();
7712 BioImage b = new BioImage(file);
7713 bool tiled = IsTiffTiled(file);
7714 if (tiled)
7715 b.ispyramidal = true;
7716 b.series = series;
7717 b.file = file;
7718 string fn = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(file);
7719 string dir = Path.GetDirectoryName(file);
7720 if (File.Exists(fn + ".csv"))
7721 {
7722 string f = dir + "//" + fn + ".csv";
7723 b.Annotations = BioImage.ImportROIsCSV(f);
7724 }
7725 if (file.EndsWith("tif") || file.EndsWith("tiff") || file.EndsWith("TIF") || file.EndsWith("TIFF"))
7726 {
7727 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
7728 for (int d = 0; d < image.NumberOfDirectories(); d++)
7729 {
7730 image.SetDirectory((short)d);
7731 int SizeX = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEWIDTH)[0].ToInt();
7732 int SizeY = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGELENGTH)[0].ToInt();
7733 b.bitsPerPixel = image.GetField(TiffTag.BITSPERSAMPLE)[0].ToInt();
7734 b.littleEndian = image.IsBigEndian();
7735 int RGBChannelCount = image.GetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL)[0].ToInt();
7736 string desc = "";
7737
7738 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
7739 ImageJDesc imDesc = new ImageJDesc();
7740 b.sizeC = 1;
7741 b.sizeT = 1;
7742 b.sizeZ = 1;
7743 if (f != null)
7744 {
7745 desc = f[0].ToString();
7746 if (desc.StartsWith("ImageJ"))
7747 {
7748 imDesc.SetString(desc);
7749 if (imDesc.channels != 0)
7750 b.sizeC = imDesc.channels;
7751 else
7752 b.sizeC = 1;
7753 if (imDesc.slices != 0)
7754 b.sizeZ = imDesc.slices;
7755 else
7756 b.sizeZ = 1;
7757 if (imDesc.frames != 0)
7758 b.sizeT = imDesc.frames;
7759 else
7760 b.sizeT = 1;
7761 if (imDesc.finterval != 0)
7762 b.frameInterval = imDesc.finterval;
7763 else
7764 b.frameInterval = 1;
7765 if (imDesc.spacing != 0)
7766 b.imageInfo.PhysicalSizeZ = imDesc.spacing;
7767 else
7768 b.imageInfo.PhysicalSizeZ = 1;
7769 }
7770 }
7771 int stride = 0;
7772 PixelFormat PixelFormat;
7773 if (RGBChannelCount == 1)
7774 {
7775 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
7776 {
7777 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
7778 stride = SizeX * 2;
7779 }
7780 else
7781 {
7782 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
7783 stride = SizeX;
7784 }
7785 }
7786 else
7787 if (RGBChannelCount == 3)
7788 {
7789 b.sizeC = 1;
7790 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
7791 {
7792 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
7793 stride = SizeX * 2 * 3;
7794 }
7795 else
7796 {
7797 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
7798 stride = SizeX * 3;
7799 }
7800 }
7801 else
7802 {
7803 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb;
7804 stride = SizeX * 4;
7805 }
7806
7807 string[] sts = desc.Split('\n');
7808 int index = 0;
7809 for (int i = 0; i < sts.Length; i++)
7810 {
7811 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-Channel"))
7812 {
7813 string val = sts[i].Substring(9);
7814 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
7815 int serie = int.Parse(val);
7816 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 7)
7817 {
7818 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
7819 Channel.ChannelInfo info = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<Channel.ChannelInfo>(cht);
7820 Channel ch = new Channel(index, b.bitsPerPixel, info.samplesPerPixel);
7821 ch.info = info;
7822 b.Channels.Add(ch);
7823 index++;
7824 }
7825 }
7826 else
7827 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ROI"))
7828 {
7829 string val = sts[i].Substring(5);
7830 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
7831 int serie = int.Parse(val);
7832 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 7)
7833 {
7834 string s = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf("ROI:") + 4, sts[i].Length - (sts[i].IndexOf("ROI:") + 4));
7835 string ro = s.Substring(s.IndexOf(":") + 1, s.Length - (s.IndexOf(':') + 1));
7836 ROI roi = StringToROI(ro);
7837 b.Annotations.Add(roi);
7838 }
7839 }
7840 else
7841 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ImageInfo"))
7842 {
7843 string val = sts[i].Substring(11);
7844 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
7845 int serie = int.Parse(val);
7846 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 10)
7847 {
7848 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
7849 b.imageInfo = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<ImageInfo>(cht);
7850 }
7851
7852 }
7853 }
7854
7855 InitDirectoryResolution(b, image, imDesc);
7856
7857 b.Coords = new int[b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT];
7858
7859 //If this is a tiff file not made by Bio we init channels based on RGBChannels.
7860 if (b.Channels.Count == 0)
7861 b.Channels.Add(new Channel(0, b.bitsPerPixel, RGBChannelCount));
7862
7863 //Lets check to see the channels are correctly defined in this file
7864 for (int ch = 0; ch < b.Channels.Count; ch++)
7865 {
7866 if (b.Channels[ch].SamplesPerPixel != RGBChannelCount)
7867 {
7868 b.Channels[ch].SamplesPerPixel = RGBChannelCount;
7869 }
7870 }
7871
7872 int z = 0;
7873 int c = 0;
7874 int t = 0;
7875 b.Buffers = new List<BufferInfo>();
7876
7877 if (vips && tiled)
7878 {
7879 OpenVip(b, d, x, y, w, h);
7880 }
7881 else
7882 {
7883 int pages = image.NumberOfDirectories() / b.seriesCount;
7884 //int stride = image.ScanlineSize();
7885 int str = image.ScanlineSize();
7886 //If calculated stride and image scanline size is not the same it means the image is written in planes
7887 bool planes = false;
7888 if (stride != str)
7889 planes = true;
7890 if (planes)
7891 {
7892 BufferInfo[] bfs = new BufferInfo[3];
7893 for (int pl = 0; pl < 3; pl++)
7894 {
7895 byte[] bytes = new byte[str * SizeY];
7896 for (int im = 0, offset = 0; im < SizeY; im++)
7897 {
7898 image.ReadScanline(bytes, offset, im, (short)pl);
7899 offset += str;
7900 }
7901 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
7902 bfs[pl] = new BufferInfo(file, SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale, bytes, new ZCT(0, 0, 0), d, b.littleEndian, true);
7903 else
7904 bfs[pl] = new BufferInfo(file, SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed, bytes, new ZCT(0, 0, 0), d, b.littleEndian, true);
7905 }
7906 BufferInfo bf;
7907 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
7908 bf = BufferInfo.RGB16To48(bfs);
7909 else
7910 bf = BufferInfo.RGB8To24(bfs);
7911 bf.SwitchRedBlue();
7912 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
7913 b.Buffers.Add(bf);
7914 }
7915 else
7916 {
7917 byte[] bytes = new byte[stride * SizeY];
7918 for (int im = 0, offset = 0; im < SizeY; im++)
7919 {
7920 image.ReadScanline(bytes, offset, im, 0);
7921 offset += stride;
7922 }
7923 BufferInfo inf = new BufferInfo(file, SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat, bytes, new ZCT(0, 0, 0), d, b.littleEndian, true);
7924 if (inf.PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
7925 inf.SwitchRedBlue();
7926 b.Buffers.Add(inf);
7927 Statistics.CalcStatistics(inf);
7928 }
7929 pr.UpdateProgressF((float)((double)d / (double)(series + 1) * pages));
7930 Application.DoEvents();
7931 }
7932
7933 }
7934 image.Close();
7935 b.UpdateCoords();
7936 }
7937 else
7938 {
7939 b.bitsPerPixel = 8;
7940 b.littleEndian = BitConverter.IsLittleEndian;
7941 b.sizeZ = 1;
7942 b.sizeC = 1;
7943 b.sizeT = 1;
7944 BufferInfo inf = null;
7945 //We use a try block incase this is an OME file
7946 try
7947 {
7948 Image im = Image.FromFile(file);
7949 b.imageInfo.PhysicalSizeZ = 1;
7950 b.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(im.Width, im.Height, im.PixelFormat, 2.54 / im.HorizontalResolution, 2.54 / im.VerticalResolution, 1, 0, 0, 0));
7951 inf = new BufferInfo(file, Image.FromFile(file), new ZCT(0, 0, 0), 0);
7952 Statistics.CalcStatistics(inf);
7953 }
7954 catch (Exception)
7955 {
7956 b.Dispose();
7957 return OpenOME(file);
7958 }
7959 b.Buffers.Add(inf);
7960 Channel ch = new Channel(0, 8, b.RGBChannelCount);
7961 b.Channels.Add(ch);
7962 b.Coords = new int[b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.sizeT];
7963 b.imageInfo.Series = 0;
7964
7965 }
7966 //We wait for histogram image statistics calculation
7967 do
7968 {
7969 } while (b.Buffers[b.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
7970
7971 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
7972 AutoThreshold(b, false);
7973 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
7974 b.StackThreshold(true);
7975 else
7976 b.StackThreshold(false);
7977 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.Open(" + '"' + file + '"' + ");");
7978 Images.AddImage(b,newTab);
7979 pr.Close();
7980 pr.Dispose();
7981 st.Stop();
7982 return b;
7983 }
7990 public static bool isTiffSeries(string file)
7991 {
7992 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
7993 string desc = "";
7994 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
7995 image.Close();
7996 string[] sts = desc.Split('\n');
7997 int index = 0;
7998 for (int i = 0; i < sts.Length; i++)
7999 {
8000 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ImageInfo"))
8001 {
8002 string val = sts[i].Substring(11);
8003 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
8004 int serie = int.Parse(val);
8005 if (sts[i].Length > 10)
8006 {
8007 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
8008 ImageInfo info = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<ImageInfo>(cht);
8009 if (info.Series > 1)
8010 return true;
8011 else
8012 return false;
8013 }
8014 }
8015 }
8016 return false;
8017 }
8024 public static bool isOME(string file)
8025 {
8026 if (file.EndsWith(".ome.tif") || file.EndsWith(".OME.TIF"))
8027 return true;
8028 if (file.EndsWith(".tif") || file.EndsWith(".TIF") || file.EndsWith("tiff") || file.EndsWith("TIFF"))
8029 {
8030 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
8031 string desc = "";
8032 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
8033 image.Close();
8034 if (desc.Contains("<OME"))
8035 return true;
8036 else
8037 return false;
8038 }
8039 if (!(file.EndsWith("png") || file.EndsWith("PNG") || file.EndsWith("jpg") || file.EndsWith("JPG") ||
8040 file.EndsWith("jpeg") || file.EndsWith("JPEG") || file.EndsWith("bmp") || file.EndsWith("BMP")))
8041 {
8042 return true;
8043 }
8044 else return false;
8045 }
8051 public static bool isOMESeries(string file)
8052 {
8053 if (!isOME(file))
8054 return false;
8055 ImageReader reader = new ImageReader();
8056 var meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)new ServiceFactory().getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
8057 reader.setMetadataStore((MetadataStore)meta);
8058 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
8059 reader.setId(file);
8060 bool ser = false;
8061 if (reader.getSeriesCount() > 1)
8062 ser = true;
8063 reader.close();
8064 reader = null;
8065 return ser;
8066 }
8071 public static void SaveOME(string file, string ID)
8072 {
8073 string[] sts = new string[1];
8074 sts[0] = ID;
8075 SaveOMESeries(sts, file, Properties.Settings.Default.Planes);
8076 }
8082 public static void SaveOMESeries(string[] files, string f, bool planes)
8083 {
8084 if (File.Exists(f))
8085 File.Delete(f);
8086 loci.formats.meta.IMetadata omexml = service.createOMEXMLMetadata();
8087 for (int fi = 0; fi < files.Length; fi++)
8088 {
8089 int serie = fi;
8090 string file = files[fi];
8091 BioImage b = Images.GetImage(file);
8092 // create OME-XML metadata store
8093
8094 omexml.setImageID("Image:" + serie, serie);
8095 omexml.setPixelsID("Pixels:" + serie, serie);
8096 omexml.setPixelsInterleaved(java.lang.Boolean.TRUE, serie);
8097 omexml.setPixelsDimensionOrder(ome.xml.model.enums.DimensionOrder.XYCZT, serie);
8098 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
8099 omexml.setPixelsType(ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16, serie);
8100 else
8101 omexml.setPixelsType(ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8, serie);
8102 omexml.setPixelsSizeX(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeX)), serie);
8103 omexml.setPixelsSizeY(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeY)), serie);
8104 omexml.setPixelsSizeZ(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeZ)), serie);
8105 int samples = 1;
8106 if (b.isRGB)
8107 samples = 3;
8108 omexml.setPixelsSizeC(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeC)), serie);
8109 omexml.setPixelsSizeT(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeT)), serie);
8110 if (BitConverter.IsLittleEndian)
8111 omexml.setPixelsBigEndian(java.lang.Boolean.FALSE, serie);
8112 else
8113 omexml.setPixelsBigEndian(java.lang.Boolean.TRUE, serie);
8114 ome.units.quantity.Length p1 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeX), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
8115 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeX(p1, serie);
8116 ome.units.quantity.Length p2 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeY), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
8117 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeY(p2, serie);
8118 ome.units.quantity.Length p3 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeZ), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
8119 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(p3, serie);
8120 ome.units.quantity.Length s1 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.X), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
8121 omexml.setStageLabelX(s1, serie);
8122 ome.units.quantity.Length s2 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.Y), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
8123 omexml.setStageLabelY(s2, serie);
8124 ome.units.quantity.Length s3 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.Z), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
8125 omexml.setStageLabelZ(s3, serie);
8126 omexml.setStageLabelName("StageLabel:" + serie, serie);
8127
8128 for (int channel = 0; channel < b.Channels.Count; channel++)
8129 {
8130 Channel c = b.Channels[channel];
8131 for (int r = 0; r < c.range.Length; r++)
8132 {
8133 omexml.setChannelID("Channel:" + channel + ":" + serie, serie, channel + r);
8134 omexml.setChannelSamplesPerPixel(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(1)), serie, channel + r);
8135 if (c.LightSourceWavelength != 0)
8136 {
8137 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsID("LightSourceSettings:" + channel, serie, channel + r);
8138 ome.units.quantity.Length lw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.LightSourceWavelength), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
8139 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsWavelength(lw, serie, channel + r);
8140 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(PercentFraction.valueOf(c.LightSourceAttenuation), serie, channel + r);
8141 }
8142 omexml.setChannelName(c.Name, serie, channel + r);
8143 if (c.Color != null)
8144 {
8145 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(c.Color.Value.R, c.Color.Value.G, c.Color.Value.B, c.Color.Value.A);
8146 omexml.setChannelColor(col, serie, channel + r);
8147 }
8148 if (c.Emission != 0)
8149 {
8150 ome.units.quantity.Length em = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.Emission), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
8151 omexml.setChannelEmissionWavelength(em, serie, channel + r);
8152 ome.units.quantity.Length ex = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.Excitation), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
8153 omexml.setChannelExcitationWavelength(ex, serie, channel + r);
8154 }
8155 omexml.setChannelContrastMethod(c.ContrastMethod, serie, channel + r);
8156 omexml.setChannelFluor(c.Fluor, serie, channel + r);
8157 omexml.setChannelIlluminationType(c.IlluminationType, serie, channel + r);
8158
8159 if (c.LightSourceIntensity != 0)
8160 {
8161 ome.units.quantity.Power pw = new ome.units.quantity.Power(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.LightSourceIntensity), ome.units.UNITS.VOLT);
8162 omexml.setLightEmittingDiodePower(pw, serie, channel + r);
8163 omexml.setLightEmittingDiodeID(c.DiodeName, serie, channel + r);
8164 }
8165 if (c.AcquisitionMode != null)
8166 omexml.setChannelAcquisitionMode(c.AcquisitionMode, serie, channel + r);
8167 }
8168 }
8169
8170 int i = 0;
8171 foreach (ROI an in b.Annotations)
8172 {
8173 if (an.roiID == "")
8174 omexml.setROIID("ROI:" + i.ToString() + ":" + serie, i);
8175 else
8176 omexml.setROIID(an.roiID, i);
8177 omexml.setROIName(an.roiName, i);
8178 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Point)
8179 {
8180 if (an.id != "")
8181 omexml.setPointID(an.id, i, serie);
8182 else
8183 omexml.setPointID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
8184 omexml.setPointX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.X)), i, serie);
8185 omexml.setPointY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Y)), i, serie);
8186 omexml.setPointTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
8187 omexml.setPointTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
8188 omexml.setPointTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
8189 if (an.Text != "")
8190 omexml.setPointText(an.Text, i, serie);
8191 else
8192 omexml.setPointText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
8193 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.font.Size), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8194 omexml.setPointFontSize(fl, i, serie);
8195 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
8196 omexml.setPointStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
8197 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8198 omexml.setPointStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
8199 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
8200 omexml.setPointFillColor(colf, i, serie);
8201 }
8202 else
8203 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Polygon || an.type == ROI.Type.Freeform)
8204 {
8205 if (an.id != "")
8206 omexml.setPolygonID(an.id, i, serie);
8207 else
8208 omexml.setPolygonID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
8209 omexml.setPolygonPoints(an.PointsToString(b), i, serie);
8210 omexml.setPolygonTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
8211 omexml.setPolygonTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
8212 omexml.setPolygonTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
8213 if (an.Text != "")
8214 omexml.setPolygonText(an.Text, i, serie);
8215 else
8216 omexml.setPolygonText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
8217 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.font.Size), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8218 omexml.setPolygonFontSize(fl, i, serie);
8219 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
8220 omexml.setPolygonStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
8221 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8222 omexml.setPolygonStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
8223 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
8224 omexml.setPolygonFillColor(colf, i, serie);
8225 }
8226 else
8227 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Rectangle)
8228 {
8229 if (an.id != "")
8230 omexml.setRectangleID(an.id, i, serie);
8231 else
8232 omexml.setRectangleID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
8233 omexml.setRectangleWidth(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeX(an.W)), i, serie);
8234 omexml.setRectangleHeight(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeY(an.H)), i, serie);
8235 omexml.setRectangleX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.Rect.X)), i, serie);
8236 omexml.setRectangleY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Rect.Y)), i, serie);
8237 omexml.setRectangleTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
8238 omexml.setRectangleTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
8239 omexml.setRectangleTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
8240 omexml.setRectangleText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
8241 if (an.Text != "")
8242 omexml.setRectangleText(an.Text, i, serie);
8243 else
8244 omexml.setRectangleText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
8245 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.font.Size), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8246 omexml.setRectangleFontSize(fl, i, serie);
8247 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
8248 omexml.setRectangleStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
8249 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8250 omexml.setRectangleStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
8251 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
8252 omexml.setRectangleFillColor(colf, i, serie);
8253 }
8254 else
8255 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Line)
8256 {
8257 if (an.id != "")
8258 omexml.setLineID(an.id, i, serie);
8259 else
8260 omexml.setLineID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
8261 omexml.setLineX1(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.GetPoint(0).X)), i, serie);
8262 omexml.setLineY1(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.GetPoint(0).Y)), i, serie);
8263 omexml.setLineX2(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.GetPoint(1).X)), i, serie);
8264 omexml.setLineY2(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.GetPoint(1).Y)), i, serie);
8265 omexml.setLineTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
8266 omexml.setLineTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
8267 omexml.setLineTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
8268 if (an.Text != "")
8269 omexml.setLineText(an.Text, i, serie);
8270 else
8271 omexml.setLineText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
8272 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.font.Size), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8273 omexml.setLineFontSize(fl, i, serie);
8274 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
8275 omexml.setLineStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
8276 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8277 omexml.setLineStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
8278 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
8279 omexml.setLineFillColor(colf, i, serie);
8280 }
8281 else
8282 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Ellipse)
8283 {
8284
8285 if (an.id != "")
8286 omexml.setEllipseID(an.id, i, serie);
8287 else
8288 omexml.setEllipseID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
8289 //We need to change System.Drawing.Rectangle to ellipse radius;
8290 double w = (double)an.W / 2;
8291 double h = (double)an.H / 2;
8292 omexml.setEllipseRadiusX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeX(w)), i, serie);
8293 omexml.setEllipseRadiusY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeY(h)), i, serie);
8294
8295 double x = an.Point.X + w;
8296 double y = an.Point.Y + h;
8297 omexml.setEllipseX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(x)), i, serie);
8298 omexml.setEllipseY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(y)), i, serie);
8299 omexml.setEllipseTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
8300 omexml.setEllipseTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
8301 omexml.setEllipseTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
8302 if (an.Text != "")
8303 omexml.setEllipseText(an.Text, i, serie);
8304 else
8305 omexml.setEllipseText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
8306 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.font.Size), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8307 omexml.setEllipseFontSize(fl, i, serie);
8308 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
8309 omexml.setEllipseStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
8310 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8311 omexml.setEllipseStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
8312 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
8313 omexml.setEllipseFillColor(colf, i, serie);
8314 }
8315 else
8316 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Label)
8317 {
8318 if (an.id != "")
8319 omexml.setLabelID(an.id, i, serie);
8320 else
8321 omexml.setLabelID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
8322 omexml.setLabelX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.Rect.X)), i, serie);
8323 omexml.setLabelY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Rect.Y)), i, serie);
8324 omexml.setLabelTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
8325 omexml.setLabelTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
8326 omexml.setLabelTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
8327 omexml.setLabelText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
8328 if (an.Text != "")
8329 omexml.setLabelText(an.Text, i, serie);
8330 else
8331 omexml.setLabelText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
8332 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.font.Size), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8333 omexml.setLabelFontSize(fl, i, serie);
8334 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
8335 omexml.setLabelStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
8336 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8337 omexml.setLabelStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
8338 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
8339 omexml.setLabelFillColor(colf, i, serie);
8340 }
8341 i++;
8342 }
8343 if (b.Buffers[0].Plane != null && planes)
8344 for (int bu = 0; bu < b.Buffers.Count; bu++)
8345 {
8346 //Correct order of parameters.
8347 if (b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Delta != 0)
8348 {
8349 ome.units.quantity.Time t = new ome.units.quantity.Time(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Delta), ome.units.UNITS.MILLISECOND);
8350 omexml.setPlaneDeltaT(t, serie, bu);
8351 }
8352 if (b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Exposure != 0)
8353 {
8354 ome.units.quantity.Time et = new ome.units.quantity.Time(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Exposure), ome.units.UNITS.MILLISECOND);
8355 omexml.setPlaneExposureTime(et, serie, bu);
8356 }
8357 ome.units.quantity.Length lx = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.X), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
8358 ome.units.quantity.Length ly = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.Y), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
8359 ome.units.quantity.Length lz = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.Z), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
8360 omexml.setPlanePositionX(lx, serie, bu);
8361 omexml.setPlanePositionY(ly, serie, bu);
8362 omexml.setPlanePositionZ(lz, serie, bu);
8363 omexml.setPlaneTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.C)), serie, bu);
8364 omexml.setPlaneTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.Z)), serie, bu);
8365 omexml.setPlaneTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.T)), serie, bu);
8366
8367 omexml.setTiffDataPlaneCount(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(1)), serie, bu);
8368 omexml.setTiffDataIFD(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(bu)), serie, bu);
8369 omexml.setTiffDataFirstC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.C)), serie, bu);
8370 omexml.setTiffDataFirstZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.Z)), serie, bu);
8371 omexml.setTiffDataFirstT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.T)), serie, bu);
8372
8373 }
8374
8375 }
8376 writer.setMetadataRetrieve(omexml);
8377 f = f.Replace("\\", "/");
8378 writer.setId(f);
8379 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
8380 {
8381 string file = files[i];
8382 Progress pr = new Progress(file, "Saving");
8383 pr.Show();
8384 BioImage b = Images.GetImage(files[i]);
8385 writer.setSeries(i);
8386 for (int bu = 0; bu < b.Buffers.Count; bu++)
8387 {
8388 writer.saveBytes(bu, b.Buffers[bu].GetSaveBytes(BitConverter.IsLittleEndian));
8389 pr.UpdateProgressF((float)bu / b.Buffers.Count);
8390 Application.DoEvents();
8391 }
8392 pr.Close();
8393 pr.Dispose();
8394 }
8395 bool stop = false;
8396 do
8397 {
8398 try
8399 {
8400 writer.close();
8401 stop = true;
8402 }
8403 catch (Exception e)
8404 {
8405 Scripting.LogLine(e.Message);
8406 }
8407
8408 } while (!stop);
8409 }
8410 public static void SaveOMESeries(BioImage[] bms, string f, bool planes)
8411 {
8412 List<string> sts = new List<string>();
8413 foreach (BioImage b in bms)
8414 {
8415 sts.Add(b.ID);
8416 }
8417 SaveOMESeries(sts.ToArray(), f, planes);
8418 }
8419 public static void SaveOMEStiched(BioImage[] bms, string file, string compression)
8420 {
8421 if (File.Exists(file))
8422 File.Delete(file);
8423 loci.formats.meta.IMetadata omexml = service.createOMEXMLMetadata();
8424 //We need to go through the images and find the ones belonging to each resolution.
8425 //As well we need to determine the dimensions of the tiles.
8426 Dictionary<double, List<BioImage>> bis = new Dictionary<double, List<BioImage>>();
8427 Dictionary<double, Point3D> min = new Dictionary<double, Point3D>();
8428 Dictionary<double, Point3D> max = new Dictionary<double, Point3D>();
8429 for (int i = 0; i < bms.Length; i++)
8430 {
8431 if (bis.ContainsKey(bms[i].Resolution.PhysicalSizeX))
8432 {
8433 bis[bms[i].Resolution.PhysicalSizeX].Add(bms[i]);
8434 if (bms[i].StageSizeX < min[bms[i].Resolution.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY < min[bms[i].Resolution.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
8435 {
8436 min[bms[i].Resolution.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
8437 }
8438 if (bms[i].StageSizeX > max[bms[i].Resolution.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY > max[bms[i].Resolution.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
8439 {
8440 max[bms[i].Resolution.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
8441 }
8442 }
8443 else
8444 {
8445 bis.Add(bms[i].Resolution.PhysicalSizeX, new List<BioImage>());
8446 min.Add(bms[i].Resolution.PhysicalSizeX, new Point3D(bms[i].StageSizeX, bms[i].StageSizeY, bms[i].StageSizeZ));
8447 max.Add(bms[i].Resolution.PhysicalSizeX, new Point3D(bms[i].StageSizeX, bms[i].StageSizeY, bms[i].StageSizeZ));
8448 bis[bms[i].Resolution.PhysicalSizeX].Add(bms[i]);
8449 }
8450 }
8451 int s = 0;
8452 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
8453 {
8454 int xi = 1 + (int)Math.Ceiling((max[px].X - min[px].X) / bis[px][0].Resolution.VolumeWidth);
8455 int yi = 1 + (int)Math.Ceiling((max[px].Y - min[px].Y) / bis[px][0].Resolution.VolumeHeight);
8456 BioImage b = bis[px][0];
8457 int serie = s;
8458 // create OME-XML metadata store.
8459 omexml.setImageID("Image:" + serie, serie);
8460 omexml.setPixelsID("Pixels:" + serie, serie);
8461 omexml.setPixelsInterleaved(java.lang.Boolean.TRUE, serie);
8462 omexml.setPixelsDimensionOrder(ome.xml.model.enums.DimensionOrder.XYCZT, serie);
8463 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
8464 omexml.setPixelsType(ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16, serie);
8465 else
8466 omexml.setPixelsType(ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8, serie);
8467 omexml.setPixelsSizeX(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeX * xi)), serie);
8468 omexml.setPixelsSizeY(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeY * yi)), serie);
8469 omexml.setPixelsSizeZ(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeZ)), serie);
8470 int samples = 1;
8471 if (b.isRGB)
8472 samples = 3;
8473 omexml.setPixelsSizeC(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeC)), serie);
8474 omexml.setPixelsSizeT(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeT)), serie);
8475 if (BitConverter.IsLittleEndian)
8476 omexml.setPixelsBigEndian(java.lang.Boolean.FALSE, serie);
8477 else
8478 omexml.setPixelsBigEndian(java.lang.Boolean.TRUE, serie);
8479 ome.units.quantity.Length p1 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeX), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
8480 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeX(p1, serie);
8481 ome.units.quantity.Length p2 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeY), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
8482 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeY(p2, serie);
8483 ome.units.quantity.Length p3 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeZ), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
8484 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(p3, serie);
8485 ome.units.quantity.Length s1 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.X), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
8486 omexml.setStageLabelX(s1, serie);
8487 ome.units.quantity.Length s2 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.Y), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
8488 omexml.setStageLabelY(s2, serie);
8489 ome.units.quantity.Length s3 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.Z), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
8490 omexml.setStageLabelZ(s3, serie);
8491 omexml.setStageLabelName("StageLabel:" + serie, serie);
8492
8493 for (int channel = 0; channel < b.Channels.Count; channel++)
8494 {
8495 Channel c = b.Channels[channel];
8496 for (int r = 0; r < c.range.Length; r++)
8497 {
8498 omexml.setChannelID("Channel:" + channel + ":" + serie, serie, channel + r);
8499 omexml.setChannelSamplesPerPixel(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(1)), serie, channel + r);
8500 if (c.LightSourceWavelength != 0)
8501 {
8502 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsID("LightSourceSettings:" + channel, serie, channel + r);
8503 ome.units.quantity.Length lw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.LightSourceWavelength), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
8504 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsWavelength(lw, serie, channel + r);
8505 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(PercentFraction.valueOf(c.LightSourceAttenuation), serie, channel + r);
8506 }
8507 omexml.setChannelName(c.Name, serie, channel + r);
8508 if (c.Color != null)
8509 {
8510 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(c.Color.Value.R, c.Color.Value.G, c.Color.Value.B, c.Color.Value.A);
8511 omexml.setChannelColor(col, serie, channel + r);
8512 }
8513 if (c.Emission != 0)
8514 {
8515 ome.units.quantity.Length em = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.Emission), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
8516 omexml.setChannelEmissionWavelength(em, serie, channel + r);
8517 ome.units.quantity.Length ex = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.Excitation), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
8518 omexml.setChannelExcitationWavelength(ex, serie, channel + r);
8519 }
8520 omexml.setChannelContrastMethod(c.ContrastMethod, serie, channel + r);
8521 omexml.setChannelFluor(c.Fluor, serie, channel + r);
8522 omexml.setChannelIlluminationType(c.IlluminationType, serie, channel + r);
8523
8524 if (c.LightSourceIntensity != 0)
8525 {
8526 ome.units.quantity.Power pw = new ome.units.quantity.Power(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.LightSourceIntensity), ome.units.UNITS.VOLT);
8527 omexml.setLightEmittingDiodePower(pw, serie, channel + r);
8528 omexml.setLightEmittingDiodeID(c.DiodeName, serie, channel + r);
8529 }
8530 if (c.AcquisitionMode != null)
8531 omexml.setChannelAcquisitionMode(c.AcquisitionMode, serie, channel + r);
8532 }
8533 }
8534
8535 int i = 0;
8536 foreach (ROI an in b.Annotations)
8537 {
8538 if (an.roiID == "")
8539 omexml.setROIID("ROI:" + i.ToString() + ":" + serie, i);
8540 else
8541 omexml.setROIID(an.roiID, i);
8542 omexml.setROIName(an.roiName, i);
8543 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Point)
8544 {
8545 if (an.id != "")
8546 omexml.setPointID(an.id, i, serie);
8547 else
8548 omexml.setPointID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
8549 omexml.setPointX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.X)), i, serie);
8550 omexml.setPointY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Y)), i, serie);
8551 omexml.setPointTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
8552 omexml.setPointTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
8553 omexml.setPointTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
8554 if (an.Text != "")
8555 omexml.setPointText(an.Text, i, serie);
8556 else
8557 omexml.setPointText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
8558 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.font.Size), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8559 omexml.setPointFontSize(fl, i, serie);
8560 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
8561 omexml.setPointStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
8562 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8563 omexml.setPointStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
8564 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
8565 omexml.setPointFillColor(colf, i, serie);
8566 }
8567 else
8568 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Polygon || an.type == ROI.Type.Freeform)
8569 {
8570 if (an.id != "")
8571 omexml.setPolygonID(an.id, i, serie);
8572 else
8573 omexml.setPolygonID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
8574 omexml.setPolygonPoints(an.PointsToString(b), i, serie);
8575 omexml.setPolygonTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
8576 omexml.setPolygonTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
8577 omexml.setPolygonTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
8578 if (an.Text != "")
8579 omexml.setPolygonText(an.Text, i, serie);
8580 else
8581 omexml.setPolygonText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
8582 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.font.Size), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8583 omexml.setPolygonFontSize(fl, i, serie);
8584 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
8585 omexml.setPolygonStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
8586 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8587 omexml.setPolygonStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
8588 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
8589 omexml.setPolygonFillColor(colf, i, serie);
8590 }
8591 else
8592 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Rectangle)
8593 {
8594 if (an.id != "")
8595 omexml.setRectangleID(an.id, i, serie);
8596 else
8597 omexml.setRectangleID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
8598 omexml.setRectangleWidth(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeX(an.W)), i, serie);
8599 omexml.setRectangleHeight(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeY(an.H)), i, serie);
8600 omexml.setRectangleX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.Rect.X)), i, serie);
8601 omexml.setRectangleY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Rect.Y)), i, serie);
8602 omexml.setRectangleTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
8603 omexml.setRectangleTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
8604 omexml.setRectangleTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
8605 omexml.setRectangleText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
8606 if (an.Text != "")
8607 omexml.setRectangleText(an.Text, i, serie);
8608 else
8609 omexml.setRectangleText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
8610 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.font.Size), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8611 omexml.setRectangleFontSize(fl, i, serie);
8612 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
8613 omexml.setRectangleStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
8614 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8615 omexml.setRectangleStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
8616 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
8617 omexml.setRectangleFillColor(colf, i, serie);
8618 }
8619 else
8620 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Line)
8621 {
8622 if (an.id != "")
8623 omexml.setLineID(an.id, i, serie);
8624 else
8625 omexml.setLineID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
8626 omexml.setLineX1(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.GetPoint(0).X)), i, serie);
8627 omexml.setLineY1(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.GetPoint(0).Y)), i, serie);
8628 omexml.setLineX2(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.GetPoint(1).X)), i, serie);
8629 omexml.setLineY2(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.GetPoint(1).Y)), i, serie);
8630 omexml.setLineTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
8631 omexml.setLineTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
8632 omexml.setLineTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
8633 if (an.Text != "")
8634 omexml.setLineText(an.Text, i, serie);
8635 else
8636 omexml.setLineText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
8637 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.font.Size), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8638 omexml.setLineFontSize(fl, i, serie);
8639 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
8640 omexml.setLineStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
8641 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8642 omexml.setLineStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
8643 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
8644 omexml.setLineFillColor(colf, i, serie);
8645 }
8646 else
8647 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Ellipse)
8648 {
8649
8650 if (an.id != "")
8651 omexml.setEllipseID(an.id, i, serie);
8652 else
8653 omexml.setEllipseID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
8654 //We need to change System.Drawing.Rectangle to ellipse radius;
8655 double w = (double)an.W / 2;
8656 double h = (double)an.H / 2;
8657 omexml.setEllipseRadiusX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeX(w)), i, serie);
8658 omexml.setEllipseRadiusY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeY(h)), i, serie);
8659
8660 double x = an.Point.X + w;
8661 double y = an.Point.Y + h;
8662 omexml.setEllipseX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(x)), i, serie);
8663 omexml.setEllipseY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(y)), i, serie);
8664 omexml.setEllipseTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
8665 omexml.setEllipseTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
8666 omexml.setEllipseTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
8667 if (an.Text != "")
8668 omexml.setEllipseText(an.Text, i, serie);
8669 else
8670 omexml.setEllipseText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
8671 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.font.Size), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8672 omexml.setEllipseFontSize(fl, i, serie);
8673 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
8674 omexml.setEllipseStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
8675 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8676 omexml.setEllipseStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
8677 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
8678 omexml.setEllipseFillColor(colf, i, serie);
8679 }
8680 else
8681 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Label)
8682 {
8683 if (an.id != "")
8684 omexml.setLabelID(an.id, i, serie);
8685 else
8686 omexml.setLabelID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
8687 omexml.setLabelX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.Rect.X)), i, serie);
8688 omexml.setLabelY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Rect.Y)), i, serie);
8689 omexml.setLabelTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
8690 omexml.setLabelTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
8691 omexml.setLabelTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
8692 omexml.setLabelText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
8693 if (an.Text != "")
8694 omexml.setLabelText(an.Text, i, serie);
8695 else
8696 omexml.setLabelText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
8697 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.font.Size), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8698 omexml.setLabelFontSize(fl, i, serie);
8699 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
8700 omexml.setLabelStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
8701 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
8702 omexml.setLabelStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
8703 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
8704 omexml.setLabelFillColor(colf, i, serie);
8705 }
8706 i++;
8707 }
8708 s++;
8709 }
8710 writer.setMetadataRetrieve(omexml);
8711 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
8712 writer.setId(file);
8713 writer.setCompression(compression);
8714 int xx; int yy;
8715 Progress pr = new Progress(file, "Saving");
8716 pr.Show();
8717 s = 0;
8718 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
8719 {
8720 writer.setSeries(s);
8721 PointD p = new PointD(max[px].X - min[px].X, max[px].Y - min[px].Y);
8722 for (int i = 0; i < bis[px].Count; i++)
8723 {
8724 BioImage b = bis[px][i];
8725 writer.setTileSizeX(b.SizeX);
8726 writer.setTileSizeY(b.SizeY);
8727 double dx = Math.Ceiling((bis[px][i].StageSizeX - min[px].X) / bis[px][i].Resolution.VolumeWidth);
8728 double dy = Math.Ceiling((bis[px][i].StageSizeY - min[px].Y) / bis[px][i].Resolution.VolumeHeight);
8729 for (int bu = 0; bu < b.Buffers.Count; bu++)
8730 {
8731 byte[] bt = b.Buffers[bu].GetSaveBytes(BitConverter.IsLittleEndian);
8732 writer.saveBytes(bu, bt, (int)dx * b.SizeX, (int)dy * b.SizeY, b.SizeX, b.SizeY);
8733 Application.DoEvents();
8734 }
8735 pr.UpdateProgressF((float)i / bis[px].Count);
8736
8737 }
8738 }
8739 pr.Close();
8740 pr.Dispose();
8741 bool stop = false;
8742 do
8743 {
8744 try
8745 {
8746 writer.close();
8747 stop = true;
8748 }
8749 catch (Exception e)
8750 {
8751 Scripting.LogLine(e.Message);
8752 }
8753 } while (!stop);
8754 }
8755
8767 private static int GetBands(PixelFormat format)
8768 {
8769 switch (format)
8770 {
8771 case PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed: return 1;
8772 case PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale: return 1;
8773 case PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb: return 3;
8774 case PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb:
8775 case PixelFormat.Format32bppPArgb:
8776 case PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb:
8777 return 4;
8778 case PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb:
8779 return 3;
8780 default:
8781 throw new NotSupportedException($"Unsupported pixel format: {format}");
8782 }
8783 }
8794 public static void SaveOMEPyramidal(BioImage[] bms, string file, Enums.ForeignTiffCompression compression, int compressionLevel)
8795 {
8796 if (File.Exists(file))
8797 File.Delete(file);
8798 //We need to go through the images and find the ones belonging to each resolution.
8799 //As well we need to determine the dimensions of the tiles.
8800 Dictionary<double, List<BioImage>> bis = new Dictionary<double, List<BioImage>>();
8801 Dictionary<double, Point3D> min = new Dictionary<double, Point3D>();
8802 Dictionary<double, Point3D> max = new Dictionary<double, Point3D>();
8803 for (int i = 0; i < bms.Length; i++)
8804 {
8805 Resolution res = bms[i].Resolutions[bms[i].resolution];
8806 if (bis.ContainsKey(res.PhysicalSizeX))
8807 {
8808 bis[res.PhysicalSizeX].Add(bms[i]);
8809 if (bms[i].StageSizeX < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
8810 {
8811 min[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
8812 }
8813 if (bms[i].StageSizeX > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
8814 {
8815 max[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
8816 }
8817 }
8818 else
8819 {
8820 bis.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new List<BioImage>());
8821 min.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new Point3D(double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue));
8822 max.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new Point3D(double.MinValue, double.MinValue, double.MinValue));
8823 if (bms[i].StageSizeX < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
8824 {
8825 min[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
8826 }
8827 if (bms[i].StageSizeX > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
8828 {
8829 max[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
8830 }
8831 bis[res.PhysicalSizeX].Add(bms[i]);
8832 }
8833 }
8834 int s = 0;
8835 //We determine the sizes of each resolution.
8836 Dictionary<double, Size> ss = new Dictionary<double, Size>();
8837 int minx = int.MaxValue;
8838 int miny = int.MaxValue;
8839 double last = 0;
8840 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
8841 {
8842 int xs = (1 + (int)Math.Ceiling((max[px].X - min[px].X) / bis[px][0].Resolutions[0].VolumeWidth)) * bis[px][0].SizeX;
8843 int ys = (1 + (int)Math.Ceiling((max[px].Y - min[px].Y) / bis[px][0].Resolutions[0].VolumeHeight)) * bis[px][0].SizeY;
8844 if (minx > xs)
8845 minx = xs;
8846 if (miny > ys)
8847 miny = ys;
8848 ss.Add(px, new Size(xs, ys));
8849 last = px;
8850 }
8851 s = 0;
8852 string met = "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\" standalone=\"no\"?>" +
8853 "<OME xmlns=\"http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06\" " +
8854 "xmlns:xsi=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance\" " +
8855 "xsi:schemaLocation=\"http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06 http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06/ome.xsd\">";
8856 NetVips.Image img = null;
8857 int ib = 0;
8858
8859 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
8860 {
8861 int c = bis[px][s].SizeC;
8862 if (bis[px][s].Buffers[0].isRGB)
8863 c = 3;
8864 string endian = (bis[px][s].Buffers[0].LittleEndian).ToString().ToLower(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
8865 met +=
8866 "<Image ID=\"Image:" + ib + "\">" +
8867 "<Pixels BigEndian=\"" + endian + "\" DimensionOrder= \"XYCZT\" ID= \"Pixels:0\" Interleaved=\"true\" " +
8868 "PhysicalSizeX=\"" + bis[px][s].PhysicalSizeX + "\" PhysicalSizeXUnit=\"µm\" PhysicalSizeY=\"" + bis[px][s].PhysicalSizeY + "\" PhysicalSizeYUnit=\"µm\" SignificantBits=\"" + bis[px][s].bitsPerPixel + "\" " +
8869 "SizeC = \"" + c + "\" SizeT = \"" + bis[px][s].SizeT + "\" SizeX =\"" + ss[px].Width +
8870 "\" SizeY= \"" + ss[px].Height + "\" SizeZ=\"" + bis[px][s].SizeZ;
8871 if (bis[px][s].bitsPerPixel > 8) met += "\" Type= \"uint16\">";
8872 else met += "\" Type= \"uint8\">";
8873 int i = 0;
8874 foreach (Channel ch in bis[px][s].Channels)
8875 {
8876 met += "<Channel ID=\"Channel:" + ib + ":" + i + "\" SamplesPerPixel=\"1\"></Channel>";
