8877 i++;
8878 }
8879 met += "</Pixels></Image>";
8880 ib++;
8881 }
8882 met += "</OME>";
8883 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
8884 {
8885 PixelFormat pf = bis[px][0].Buffers[0].PixelFormat;
8886 Bitmap level = new Bitmap(ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, pf);
8887 int bands = GetBands(pf);
8888 BitmapData d = level.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, level.Width, level.Height),ImageLockMode.ReadWrite,pf);
8889 if (bis[px][0].bitsPerPixel > 8)
8890 img = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(d.Scan0, (ulong)(d.Stride * d.Height), level.Width, level.Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Ushort);
8891 else
8892 img = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(d.Scan0, (ulong)(d.Stride * d.Height), level.Width, level.Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Uchar);
8893 int i = 0;
8894 foreach (BioImage b in bis[px])
8895 {
8896 Size si = ss[px];
8897 double xs = (-(min[px].X - bis[px][i].Volume.Location.X) / bis[px][i].Resolutions[0].VolumeWidth) * bis[px][i].SizeX;
8898 double ys = (-(min[px].Y - bis[px][i].Volume.Location.Y) / bis[px][i].Resolutions[0].VolumeHeight) * bis[px][i].SizeY;
8899 NetVips.Image tile;
8900 Bitmap bm = (Bitmap)bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Image;
8901 BitmapData bd = bm.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, level.Width, level.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, pf);
8902 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
8903 tile = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(bd.Scan0, (ulong)bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Length, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].SizeX, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].SizeY, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Ushort);
8904 else
8905 tile = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(bd.Scan0, (ulong)bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Length, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].SizeX, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].SizeY, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Uchar);
8906 img = img.Insert(tile, (int)xs, (int)ys);
8907 bm.UnlockBits(bd);
8908 i++;
8909 };
8910 level.UnlockBits(d);
8911 using var mutated = img.Mutate(mutable =>
8912 {
8913 // Set the ImageDescription tag
8914 mutable.Set(GValue.GStrType, "image-description", met);
8915 mutable.Set(GValue.GIntType, "page-height", ss[last].Height);
8916 });
8917 if (bis[px][0].bitsPerPixel > 8)
8918 mutated.Tiffsave(file, compression, 1, Enums.ForeignTiffPredictor.None, true, ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, true, false, 16,
8919 Enums.ForeignTiffResunit.Cm, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeX, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeY, true, null, Enums.RegionShrink.Nearest,
8920 compressionLevel, true, Enums.ForeignDzDepth.One, true, false, null, null, ss[px].Height);
8921 else
8922 mutated.Tiffsave(file, compression, 1, Enums.ForeignTiffPredictor.None, true, ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, true, false, 8,
8923 Enums.ForeignTiffResunit.Cm, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeX, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeY, true, null, Enums.RegionShrink.Nearest,
8924 compressionLevel, true, Enums.ForeignDzDepth.One, true, false, null, null, ss[px].Height);
8925 s++;
8926 }
8927
8928 }
8929
8935 public static BioImage OpenOME(string file)
8936 {
8937 return OpenOMESeries(file, true, true)[0];
8938 }
8947 public static BioImage OpenOME(string file, int serie, bool newTab, bool addToImages)
8948 {
8949 Recorder.AddLine("Bio.BioImage.OpenOME(\"" + file + "\"," + serie + ");");
8950 return OpenOME(file, serie, newTab, addToImages, true, false, 0, 0, 0, 0);
8951 }
8961 public static BioImage FilesToStack(string[] files, int sizeZ, int sizeC, int sizeT)
8962 {
8963 BioImage b = new BioImage(files[0]);
8964 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
8965 {
8966 BioImage bb = OpenFile(files[i]);
8967 b.Buffers.AddRange(bb.Buffers);
8968 }
8969 b.UpdateCoords(sizeZ, sizeC, sizeT);
8970 Images.AddImage(b,true);
8971 return b;
8972 }
8978 public static BioImage FolderToStack(string path)
8979 {
8980 string[] files = Directory.GetFiles(path);
8981 BioImage b = new BioImage(files[0]);
8982 int z = 0;
8983 int c = 0;
8984 int t = 0;
8985 BioImage bb = null;
8986 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
8987 {
8988 string[] st = files[i].Split('_');
8989 if (st.Length > 3)
8990 {
8991 z = int.Parse(st[1].Replace("Z", ""));
8992 c = int.Parse(st[2].Replace("C", ""));
8993 t = int.Parse(st[3].Replace("T", ""));
8994 }
8995 bb = OpenFile(files[i]);
8996 b.Buffers.AddRange(bb.Buffers);
8997 }
8998 if (z == 0)
8999 {
9000 ImagesToStack im = new ImagesToStack();
9001 if (im.ShowDialog() != DialogResult.OK)
9002 return null;
9003 b.UpdateCoords(im.SizeZ, im.SizeC, im.SizeT);
9004 }
9005 else
9006 b.UpdateCoords(z + 1, c + 1, t + 1);
9007 Images.AddImage(b,true);
9008 Recorder.AddLine("BioImage.FolderToStack(\"" + path + "\");");
9009 return b;
9010 }
9011 public static BioImage OpenOME(string file, int serie, bool newTab, bool addToImages, bool progress, bool tile, int tilex, int tiley, int tileSizeX, int tileSizeY)
9012 {
9013 //We wait incase OME has not initialized yet.
9014 if (!initialized)
9015 do
9016 {
9017 Thread.Sleep(100);
9018 Application.DoEvents();
9019 } while (!Initialized);
9020 if (file == null || file == "")
9021 throw new InvalidDataException("File is empty or null");
9022 Progress pr = null;
9023 if (progress)
9024 {
9025 pr = new Progress(file, "Opening OME");
9026 pr.Show();
9027 }
9028 Application.DoEvents();
9029 st.Start();
9030 BioImage b = new BioImage(file);
9031 b.Loading = true;
9032 b.meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)new ServiceFactory().getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
9033 reader = new ImageReader();
9034 reader.setMetadataStore((MetadataStore)b.meta);
9035 vips = VipsSupport(file);
9036 string str = reader.getCurrentFile();
9037 if (str == null)
9038 str = "";
9039 str = str.Replace("\\", "/");
9040 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
9041 if (str != file)
9042 reader.setId(file);
9043 if (reader.getSeries() != serie)
9044 reader.setSeries(serie);
9045 b.resolution = serie;
9046 int RGBChannelCount = reader.getRGBChannelCount();
9047 b.bitsPerPixel = reader.getBitsPerPixel();
9048 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 16)
9049 {
9050 pr.Close();
9051 MessageBox.Show("Image bit depth of " + b.bitsPerPixel + " is not supported.");
9052 return null;
9053 }
9054 b.id = file;
9055 b.file = file;
9056 int SizeX, SizeY;
9057 SizeX = reader.getSizeX();
9058 SizeY = reader.getSizeY();
9059 int SizeZ = reader.getSizeZ();
9060 b.sizeC = reader.getSizeC();
9061 b.sizeZ = reader.getSizeZ();
9062 b.sizeT = reader.getSizeT();
9063 b.littleEndian = reader.isLittleEndian();
9064 b.seriesCount = reader.getSeriesCount();
9065 b.imagesPerSeries = reader.getImageCount();
9066 b.series = serie;
9067
9068 string order = reader.getDimensionOrder();
9069 //OME reader.getBitsPerPixel(); sometimes returns incorrect bits per pixel, like when opening ImageJ images.
9070 //So we check the pixel type from xml metadata and if it fails we use the readers value.
9071 PixelFormat PixelFormat;
9072 try
9073 {
9074 PixelFormat = GetPixelFormat(RGBChannelCount, b.meta.getPixelsType(serie));
9075 }
9076 catch (Exception)
9077 {
9078 PixelFormat = GetPixelFormat(RGBChannelCount, reader.getBitsPerPixel());
9079 }
9080
9081
9082 int sx = tileSizeX;
9083 int sy = tileSizeY;
9084 if (tile)
9085 {
9086 if (tilex < 0)
9087 tilex = 0;
9088 if (tiley < 0)
9089 tiley = 0;
9090 if (tilex >= SizeX)
9091 tilex = SizeX - 1;
9092 if (tiley >= SizeY)
9093 tiley = SizeY - 1;
9094
9095 if (tilex + tileSizeX > SizeX)
9096 sx -= (tilex + tileSizeX) - (SizeX);
9097
9098 if (tiley + tileSizeY > SizeY)
9099 sy -= (tiley + tileSizeY) - (SizeY);
9100 if (sx <= 0)
9101 return null;
9102 if (sy <= 0)
9103 return null;
9104 }
9105 int resc = reader.getResolutionCount();
9106 for (int s = 0; s < b.seriesCount; s++)
9107 {
9108 reader.setSeries(s);
9109 for (int r = 0; r < reader.getResolutionCount(); r++)
9110 {
9111 Resolution res = new Resolution();
9112 try
9113 {
9114 int rgbc = reader.getRGBChannelCount();
9115 int bps = reader.getBitsPerPixel();
9116 PixelFormat px;
9117 try
9118 {
9119 px = GetPixelFormat(rgbc, b.meta.getPixelsType(s));
9120 }
9121 catch (Exception)
9122 {
9123 px = GetPixelFormat(rgbc, bps);
9124 }
9125 res.PixelFormat = px;
9126 res.SizeX = reader.getSizeX();
9127 res.SizeY = reader.getSizeY();
9128 if (b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(s) != null)
9129 {
9130 res.PhysicalSizeX = b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(s).value().doubleValue();
9131 }
9132 else
9133 res.PhysicalSizeX = (96 / 2.54) / 1000;
9134 if (b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(s) != null)
9135 {
9136 res.PhysicalSizeY = b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(s).value().doubleValue();
9137 }
9138 else
9139 res.PhysicalSizeY = (96 / 2.54) / 1000;
9140
9141 if (b.meta.getStageLabelX(s) != null)
9142 res.StageSizeX = b.meta.getStageLabelX(s).value().doubleValue();
9143 if (b.meta.getStageLabelY(s) != null)
9144 res.StageSizeY = b.meta.getStageLabelY(s).value().doubleValue();
9145 if (b.meta.getStageLabelZ(s) != null)
9146 res.StageSizeZ = b.meta.getStageLabelZ(s).value().doubleValue();
9147 else
9148 res.StageSizeZ = 1;
9149 if (b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(s) != null)
9150 {
9151 res.PhysicalSizeZ = b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(s).value().doubleValue();
9152 }
9153 else
9154 {
9155 res.PhysicalSizeZ = 1;
9156 }
9157 }
9158 catch (Exception e)
9159 {
9160 Console.WriteLine("No Stage Coordinates. PhysicalSize:(" + res.PhysicalSizeX + "," + res.PhysicalSizeY + "," + res.PhysicalSizeZ + ")");
9161 }
9162 b.Resolutions.Add(res);
9163 }
9164 }
9165 reader.setSeries(serie);
9166 if (resc > 1)
9167 {
9168 b.ispyramidal = true;
9169 tile = true;
9170 if(tileSizeX == 0)
9171 tileSizeX = Screen.PrimaryScreen.WorkingArea.Width;
9172 if (tileSizeY == 0)
9173 tileSizeY = Screen.PrimaryScreen.WorkingArea.Height;
9174 }
9175 //Lets get the channels amd initialize them
9176 int i = 0;
9177 while (true)
9178 {
9179 Channel ch = new Channel(i, b.bitsPerPixel, 1);
9180 bool def = false;
9181 try
9182 {
9183 if (b.meta.getChannelName(serie, i) != null)
9184 ch.Name = b.meta.getChannelName(serie, i);
9185 if (b.meta.getChannelSamplesPerPixel(serie, i) != null)
9186 {
9187 int s = b.meta.getChannelSamplesPerPixel(serie, i).getNumberValue().intValue();
9188 ch.SamplesPerPixel = s;
9189 def = true;
9190 }
9191 if (b.meta.getChannelAcquisitionMode(serie, i) != null)
9192 ch.AcquisitionMode = b.meta.getChannelAcquisitionMode(serie, i);
9193 if (b.meta.getChannelID(serie, i) != null)
9194 ch.info.ID = b.meta.getChannelID(serie, i);
9195 if (b.meta.getChannelFluor(serie, i) != null)
9196 ch.Fluor = b.meta.getChannelFluor(serie, i);
9197 if (b.meta.getChannelColor(serie, i) != null)
9198 {
9199 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color cc = b.meta.getChannelColor(serie, i);
9200 ch.Color = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(cc.getRed(), cc.getGreen(), cc.getBlue());
9201 }
9202 if (b.meta.getChannelIlluminationType(serie, i) != null)
9203 ch.IlluminationType = b.meta.getChannelIlluminationType(serie, i);
9204 if (b.meta.getChannelContrastMethod(serie, i) != null)
9205 ch.ContrastMethod = b.meta.getChannelContrastMethod(serie, i);
9206 if (b.meta.getChannelEmissionWavelength(serie, i) != null)
9207 ch.Emission = b.meta.getChannelEmissionWavelength(serie, i).value().intValue();
9208 if (b.meta.getChannelExcitationWavelength(serie, i) != null)
9209 ch.Excitation = b.meta.getChannelExcitationWavelength(serie, i).value().intValue();
9210 if (b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodePower(serie, i) != null)
9211 ch.LightSourceIntensity = b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodePower(serie, i).value().doubleValue();
9212 if (b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodeID(serie, i) != null)
9213 ch.DiodeName = b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodeID(serie, i);
9214 if (b.meta.getChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(serie, i) != null)
9215 ch.LightSourceAttenuation = b.meta.getChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(serie, i).toString();
9216
9217 }
9218 catch (Exception e)
9219 {
9220 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
9221 }
9222 if (i == 0 && def)
9223 {
9224 b.rgbChannels[0] = 0;
9225 }
9226 else
9227 if (i == 1 && def)
9228 {
9229 b.rgbChannels[1] = 1;
9230 }
9231 else
9232 if (i == 2 && def)
9233 {
9234 b.rgbChannels[2] = 2;
9235 }
9236 //If this channel is not defined we have loaded all the channels in the file.
9237 if (!def)
9238 break;
9239 else
9240 b.Channels.Add(ch);
9241 i++;
9242 }
9243
9244 //Bioformats gives a size of 3 for C when saved in ImageJ as RGB. We need to correct for this as C should be 1 for RGB.
9245 if ((PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb) && b.SizeC == 3)
9246 {
9247 b.sizeC = 1;
9248 }
9249 b.Coords = new int[b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT];
9250 if (tile)
9251 {
9252 b.ispyramidal = true;
9253 }
9254
9255 try
9256 {
9257 string st = OpenSlideGTK.OpenSlideImage.DetectVendor(file);
9258 if (st != null)
9259 b.slideImage = OpenSlideGTK.OpenSlideImage.Open(file);
9260 }
9261 catch (Exception e)
9262 {
9263 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
9264 }
9265
9266 int rc = b.meta.getROICount();
9267 for (int im = 0; im < rc; im++)
9268 {
9269 string roiID = b.meta.getROIID(im);
9270 string roiName = b.meta.getROIName(im);
9271 ZCT co = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
9272 int scount = 1;
9273 try
9274 {
9275 scount = b.meta.getShapeCount(im);
9276 }
9277 catch (Exception e)
9278 {
9279 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
9280 }
9281 for (int sc = 0; sc < scount; sc++)
9282 {
9283 string type = b.meta.getShapeType(im, sc);
9284 ROI an = new ROI();
9285 an.roiID = roiID;
9286 an.roiName = roiName;
9287 an.shapeIndex = sc;
9288 if (type == "Point")
9289 {
9290 an.type = ROI.Type.Point;
9291 an.id = b.meta.getPointID(im, sc);
9292 double dx = b.meta.getPointX(im, sc).doubleValue();
9293 double dy = b.meta.getPointY(im, sc).doubleValue();
9294 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(new PointD(dx, dy)));
9295 an.coord = new ZCT();
9296 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getPointTheZ(im, sc);
9297 if (nz != null)
9298 an.coord.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
9299 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getPointTheC(im, sc);
9300 if (nc != null)
9301 an.coord.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
9302 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getPointTheT(im, sc);
9303 if (nt != null)
9304 an.coord.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
9305 an.Text = b.meta.getPointText(im, sc);
9306 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPointFontSize(im, sc);
9307 if (fl != null)
9308 an.font = new Font(SystemFonts.DefaultFont.FontFamily, (float)fl.value().doubleValue(), FontStyle.Regular);
9309 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
9310 if (col != null)
9311 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
9312 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getPointStrokeWidth(im, sc);
9313 if (fw != null)
9314 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
9315 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
9316 if (colf != null)
9317 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
9318 }
9319 else
9320 if (type == "Line")
9321 {
9322 an.type = ROI.Type.Line;
9323 an.id = b.meta.getLineID(im, sc);
9324 double px1 = b.meta.getLineX1(im, sc).doubleValue();
9325 double py1 = b.meta.getLineY1(im, sc).doubleValue();
9326 double px2 = b.meta.getLineX2(im, sc).doubleValue();
9327 double py2 = b.meta.getLineY2(im, sc).doubleValue();
9328 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(new PointD(px1, py1)));
9329 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(new PointD(px2, py2)));
9330 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getLineTheZ(im, sc);
9331 if (nz != null)
9332 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
9333 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getLineTheC(im, sc);
9334 if (nc != null)
9335 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
9336 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getLineTheT(im, sc);
9337 if (nt != null)
9338 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
9339 an.coord = co;
9340 an.Text = b.meta.getLineText(im, sc);
9341 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getLineFontSize(im, sc);
9342 if (fl != null)
9343 an.font = new Font(SystemFonts.DefaultFont.FontFamily, (float)fl.value().doubleValue(), FontStyle.Regular);
9344 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getLineStrokeColor(im, sc);
9345 if (col != null)
9346 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
9347 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getLineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
9348 if (fw != null)
9349 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
9350 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getLineFillColor(im, sc);
9351 if (colf != null)
9352 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
9353 }
9354 else
9355 if (type == "Rectangle")
9356 {
9357 an.type = ROI.Type.Rectangle;
9358 an.id = b.meta.getRectangleID(im, sc);
9359 double px = b.meta.getRectangleX(im, sc).doubleValue();
9360 double py = b.meta.getRectangleY(im, sc).doubleValue();
9361 double pw = b.meta.getRectangleWidth(im, sc).doubleValue();
9362 double ph = b.meta.getRectangleHeight(im, sc).doubleValue();
9363 an.Rect = b.ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(px, py, pw, ph));
9364 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getRectangleTheZ(im, sc);
9365 if (nz != null)
9366 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
9367 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getRectangleTheC(im, sc);
9368 if (nc != null)
9369 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
9370 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getRectangleTheT(im, sc);
9371 if (nt != null)
9372 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
9373 an.coord = co;
9374
9375 an.Text = b.meta.getRectangleText(im, sc);
9376 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getRectangleFontSize(im, sc);
9377 if (fl != null)
9378 an.font = new Font(SystemFonts.DefaultFont.FontFamily, (float)fl.value().doubleValue(), FontStyle.Regular);
9379 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getRectangleStrokeColor(im, sc);
9380 if (col != null)
9381 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
9382 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getRectangleStrokeWidth(im, sc);
9383 if (fw != null)
9384 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
9385 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getRectangleFillColor(im, sc);
9386 if (colf != null)
9387 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
9388 ome.xml.model.enums.FillRule fr = b.meta.getRectangleFillRule(im, sc);
9389 }
9390 else
9391 if (type == "Ellipse")
9392 {
9393 an.type = ROI.Type.Ellipse;
9394 an.id = b.meta.getEllipseID(im, sc);
9395 double px = b.meta.getEllipseX(im, sc).doubleValue();
9396 double py = b.meta.getEllipseY(im, sc).doubleValue();
9397 double ew = b.meta.getEllipseRadiusX(im, sc).doubleValue();
9398 double eh = b.meta.getEllipseRadiusY(im, sc).doubleValue();
9399 //We convert the ellipse radius to System.Drawing.Rectangle
9400 double w = ew * 2;
9401 double h = eh * 2;
9402 double x = px - ew;
9403 double y = py - eh;
9404 an.Rect = b.ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(x, y, w, h));
9405 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getEllipseTheZ(im, sc);
9406 if (nz != null)
9407 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
9408 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getEllipseTheC(im, sc);
9409 if (nc != null)
9410 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
9411 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getEllipseTheT(im, sc);
9412 if (nt != null)
9413 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
9414 an.coord = co;
9415 an.Text = b.meta.getEllipseText(im, sc);
9416 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getEllipseFontSize(im, sc);
9417 if (fl != null)
9418 an.font = new Font(SystemFonts.DefaultFont.FontFamily, (float)fl.value().doubleValue(), FontStyle.Regular);
9419 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getEllipseStrokeColor(im, sc);
9420 if (col != null)
9421 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
9422 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getEllipseStrokeWidth(im, sc);
9423 if (fw != null)
9424 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
9425 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getEllipseFillColor(im, sc);
9426 if (colf != null)
9427 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
9428 }
9429 else
9430 if (type == "Polygon")
9431 {
9432 an.type = ROI.Type.Polygon;
9433 an.id = b.meta.getPolygonID(im, sc);
9434 an.closed = true;
9435 string pxs = b.meta.getPolygonPoints(im, sc);
9436 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
9437 pts = b.ToStageSpace(pts);
9438 if (pts.Length > 100)
9439 {
9440 an.type = ROI.Type.Freeform;
9441 }
9442 an.AddPoints(pts);
9443 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getPolygonTheZ(im, sc);
9444 if (nz != null)
9445 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
9446 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getPolygonTheC(im, sc);
9447 if (nc != null)
9448 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
9449 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getPolygonTheT(im, sc);
9450 if (nt != null)
9451 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
9452 an.coord = co;
9453 an.Text = b.meta.getPolygonText(im, sc);
9454 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPolygonFontSize(im, sc);
9455 if (fl != null)
9456 an.font = new Font(SystemFonts.DefaultFont.FontFamily, (float)fl.value().doubleValue(), FontStyle.Regular);
9457 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getPolygonStrokeColor(im, sc);
9458 if (col != null)
9459 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
9460 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getPolygonStrokeWidth(im, sc);
9461 if (fw != null)
9462 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
9463 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getPolygonFillColor(im, sc);
9464 if (colf != null)
9465 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
9466 }
9467 else
9468 if (type == "Polyline")
9469 {
9470 an.type = ROI.Type.Polyline;
9471 an.id = b.meta.getPolylineID(im, sc);
9472 string pxs = b.meta.getPolylinePoints(im, sc);
9473 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
9474 for (int pi = 0; pi < pts.Length; pi++)
9475 {
9476 pts[pi] = b.ToStageSpace(pts[pi]);
9477 }
9478 an.AddPoints(an.stringToPoints(pxs));
9479 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getPolylineTheZ(im, sc);
9480 if (nz != null)
9481 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
9482 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getPolylineTheC(im, sc);
9483 if (nc != null)
9484 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
9485 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getPolylineTheT(im, sc);
9486 if (nt != null)
9487 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
9488 an.coord = co;
9489 an.Text = b.meta.getPolylineText(im, sc);
9490 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPolylineFontSize(im, sc);
9491 if (fl != null)
9492 an.font = new Font(SystemFonts.DefaultFont.FontFamily, (float)fl.value().doubleValue(), FontStyle.Regular);
9493 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getPolylineStrokeColor(im, sc);
9494 if (col != null)
9495 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
9496 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getPolylineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
9497 if (fw != null)
9498 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
9499 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getPolylineFillColor(im, sc);
9500 if (colf != null)
9501 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
9502 }
9503 else
9504 if (type == "Label")
9505 {
9506 an.type = ROI.Type.Label;
9507 an.id = b.meta.getLabelID(im, sc);
9508
9509 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getLabelTheZ(im, sc);
9510 if (nz != null)
9511 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
9512 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getLabelTheC(im, sc);
9513 if (nc != null)
9514 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
9515 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getLabelTheT(im, sc);
9516 if (nt != null)
9517 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
9518 an.coord = co;
9519
9520 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getLabelFontSize(im, sc);
9521 if (fl != null)
9522 an.font = new Font(SystemFonts.DefaultFont.FontFamily, (float)fl.value().doubleValue(), FontStyle.Regular);
9523 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getLabelStrokeColor(im, sc);
9524 if (col != null)
9525 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
9526 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getLabelStrokeWidth(im, sc);
9527 if (fw != null)
9528 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
9529 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getLabelFillColor(im, sc);
9530 if (colf != null)
9531 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
9532 PointD p = new PointD(b.meta.getLabelX(im, sc).doubleValue(), b.meta.getLabelY(im, sc).doubleValue());
9533 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(p));
9534 an.Text = b.meta.getLabelText(im, sc);
9535 }
9536 if (b.Volume.Intersects(an.BoundingBox))
9537 b.Annotations.Add(an);
9538 }
9539 }
9540 b.Buffers = new List<BufferInfo>();
9541 // read the image data bytes
9542 int pages = reader.getImageCount();
9543 int z = 0;
9544 int c = 0;
9545 int t = 0;
9546 bool inter = reader.isInterleaved();
9547 for (int p = 0; p < pages; p++)
9548 {
9549 BufferInfo bf;
9550 if (vips && tile)
9551 {
9552 OpenVip(b, p, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY);
9553 }
9554 else
9555 if (tile)
9556 {
9557 bf = BioImage.GetTile(b, b.coordinate, serie, tilex, tiley, sx, sy);
9558 b.Buffers.Add(bf);
9559 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
9560
9561 }
9562 else
9563 {
9564 byte[] bytes = reader.openBytes(p);
9565 bf = new BufferInfo(file, SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat, bytes, new ZCT(z, c, t), p, b.littleEndian, inter);
9566 b.Buffers.Add(bf);
9567 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
9568 }
9569 if (progress)
9570 pr.UpdateProgressF(((float)p / (float)pages));
9571 Application.DoEvents();
9572 }
9573
9574 int pls = b.meta.getPlaneCount(serie);
9575 if (pls == b.Buffers.Count)
9576 for (int bi = 0; bi < b.Buffers.Count; bi++)
9577 {
9578 Plane pl = new Plane();
9579 pl.Coordinate = new ZCT();
9580 double px = 0; double py = 0; double pz = 0;
9581 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionX(serie, bi) != null)
9582 px = b.meta.getPlanePositionX(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
9583 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionY(serie, bi) != null)
9584 py = b.meta.getPlanePositionY(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
9585 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionZ(serie, bi) != null)
9586 pz = b.meta.getPlanePositionZ(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
9587 pl.Location = new Point3D(px, py, pz);
9588 int cc = 0; int zc = 0; int tc = 0;
9589 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi) != null)
9590 cc = b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
9591 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi) != null)
9592 zc = b.meta.getPlaneTheZ(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
9593 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi) != null)
9594 tc = b.meta.getPlaneTheT(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
9595 if (b.meta.getPlaneDeltaT(serie, bi) != null)
9596 pl.Delta = b.meta.getPlaneDeltaT(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
9597 if (b.meta.getPlaneExposureTime(serie, bi) != null)
9598 pl.Exposure = b.meta.getPlaneExposureTime(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
9599 b.Buffers[bi].Plane = pl;
9600 }
9601
9602 b.UpdateCoords(b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT, order);
9603 reader.close();
9604 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
9605 if(b.Buffers.Count != 0)
9606 do
9607 {
9608 Thread.Sleep(50);
9609 } while (b.Buffers[b.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
9610 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
9611
9612 AutoThreshold(b, false);
9613 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
9614 b.StackThreshold(true);
9615 else
9616 b.StackThreshold(false);
9617 if (b.isPyramidal)
9618 b.SetLabelMacroResolutions();
9619 if(addToImages)
9620 Images.AddImage(b,newTab);
9621 b.Loading = false;
9622 if (progress)
9623 {
9624 pr.Close();
9625 pr.Dispose();
9626 }
9627
9628 return b;
9629 }
9630 public ImageReader imRead = new ImageReader();
9631 byte[] bts;
9632 int ssx, ssy;
9633 public static int FindFocus(BioImage im, int Channel, int Time)
9634 {
9635
9636 long mf = 0;
9637 int fr = 0;
9638 List<double> dt = new List<double>();
9639 ZCT c = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
9640 for (int i = 0; i < im.SizeZ; i++)
9641 {
9642 long f = CalculateFocusQuality(im.Buffers[im.Coords[i, Channel, Time]]);
9643 dt.Add(f);
9644 if (f > mf)
9645 {
9646 mf = f;
9647 fr = im.Coords[i, Channel, Time];
9648 }
9649 }
9650 Plot pl = new Plot(dt.ToArray(), "Focus");
9651 return fr;
9652 }
9653 static long CalculateFocusQuality(BufferInfo b)
9654 {
9655 if (b.RGBChannelsCount == 1)
9656 {
9657 long sum = 0;
9658 long sumOfSquaresR = 0;
9659 for (int y = 0; y < b.SizeY; y++)
9660 for (int x = 0; x < b.SizeX; x++)
9661 {
9662 ColorS pixel = b.GetPixel(x, y);
9663 sum += pixel.R;
9664 sumOfSquaresR += pixel.R * pixel.R;
9665 }
9666 return sumOfSquaresR * b.SizeX * b.SizeY - sum * sum;
9667 }
9668 else
9669 {
9670 long sum = 0;
9671 long sumOfSquares = 0;
9672 for (int y = 0; y < b.SizeY; y++)
9673 for (int x = 0; x < b.SizeX; x++)
9674 {
9675 ColorS pixel = b.GetPixel(x, y);
9676 int p = (pixel.R + pixel.G + pixel.B) / 3;
9677 sum += p;
9678 sumOfSquares += p * p;
9679 }
9680 return sumOfSquares * b.SizeX * b.SizeY - sum * sum;
9681 }
9682 }
9683 public static BufferInfo ExtractRegionFromTiledTiff(BioImage b, int x, int y, int width, int height, int res)
9684 {
9685 try
9686 {
9687
9688 NetVips.Image subImage = b.vipPages[res].Crop(x, y, width, height);
9689 if (b.vipPages[res].Format == NetVips.Enums.BandFormat.Uchar)
9690 {
9691 BufferInfo bm;
9692 byte[] imageData = subImage.WriteToMemory();
9693 if (b.Resolutions[res].RGBChannelsCount == 3)
9694 bm = new BufferInfo(b.file, subImage.Width, subImage.Height, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, imageData, new ZCT(), res);
9695 else
9696 bm = new BufferInfo(b.file, subImage.Width, subImage.Height, PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed, imageData, new ZCT(), res);
9697 return bm;
9698
9699 }
9700 else if (b.vipPages[res].Format == NetVips.Enums.BandFormat.Ushort)
9701 {
9702 BufferInfo bm;
9703 byte[] imageData = subImage.WriteToMemory();
9704 if (b.Resolutions[res].RGBChannelsCount == 3)
9705 bm = new BufferInfo(b.file, subImage.Width, subImage.Height, PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb, imageData, new ZCT(), res);
9706 else
9707 bm = new BufferInfo(b.file, subImage.Width, subImage.Height, PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale, imageData, new ZCT(), res);
9708 return bm;
9709 }
9710 }
9711 catch (Exception ex)
9712 {
9713 Console.WriteLine($"Error: {ex.Message}");
9714 return null;
9715 }
9716 return null;
9717 }
9730 public static BufferInfo GetTile(BioImage b, ZCT coord, int serie, int tilex, int tiley, int tileSizeX, int tileSizeY, bool OpenSlide = true)
9731 {
9732 if ((b.file.EndsWith("ome.tif") && vips) || (b.file.EndsWith(".tif") && vips))
9733 {
9734 //We can get a tile faster with libvips rather than bioformats.
9735 //and incase we are on mac we can't use bioformats due to IKVM not supporting mac.
9736 return ExtractRegionFromTiledTiff(b, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY, serie);
9737 }
9738 //We check if we can open this with OpenSlide as this is faster than Bioformats with IKVM.
9739 if (b.slideImage != null && OpenSlide)
9740 {
9741 return new BufferInfo(tileSizeX, tileSizeY, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb, b.slideImage.ReadRegion(serie, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY), coord, "");
9742 }
9743 if (b.imRead == null)
9744 b.imRead = new ImageReader();
9745 string s = b.imRead.getCurrentFile();
9746 b.file = b.file.Replace("\\", "/");
9747 if (s == null)
9748 b.imRead.setId(b.file);
9749 if (b.imRead.getSeries() != serie)
9750 b.imRead.setSeries(serie);
9751 int SizeX = b.imRead.getSizeX();
9752 int SizeY = b.imRead.getSizeY();
9753 int p = b.Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
9754 bool littleEndian = b.imRead.isLittleEndian();
9755 PixelFormat px = b.Resolutions[serie].PixelFormat;
9756 if (tilex < 0)
9757 tilex = 0;
9758 if (tiley < 0)
9759 tiley = 0;
9760 if (tilex >= SizeX)
9761 tilex = SizeX - 1;
9762 if (tiley >= SizeY)
9763 tiley = SizeY - 1;
9764 int sx = tileSizeX;
9765 if (tilex + tileSizeX > SizeX)
9766 sx -= (tilex + tileSizeX) - (SizeX);
9767 int sy = tileSizeY;
9768 if (tiley + tileSizeY > SizeY)
9769 sy -= (tiley + tileSizeY) - (SizeY);
9770 if (sx <= 0)
9771 return null;
9772 if (sy <= 0)
9773 return null;
9774 byte[] bytesr = b.imRead.openBytes(b.Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T], tilex, tiley, sx, sy);
9775 bool interleaved = b.imRead.isInterleaved();
9776 BufferInfo bm = new BufferInfo(b.file, sx, sy, px, bytesr, coord, p, null, littleEndian, interleaved);
9777 return bm;
9778 }
9779 public Bitmap GetTileRGB(ZCT coord, int serie, int tilex, int tiley, int tileSizeX, int tileSizeY)
9780 {
9781 return (Bitmap)GetTile(this, coord, serie, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY).ImageRGB;
9782 }
9783 static NetVips.Image netim;
9784 public static bool VipsSupport(string file)
9785 {
9786 NetVips.Image im;
9787 try
9788 {
9789 im = NetVips.Image.Tiffload(file);
9790 }
9791 catch (Exception e)
9792 {
9793 Console.WriteLine(e.ToString());
9794 return false;
9795 }
9796 im.Close();
9797 im.Dispose();
9798 return true;
9799 }
9804 public void StackThreshold(bool bit16)
9805 {
9806 if (bit16)
9807 {
9808 for (int ch = 0; ch < Channels.Count; ch++)
9809 {
9810 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[ch].range.Length; i++)
9811 {
9812 Channels[ch].range[i].Min = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMin;
9813 Channels[ch].range[i].Max = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMax;
9814 }
9815 Channels[ch].BitsPerPixel = 16;
9816 }
9817 bitsPerPixel = 16;
9818 }
9819 else
9820 {
9821 for (int ch = 0; ch < Channels.Count; ch++)
9822 {
9823 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[ch].range.Length; i++)
9824 {
9825 Channels[ch].range[i].Min = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMin;
9826 Channels[ch].range[i].Max = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMax;
9827 }
9828 Channels[ch].BitsPerPixel = 8;
9829 }
9830 bitsPerPixel = 8;
9831 }
9832 }
9843 public static int GetBitsPerPixel(int bt)
9844 {
9845 if (bt <= 255)
9846 return 8;
9847 if (bt <= 512)
9848 return 9;
9849 else if (bt <= 1023)
9850 return 10;
9851 else if (bt <= 2047)
9852 return 11;
9853 else if (bt <= 4095)
9854 return 12;
9855 else if (bt <= 8191)
9856 return 13;
9857 else if (bt <= 16383)
9858 return 14;
9859 else if (bt <= 32767)
9860 return 15;
9861 else
9862 return 16;
9863 }
9869 public static int GetBitMaxValue(int bt)
9870 {
9871 if (bt == 8)
9872 return 255;
9873 if (bt == 9)
9874 return 512;
9875 else if (bt == 10)
9876 return 1023;
9877 else if (bt == 11)
9878 return 2047;
9879 else if (bt == 12)
9880 return 4095;
9881 else if (bt == 13)
9882 return 8191;
9883 else if (bt == 14)
9884 return 16383;
9885 else if (bt == 15)
9886 return 32767;
9887 else
9888 return 65535;
9889 }
9899 public static PixelFormat GetPixelFormat(int rgbChannelCount, int bitsPerPixel)
9900 {
9901 if (bitsPerPixel == 8)
9902 {
9903 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
9904 return PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
9905 else if (rgbChannelCount == 3)
9906 return PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
9907 else if (rgbChannelCount == 4)
9908 return PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb;
9909 }
9910 else
9911 {
9912 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
9913 return PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
9914 if (rgbChannelCount == 3)
9915 return PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
9916 }
9917 throw new NotSupportedException("Not supported pixel format.");
9918 }
9919 public static PixelFormat GetPixelFormat(int rgbChannelCount, ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType px)
9920 {
9921 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
9922 {
9923 if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT8 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8)
9924 return PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
9925 else if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT16 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16)
9926 return PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
9927 }
9928 else
9929 {
9930 if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT8 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8)
9931 return PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
9932 else if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT16 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16)
9933 return PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
9934 }
9935 throw new NotSupportedException("Not supported pixel format.");
9936 }
9943 public static BioImage[] OpenOMESeries(string file, bool newTab, bool addToImages)
9944 {
9945 reader = new ImageReader();
9946 var meta = service.createOMEXMLMetadata();
9947 reader.setMetadataStore((MetadataStore)meta);
9948 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
9949 reader.setId(file);
9950 bool tile = false;
9951 if (reader.getOptimalTileWidth() != reader.getSizeX())
9952 tile = true;
9953 int count = reader.getSeriesCount();
9954 BioImage[] bs = null;
9955 if (tile)
9956 {
9957 bs = new BioImage[1];
9958 bs[0] = OpenOME(file, 0, newTab, addToImages, true, true, 0, 0, Screen.PrimaryScreen.Bounds.Width, Screen.PrimaryScreen.Bounds.Height);
9959 return bs;
9960 }
9961 else
9962 bs = new BioImage[count];
9963 reader.close();
9964 for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
9965 {
9966 bs[i] = OpenOME(file, i,newTab,addToImages);
9967 if (bs[i] == null)
9968 return null;
9969 }
9970 return bs;
9971 }
9975 public static async Task OpenAsync(string file, bool OME, bool newtab, bool images)
9976 {
9977 openfile = file;
9978 omes = OME;
9979 tab = newtab;
9980 add = images;
9981 await Task.Run(OpenThread);
9982 }
9986 public static async Task OpenAsync(string[] files, bool OME, bool tab, bool images)
9987 {
9988 foreach (string file in files)
9989 {
9990 await OpenAsync(file, OME, tab, images);
9991 }
9992 }
9993
10000 public static BioImage OpenFile(string file, int series, bool tab, bool addToImages)
10001 {
10002 return OpenFile(file, series, tab, addToImages, false, 0,0,0,0);
10003 }
10004
10005 static string openfile;
10006 static bool omes, tab, add;
10007 static int serie;
10008 static void OpenThread()
10009 {
10010 OpenFile(openfile, serie, tab, add);
10011 }
10012 static string savefile, saveid;
10013 static bool some;
10014 static int sserie;
10015 static void SaveThread()
10016 {
10017 if (omes)
10018 SaveOME(savefile, saveid);
10019 else
10020 SaveFile(savefile, saveid);
10021 }
10034 public static async Task SaveAsync(string file, string id, int serie, bool ome)
10035 {
10036 savefile = file;
10037 saveid = id;
10038 some = ome;
10039 await Task.Run(SaveThread);
10040 }
10041
10042 static List<string> sts = new List<string>();
10043 static void SaveSeriesThread()
10044 {
10045 if (omes)
10046 {
10047 BioImage[] bms = new BioImage[sts.Count];
10048 int i = 0;
10049 foreach (string st in sts)
10050 {
10051 bms[i] = Images.GetImage(st);
10052 }
10053 SaveOMESeries(bms, savefile, Planes);
10054 }
10055 else
10056 SaveSeries(sts.ToArray(), savefile);
10057 }
10067 public static async Task SaveSeriesAsync(BioImage[] imgs, string file, bool ome)
10068 {
10069 sts.Clear();
10070 foreach (BioImage item in imgs)
10071 {
10072 sts.Add(item.ID);
10073 }
10074 savefile = file;
10075 some = ome;
10076 await Task.Run(SaveSeriesThread);
10077 }
10078 static Enums.ForeignTiffCompression comp;
10079 static int compLev = 0;
10080 static BioImage[] bms;
10081 static void SavePyramidalThread()
10082 {
10083 SaveOMEPyramidal(bms, savefile, comp, compLev);
10084 }
10098 public static async Task SavePyramidalAsync(BioImage[] imgs, string file, Enums.ForeignTiffCompression com, int compLevel)
10099 {
10100 bms = imgs;
10101 savefile = file;
10102 comp = com;
10103 compLev = compLevel;
10104 await Task.Run(SavePyramidalThread);
10105 }
10106 private static List<string> openOMEfile = new List<string>();
10108 private static void OpenOME()
10109 {
10110 foreach (string f in openOMEfile)
10111 {
10112 OpenOME(f, 0, true, true, true, false, 0,0,0,0);
10113 }
10114 openOMEfile.Clear();
10115 }
10116 private static string saveOMEfile;
10117 private static string saveOMEID;
10121 public static void Open(string file)
10122 {
10123 OpenFile(file);
10124 }
10128 public static void Open(string[] files)
10129 {
10130 foreach (string file in files)
10131 {
10132 Open(file);
10133 }
10134 }
10139 public static void Save(string file, string ID)
10140 {
10141 SaveFile(file, ID);
10142 }
10144 private static void SaveOME()
10145 {
10146 SaveOME(saveOMEfile, saveOMEID);
10147 }
10148
10154 public static BioImage ImagesToStack(string[] files)
10155 {
10156 BioImage[] bs = new BioImage[files.Length];
10157 int z = 0;
10158 int c = 0;
10159 int t = 0;
10160 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
10161 {
10162 string str = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(files[i]);
10163 str = str.Replace(".ome", "");
10164 string[] st = str.Split('_');
10165 if (st.Length > 3)
10166 {
10167 z = int.Parse(st[1].Replace("Z", ""));
10168 c = int.Parse(st[2].Replace("C", ""));
10169 t = int.Parse(st[3].Replace("T", ""));
10170 }
10171 if (i == 0)
10172 bs[0] = OpenOME(files[i]);
10173 else
10174 {
10175 bs[i] = OpenFile(files[i], 0, true);
10176 }
10177 }
10178 BioImage b = BioImage.CopyInfo(bs[0], true, true);
10179 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
10180 {
10181 for (int bc = 0; bc < bs[i].Buffers.Count; bc++)
10182 {
10183 b.Buffers.Add(bs[i].Buffers[bc]);
10184 }
10185 }
10186 b.UpdateCoords(z + 1, c + 1, t + 1);
10187 return b;
10188 }
10192 public static void Update(BioImage b)
10193 {
10194 b = OpenFile(b.file);
10195 }
10197 public void Update()
10198 {
10199 Update(this);
10200 }
10201
10202
10203
10204 private static Stopwatch st = new Stopwatch();
10205 private static ServiceFactory factory;
10206 private static OMEXMLService service;
10207 private static ImageReader reader;
10208 private static ImageWriter writer;
10209 private loci.formats.meta.IMetadata meta;
10210
10211 //We use UNIX type line endings since they are supported by ImageJ & BioImage.
10212 public const char NewLine = '\n';
10213 public const string columns = "ROIID,ROINAME,TYPE,ID,SHAPEINDEX,TEXT,S,C,Z,T,X,Y,W,H,POINTS,STROKECOLOR,STROKECOLORW,FILLCOLOR,FONTSIZE\n";
10214
10220 public static string OpenXML(string file)
10221 {
10222 if (!file.EndsWith(".tif"))
10223 return null;
10224 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
10225 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
10226 return f[0].ToString();
10227 }
10228
10235 public static List<ROI> OpenOMEROIs(string file, int series)
10236 {
10237 List<ROI> Annotations = new List<ROI>();
10238 // create OME-XML metadata store
10239 ServiceFactory factory = new ServiceFactory();
10240 OMEXMLService service = (OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService));
10241 loci.formats.ome.OMEXMLMetadata meta = service.createOMEXMLMetadata();
10242 // create format reader
10243 ImageReader imageReader = new ImageReader();
10244 imageReader.setMetadataStore(meta);
10245 // initialize file
10246 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
10247 imageReader.setId(file);
10248 int imageCount = imageReader.getImageCount();
10249 int seriesCount = imageReader.getSeriesCount();
10250 double physicalSizeX = 0;
10251 double physicalSizeY = 0;
10252 double physicalSizeZ = 0;
10253 double stageSizeX = 0;
10254 double stageSizeY = 0;
10255 double stageSizeZ = 0;
10256 int SizeX = imageReader.getSizeX();
10257 int SizeY = imageReader.getSizeY();
10258 int SizeZ = imageReader.getSizeY();
10259 try
10260 {
10261 bool hasPhysical = false;
10262 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(series) != null)
10263 {
10264 physicalSizeX = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(series).value().doubleValue();
10265 hasPhysical = true;
10266 }
10267 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(series) != null)
10268 {
10269 physicalSizeY = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(series).value().doubleValue();
10270 }
10271 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(series) != null)
10272 {
10273 physicalSizeZ = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(series).value().doubleValue();
10274 }
10275 else
10276 {
10277 physicalSizeZ = 1;
10278 }
10279 if (meta.getStageLabelX(series) != null)
10280 stageSizeX = meta.getStageLabelX(series).value().doubleValue();
10281 if (meta.getStageLabelY(series) != null)
10282 stageSizeY = meta.getStageLabelY(series).value().doubleValue();
10283 if (meta.getStageLabelZ(series) != null)
10284 stageSizeZ = meta.getStageLabelZ(series).value().doubleValue();
10285 else
10286 stageSizeZ = 1;
10287 }
10288 catch (Exception e)
10289 {
10290 stageSizeX = 0;
10291 stageSizeY = 0;
10292 stageSizeZ = 1;
10293 }
10294 VolumeD volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(stageSizeX, stageSizeY, stageSizeZ), new Point3D(physicalSizeX * SizeX, physicalSizeY * SizeY, physicalSizeZ * SizeZ));
10295 int rc = meta.getROICount();
10296 for (int im = 0; im < rc; im++)
10297 {
10298 string roiID = meta.getROIID(im);
10299 string roiName = meta.getROIName(im);
10300 ZCT co = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
10301 int scount = 1;
10302 try
10303 {
10304 scount = meta.getShapeCount(im);
10305 }
10306 catch (Exception e)
10307 {
10308 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
10309 }
10310 for (int sc = 0; sc < scount; sc++)
10311 {
10312 string type = meta.getShapeType(im, sc);
10313 ROI an = new ROI();
10314 an.roiID = roiID;
10315 an.roiName = roiName;
10316 an.shapeIndex = sc;
10317 if (type == "Point")
10318 {
10319 an.type = ROI.Type.Point;
10320 an.id = meta.getPointID(im, sc);
10321 double dx = meta.getPointX(im, sc).doubleValue();
10322 double dy = meta.getPointY(im, sc).doubleValue();
10323 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(new PointD(dx, dy), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
10324 an.coord = new ZCT();
10325 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getPointTheZ(im, sc);
10326 if (nz != null)
10327 an.coord.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
10328 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getPointTheC(im, sc);
10329 if (nc != null)
10330 an.coord.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
10331 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getPointTheT(im, sc);
10332 if (nt != null)
10333 an.coord.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
10334 an.Text = meta.getPointText(im, sc);
10335 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getPointFontSize(im, sc);
10336 if (fl != null)
10337 an.font = new Font(SystemFonts.DefaultFont.FontFamily, (float)fl.value().doubleValue(), FontStyle.Regular);
10338 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
10339 if (col != null)
10340 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
10341 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getPointStrokeWidth(im, sc);
10342 if (fw != null)
10343 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
10344 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
10345 if (colf != null)
10346 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
10347 }
10348 else
10349 if (type == "Line")
10350 {
10351 an.type = ROI.Type.Line;
10352 an.id = meta.getLineID(im, sc);
10353 double px1 = meta.getLineX1(im, sc).doubleValue();
10354 double py1 = meta.getLineY1(im, sc).doubleValue();
10355 double px2 = meta.getLineX2(im, sc).doubleValue();
10356 double py2 = meta.getLineY2(im, sc).doubleValue();
10357 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(new PointD(px1, py1), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
10358 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(new PointD(px2, py2), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
10359 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getLineTheZ(im, sc);
10360 if (nz != null)
10361 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
10362 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getLineTheC(im, sc);
10363 if (nc != null)
10364 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
10365 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getLineTheT(im, sc);
10366 if (nt != null)
10367 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
10368 an.coord = co;
10369 an.Text = meta.getLineText(im, sc);
10370 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getLineFontSize(im, sc);
10371 if (fl != null)
10372 an.font = new Font(SystemFonts.DefaultFont.FontFamily, (float)fl.value().doubleValue(), FontStyle.Regular);
10373 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getLineStrokeColor(im, sc);
10374 if (col != null)
10375 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
10376 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getLineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
10377 if (fw != null)
10378 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
10379 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getLineFillColor(im, sc);
10380 if (colf != null)
10381 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
10382 }
10383 else
10384 if (type == "Rectangle")
10385 {
10386 an.type = ROI.Type.Rectangle;
10387 an.id = meta.getRectangleID(im, sc);
10388 double px = meta.getRectangleX(im, sc).doubleValue();
10389 double py = meta.getRectangleY(im, sc).doubleValue();
10390 double pw = meta.getRectangleWidth(im, sc).doubleValue();
10391 double ph = meta.getRectangleHeight(im, sc).doubleValue();
10392 an.Rect = ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(px, py, pw, ph), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
10393 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getRectangleTheZ(im, sc);
10394 if (nz != null)
10395 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
10396 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getRectangleTheC(im, sc);
10397 if (nc != null)
10398 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
10399 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getRectangleTheT(im, sc);
10400 if (nt != null)
10401 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
10402 an.coord = co;
10403
10404 an.Text = meta.getRectangleText(im, sc);
10405 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getRectangleFontSize(im, sc);
10406 if (fl != null)
10407 an.font = new Font(SystemFonts.DefaultFont.FontFamily, (float)fl.value().doubleValue(), FontStyle.Regular);
10408 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getRectangleStrokeColor(im, sc);
10409 if (col != null)
10410 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
10411 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getRectangleStrokeWidth(im, sc);
10412 if (fw != null)
10413 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
10414 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getRectangleFillColor(im, sc);
10415 if (colf != null)
10416 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
10417 ome.xml.model.enums.FillRule fr = meta.getRectangleFillRule(im, sc);
10418 }
10419 else
10420 if (type == "Ellipse")
10421 {
10422 an.type = ROI.Type.Ellipse;
10423 an.id = meta.getEllipseID(im, sc);
10424 double px = meta.getEllipseX(im, sc).doubleValue();
10425 double py = meta.getEllipseY(im, sc).doubleValue();
10426 double ew = meta.getEllipseRadiusX(im, sc).doubleValue();
10427 double eh = meta.getEllipseRadiusY(im, sc).doubleValue();
10428 //We convert the ellipse radius to System.Drawing.Rectangle
10429 double w = ew * 2;
10430 double h = eh * 2;
10431 double x = px - ew;
10432 double y = py - eh;
10433 an.Rect = ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(px, py, w, h), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
10434 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getEllipseTheZ(im, sc);
10435 if (nz != null)
10436 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
10437 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getEllipseTheC(im, sc);
10438 if (nc != null)
10439 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
10440 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getEllipseTheT(im, sc);
10441 if (nt != null)
10442 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
10443 an.coord = co;
10444 an.Text = meta.getEllipseText(im, sc);
10445 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getEllipseFontSize(im, sc);
10446 if (fl != null)
10447 an.font = new Font(SystemFonts.DefaultFont.FontFamily, (float)fl.value().doubleValue(), FontStyle.Regular);
10448 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getEllipseStrokeColor(im, sc);
10449 if (col != null)
10450 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
10451 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getEllipseStrokeWidth(im, sc);
10452 if (fw != null)
10453 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
10454 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getEllipseFillColor(im, sc);
10455 if (colf != null)
10456 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
10457 }
10458 else
10459 if (type == "Polygon")
10460 {
10461 an.type = ROI.Type.Polygon;
10462 an.id = meta.getPolygonID(im, sc);
10463 an.closed = true;
10464 string pxs = meta.getPolygonPoints(im, sc);
10465 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
10466 pts = ToStageSpace(pts, physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
10467 if (pts.Length > 100)
10468 {
10469 an.type = ROI.Type.Freeform;
10470 }
10471 an.AddPoints(pts);
10472 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getPolygonTheZ(im, sc);
10473 if (nz != null)
10474 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
10475 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getPolygonTheC(im, sc);
10476 if (nc != null)
10477 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
10478 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getPolygonTheT(im, sc);
10479 if (nt != null)
10480 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
10481 an.coord = co;
10482 an.Text = meta.getPolygonText(im, sc);
10483 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getPolygonFontSize(im, sc);
10484 if (fl != null)
10485 an.font = new Font(SystemFonts.DefaultFont.FontFamily, (float)fl.value().doubleValue(), FontStyle.Regular);
10486 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getPolygonStrokeColor(im, sc);
10487 if (col != null)
10488 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
10489 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getPolygonStrokeWidth(im, sc);
10490 if (fw != null)
10491 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
10492 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getPolygonFillColor(im, sc);
10493 if (colf != null)
10494 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
10495 }
10496 else
10497 if (type == "Polyline")
10498 {
10499 an.type = ROI.Type.Polyline;
10500 an.id = meta.getPolylineID(im, sc);
10501 string pxs = meta.getPolylinePoints(im, sc);
10502 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
10503 for (int pi = 0; pi < pts.Length; pi++)
10504 {
10505 pts[pi] = ToStageSpace(pts[pi], physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
10506 }
10507 an.AddPoints(an.stringToPoints(pxs));
10508 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getPolylineTheZ(im, sc);
10509 if (nz != null)
10510 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
10511 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getPolylineTheC(im, sc);
10512 if (nc != null)
10513 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
10514 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getPolylineTheT(im, sc);
10515 if (nt != null)
10516 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
10517 an.coord = co;
10518 an.Text = meta.getPolylineText(im, sc);
10519 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getPolylineFontSize(im, sc);
10520 if (fl != null)
10521 an.font = new Font(SystemFonts.DefaultFont.FontFamily, (float)fl.value().doubleValue(), FontStyle.Regular);
10522 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getPolylineStrokeColor(im, sc);
10523 if (col != null)
10524 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
10525 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getPolylineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
10526 if (fw != null)
10527 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
10528 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getPolylineFillColor(im, sc);
10529 if (colf != null)
10530 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
10531 }
10532 else
10533 if (type == "Label")
10534 {
10535 an.type = ROI.Type.Label;
10536 an.id = meta.getLabelID(im, sc);
10537
10538 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getLabelTheZ(im, sc);
10539 if (nz != null)
10540 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
10541 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getLabelTheC(im, sc);
10542 if (nc != null)
10543 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
10544 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getLabelTheT(im, sc);
10545 if (nt != null)
10546 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
10547 an.coord = co;
10548
10549 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getLabelFontSize(im, sc);
10550 if (fl != null)
10551 an.font = new Font(SystemFonts.DefaultFont.FontFamily, (float)fl.value().doubleValue(), FontStyle.Regular);
10552 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getLabelStrokeColor(im, sc);
10553 if (col != null)
10554 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
10555 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getLabelStrokeWidth(im, sc);
10556 if (fw != null)
10557 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
10558 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getLabelFillColor(im, sc);
10559 if (colf != null)
10560 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
10561 PointD p = new PointD(meta.getLabelX(im, sc).doubleValue(), meta.getLabelY(im, sc).doubleValue());
10562 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(p, physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
10563 an.Text = meta.getLabelText(im, sc);
10564 }
10565 }
10566 }
10567
10568 imageReader.close();
10569 return Annotations;
10570 }
10576 public static string ROIsToString(List<ROI> Annotations)
10577 {
10578 string s = "";
10579 for (int i = 0; i < Annotations.Count; i++)
10580 {
10581 s += ROIToString(Annotations[i]);
10582 }
10583 return s;
10584 }
10590 public static string ROIToString(ROI an)
10591 {
10592 PointD[] points = an.GetPoints();
10593 string pts = "";
10594 for (int j = 0; j < points.Length; j++)
10595 {
10596 if (j == points.Length - 1)
10597 pts += points[j].X.ToString() + "," + points[j].Y.ToString();
10598 else
10599 pts += points[j].X.ToString() + "," + points[j].Y.ToString() + " ";
10600 }
10601 char sep = (char)34;
10602 string sColor = sep.ToString() + an.strokeColor.A.ToString() + ',' + an.strokeColor.R.ToString() + ',' + an.strokeColor.G.ToString() + ',' + an.strokeColor.B.ToString() + sep.ToString();
10603 string bColor = sep.ToString() + an.fillColor.A.ToString() + ',' + an.fillColor.R.ToString() + ',' + an.fillColor.G.ToString() + ',' + an.fillColor.B.ToString() + sep.ToString();
10604
10605 string line = an.roiID + ',' + an.roiName + ',' + an.type.ToString() + ',' + an.id + ',' + an.shapeIndex.ToString() + ',' +
10606 an.Text + ',' + an.serie + ',' + an.coord.Z.ToString() + ',' + an.coord.C.ToString() + ',' + an.coord.T.ToString() + ',' + an.X.ToString() + ',' + an.Y.ToString() + ',' +
10607 an.W.ToString() + ',' + an.H.ToString() + ',' + sep.ToString() + pts + sep.ToString() + ',' + sColor + ',' + an.strokeWidth.ToString() + ',' + bColor + ',' + an.font.Size.ToString() + ',' + NewLine;
10608 return line;
10609 }
10615 public static ROI StringToROI(string sts)
10616 {
10617 //Works with either comma or tab separated values.
10618 if (sts.StartsWith("<?xml") || sts.StartsWith("{"))
10619 return null;
10620 ROI an = new ROI();
10621 string val = "";
10622 bool inSep = false;
10623 int col = 0;
10624 double x = 0;
10625 double y = 0;
10626 double w = 0;
10627 double h = 0;
10628 string line = sts;
10629 bool points = false;
10630 char sep = '"';
10631 for (int i = 0; i < line.Length; i++)
10632 {
10633 char c = line[i];
10634 if (c == sep)
10635 {
10636 if (!inSep)
10637 {
10638 inSep = true;
10639 }
10640 else
10641 inSep = false;
10642 continue;
10643 }
10644
10645 if ((c == ',' || c == '\t') && (!inSep || points))
10646 {
10647 //ROIID,ROINAME,TYPE,ID,SHAPEINDEX,TEXT,C,Z,T,X,Y,W,H,POINTS,STROKECOLOR,STROKECOLORW,FILLCOLOR,FONTSIZE
10648 if (col == 0)
10649 {
10650 //ROIID
10651 an.roiID = val;
10652 }
10653 else
10654 if (col == 1)
10655 {
10656 //ROINAME
10657 an.roiName = val;
10658 }
10659 else
10660 if (col == 2)
10661 {
10662 //TYPE
10663 an.type = (ROI.Type)Enum.Parse(typeof(ROI.Type), val);
10664 }
10665 else
10666 if (col == 3)
10667 {
10668 //ID
10669 an.id = val;
10670 }
10671 else
10672 if (col == 4)
10673 {
10674 //SHAPEINDEX/
10675 an.shapeIndex = int.Parse(val);
10676 }
10677 else
10678 if (col == 5)
10679 {
10680 //TEXT/
10681 an.Text = val;
10682 }
10683 else
10684 if (col == 6)
10685 {
10686 an.serie = int.Parse(val);
10687 }
10688 else
10689 if (col == 7)
10690 {
10691 an.coord.Z = int.Parse(val);
10692 }
10693 else
10694 if (col == 8)
10695 {
10696 an.coord.C = int.Parse(val);
10697 }
10698 else
10699 if (col == 9)
10700 {
10701 an.coord.T = int.Parse(val);
10702 }
10703 else
10704 if (col == 10)
10705 {
10706 x = double.Parse(val);
10707 }
10708 else
10709 if (col == 11)
10710 {
10711 y = double.Parse(val);
10712 }
10713 else
10714 if (col == 12)
10715 {
10716 w = double.Parse(val);
10717 }
10718 else
10719 if (col == 13)
10720 {
10721 h = double.Parse(val);
10722 }
10723 else
10724 if (col == 14)
10725 {
10726 //POINTS
10727 if (c == ',')
10728 {
10729 inSep = true;
10730 points = true;
10731 val += c;
10732 continue;
10733 }
10734 else
10735 {
10736 an.AddPoints(an.stringToPoints(val));
10737 points = false;
10738 an.Rect = new RectangleD(x, y, w, h);
10739 }
10740 }
10741 else
10742 if (col == 15)
10743 {
10744 //STROKECOLOR
10745 string[] st = val.Split(',');
10746 an.strokeColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(int.Parse(st[0]), int.Parse(st[1]), int.Parse(st[2]), int.Parse(st[3]));
10747 }
10748 else
10749 if (col == 16)
10750 {
10751 //STROKECOLORW
10752 an.strokeWidth = double.Parse(val);
10753 }
10754 else
10755 if (col == 17)
10756 {
10757 //FILLCOLOR
10758 string[] st = val.Split(',');
10759 an.fillColor = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(int.Parse(st[0]), int.Parse(st[1]), int.Parse(st[2]), int.Parse(st[3]));
10760 }
10761 else
10762 if (col == 18)
10763 {
10764 //FONTSIZE
10765 double s = double.Parse(val);
10766 an.font = new System.Drawing.Font(System.Drawing.SystemFonts.DefaultFont.FontFamily, (float)s, System.Drawing.FontStyle.Regular);
10767 }
10768 col++;
10769 val = "";
10770 }
10771 else
10772 val += c;
10773 }
10774
10775 return an;
10776 }
10782 public static void ExportROIsCSV(string filename, List<ROI> Annotations)
10783 {
10784 string con = columns;
10785 con += ROIsToString(Annotations);
10786 File.WriteAllText(filename, con);
10787 }
10793 public static List<ROI> ImportROIsCSV(string filename)
10794 {
10795 List<ROI> list = new List<ROI>();
10796 if (!File.Exists(filename))
10797 return list;
10798 string[] sts = File.ReadAllLines(filename);
10799 //We start reading from line 1.
10800 for (int i = 1; i < sts.Length; i++)
10801 {
10802 list.Add(StringToROI(sts[i]));
10803 }
10804 return list;
10805 }
10813 public static void ExportROIFolder(string path, string filename)
10814 {
10815 string[] fs = Directory.GetFiles(path);
10816 int i = 0;
10817 foreach (string f in fs)
10818 {
10819 List<ROI> annotations = OpenOMEROIs(f, 0);
10820 string ff = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(f);
10821 ExportROIsCSV(path + "//" + ff + "-" + i.ToString() + ".csv", annotations);
10822 i++;
10823 }
10824 }
10825
10826 private static BioImage bstats = null;
10827 private static bool update = false;
10833 public static void AutoThreshold(BioImage b, bool updateImageStats)
10834 {
10835 bstats = b;
10836 Statistics statistics = null;
10837 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
10838 statistics = new Statistics(true);
10839 else
10840 statistics = new Statistics(false);
10841 for (int i = 0; i < b.Buffers.Count; i++)
10842 {
10843 if (b.Buffers[i].Stats == null || updateImageStats)
10844 b.Buffers[i].Stats = Statistics.FromBytes(b.Buffers[i]);
10845 if (b.Buffers[i].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
10846 statistics.AddStatistics(b.Buffers[i].Stats[0]);
10847 else
10848 {
10849 for (int r = 0; r < b.Buffers[i].RGBChannelsCount; r++)
10850 {
10851 statistics.AddStatistics(b.Buffers[i].Stats[r]);
10852 }
10853 }
10854 }
10855
10856 for (int c = 0; c < b.Channels.Count; c++)
10857 {
10858 Statistics[] sts;
10859 if (b.RGBChannelCount == 1)
10860 {
10861 sts = new Statistics[1];
10862 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
10863 {
10864 sts[0] = new Statistics(true);
10865 }
10866 else
10867 sts[0] = new Statistics(false);
10868 }
10869 else
10870 {
10871 sts = new Statistics[b.Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount];
10872 if (b.RGBChannelCount == 3)
10873 {
10874 sts[0] = new Statistics(true);
10875 sts[1] = new Statistics(true);
10876 sts[2] = new Statistics(true);
10877 }
10878 else
10879 {
10880 sts[0] = new Statistics(false);
10881 sts[1] = new Statistics(false);
10882 sts[2] = new Statistics(false);
10883 sts[3] = new Statistics(false);
10884 }
10885 }
10886
10887 for (int z = 0; z < b.SizeZ; z++)
10888 {
10889 for (int t = 0; t < b.SizeT; t++)
10890 {
10891 int ind = 0;
10892 if (b.RGBChannelCount > 1)
10893 ind = b.Coords[z, 0, t];
10894 else
10895 ind = b.Coords[z, c, t];
10896 if (b.Buffers[ind].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
10897 sts[0].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[0]);
10898 else
10899 {
10900 sts[0].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[0]);
10901 sts[1].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[1]);
10902 sts[2].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[2]);
10903 if (b.Buffers[ind].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
10904 sts[3].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[3]);
10905 }
10906 }
10907 }
10908 if (b.RGBChannelCount == 1)
10909 sts[0].MeanHistogram();
10910 else
10911 {
10912 sts[0].MeanHistogram();
10913 sts[1].MeanHistogram();
10914 sts[2].MeanHistogram();
10915 if (b.Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
10916 sts[3].MeanHistogram();
10917 }
10918 b.Channels[c].stats = sts;
10919 }
10920 statistics.MeanHistogram();
10921 b.statistics = statistics;
10922
10923 }
10926 public static void AutoThreshold()
10927 {
10928 AutoThreshold(bstats, update);
10929 }
10936 public static void AutoThresholdThread(BioImage b)
10937 {
10938 bstats = b;
10939 Thread th = new Thread(AutoThreshold);
10940 th.Start();
10941 }
10944 public void Dispose()
10945 {
10946 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
10947 {
10948 Buffers[i].Dispose();
10949 }
10950 for (int i = 0; i < Channels.Count; i++)
10951 {
10952 Channels[i].Dispose();
10953 }
10954 Images.RemoveImage(this);
10955 GC.Collect();
10956 }
10961 public override string ToString()
10962 {
10963 return Filename.ToString() + ", (" + Volume.Location.X + ", " + Volume.Location.Y + ", " + Volume.Location.Z + ")";
10964 }
10965
10972 public static BioImage operator /(BioImage a, float b)
10973 {
10974 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
10975 {
10976 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] / b;
10977 }
10978 return a;
10979 }
10986 public static BioImage operator *(BioImage a, float b)
10987 {
10988 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
10989 {
10990 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] * b;
10991 }
10992 return a;
10993 }
11000 public static BioImage operator +(BioImage a, float b)
11001 {
11002 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
11003 {
11004 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] + b;
11005 }
11006 return a;
11007 }
11014 public static BioImage operator -(BioImage a, float b)
11015 {
11016 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
11017 {
11018 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] - b;
11019 }
11020 return a;
11021 }
11022
11029 public static BioImage operator /(BioImage a, ColorS b)
11030 {
11031 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
11032 {
11033 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] / b;
11034 }
11035 return a;
11036 }
11043 public static BioImage operator *(BioImage a, ColorS b)
11044 {
11045 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
11046 {
11047 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] * b;
11048 }
11049 return a;
11050 }
11058 public static BioImage operator +(BioImage a, ColorS b)
11059 {
11060 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
11061 {
11062 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] + b;
11063 }
11064 return a;
11065 }
11072 public static BioImage operator -(BioImage a, ColorS b)
11073 {
11074 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
11075 {
11076 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] - b;
11077 }
11078 return a;
11079 }
11080 }
